GV01rv_01_u:0: RV_01.001.01.1{01} agnimīḷe purohitaṃ yajñasya devam ṛtvijam
GV01rv_01_u:6: RV_01.001.04.1{01} agne yaṃ yajñamadhvaraṃ viśvataḥ paribhūrasi
GV01rv_01_u:10: RV_01.001.06.1{02} yadaṅga dāśuṣe tvamagne bhadraṃ kariṣyasi
GV01rv_01_u:12: RV_01.001.07.1{02} upa tvāgne dive-dive doṣāvastardhiyā vayam
GV01rv_01_u:16: RV_01.001.09.1{02} sa naḥ piteva sūnave 'gne sūpāyano bhava
GV01rv_01_u:18: RV_01.002.01.1{03} vāyavā yāhi darśateme somā araṃkṛtāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:22: RV_01.002.03.1{03} vāyo tava prapṛñcatī dhenā jigāti dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:24: RV_01.002.04.1{03} indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhirā gatam
GV01rv_01_u:28: RV_01.002.06.1{04} vāyavindraśca sunvata ā yātamupa niṣkṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:30: RV_01.002.07.1{04} mitraṃ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam
GV01rv_01_u:34: RV_01.002.09.1{04} kavī no mitrāvaruṇā tuvijātā urukṣayā
GV01rv_01_u:36: RV_01.003.01.1{05} aśvinā yajvarīriṣo dravatpāṇī śubhas patī
GV01rv_01_u:38: RV_01.003.02.1{05} aśvinā purudaṃsasā narā śavīrayā dhiyā
GV01rv_01_u:40: RV_01.003.03.1{05} dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:42: RV_01.003.04.1{05} indrā yāhi citrabhāno sutā ime tvāyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:44: RV_01.003.05.1{05} indrā yāhi dhiyeṣito viprajūtaḥ sutāvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:46: RV_01.003.06.1{05} indrā yāhi tūtujāna upa brahmāṇi harivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:48: RV_01.003.07.1{06} omāsaścarṣaṇīdhṛto viśve devāsa ā gata
GV01rv_01_u:50: RV_01.003.08.1{06} viśve devāso apturaḥ sutamā ganta tūrṇayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:52: RV_01.003.09.1{06} viśve devāso asridha ehimāyāso adruhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:58: RV_01.003.12.1{06} maho arṇaḥ sarasvatī pra cetayati ketunā
GV01rv_01_u:62: RV_01.004.02.1{07} upa naḥ savanā gahi somasya somapāḥ piba
GV01rv_01_u:64: RV_01.004.03.1{07} athā te antamānāṃ vidyāma sumatīnām
GV01rv_01_u:65: RV_01.004.03.2{07} mā no ati khya āgahi
GV01rv_01_u:68: RV_01.004.05.1{07} uta bruvantu no nido niranyataścidārata
GV01rv_01_u:74: RV_01.004.08.1{08} asya pītvā śatakrato ghano vṛtrāṇāmabhavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:76: RV_01.004.09.1{08} taṃ tvā vājeṣu vājinaṃ vājayāmaḥ śatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:78: RV_01.004.10.1{08} yo rāyo 'vanirmahān supāraḥ sunvataḥ sakhā
GV01rv_01_u:80: RV_01.005.01.1{09} ā tvetā ni ṣīdatendramabhi pra gāyata
GV01rv_01_u:84: RV_01.005.03.1{09} sa ghā no yoga ā bhuvat sa rāye sa purandhyām
GV01rv_01_u:86: RV_01.005.04.1{09} yasya saṃsthe na vṛṇvate harī samatsu śatravaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:88: RV_01.005.05.1{09} sutapāvne sutā ime śucayo yanti vītaye
GV01rv_01_u:90: RV_01.005.06.1{10} tvaṃ sutasya pītaye sadyo vṛddho ajāyathāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:92: RV_01.005.07.1{10} ā tvā viśantvāśavaḥ somāsa indra girvaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:94: RV_01.005.08.1{10} tvāṃ stomā avīvṛdhan tvāmukthā śatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:98: RV_01.005.10.1{10} mā no martā abhi druhan tanūnāmindra girvaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:100: RV_01.006.01.1{11} yuñjanti bradhnamaruṣaṃ carantaṃ pari tasthuṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:102: RV_01.006.02.1{11} yuñjantyasya kāmyā harī vipakṣasā rathe
GV01rv_01_u:104: RV_01.006.03.1{11} ketuṃ kṛṇvannaketave peśo maryā apeśase
GV01rv_01_u:110: RV_01.006.06.1{12} devayanto yathā matimachā vidadvasuṃ giraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:112: RV_01.006.07.1{12} indreṇa saṃ hi dṛkṣase saṃjagmāno abibhyuṣā
GV01rv_01_u:116: RV_01.006.09.1{12} ataḥ parijmannā gahi divo vā rocanādadhi
GV01rv_01_u:118: RV_01.006.10.1{12} ito vā sātimīmahe divo vā pārthivādadhi
GV01rv_01_u:122: RV_01.007.02.1{13} indra id dharyoḥ sacā sammiśla ā vacoyujā
GV01rv_01_u:124: RV_01.007.03.1{13} indro dīrghāya cakṣasa ā sūryaṃ rohayad divi
GV01rv_01_u:126: RV_01.007.04.1{13} indra vājeṣu no 'va sahasrapradhaneṣu ca
GV01rv_01_u:128: RV_01.007.05.1{13} indraṃ vayaṃ mahādhana indramarbhe havāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:130: RV_01.007.06.1{14} sa no vṛṣannamuṃ caruṃ satrādāvannapā vṛdhi
GV01rv_01_u:132: RV_01.007.07.1{14} tuñje-tuñje ya uttare stomā indrasya vajriṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:138: RV_01.007.10.1{14} indraṃ vo viśvatas pari havāmahe janebhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:140: RV_01.008.01.1{15} endra sānasiṃ rayiṃ sajitvānaṃ sadāsaham
GV01rv_01_u:142: RV_01.008.02.1{15} ni yena muṣṭihatyayā ni vṛtrā ruṇadhāmahai
GV01rv_01_u:144: RV_01.008.03.1{15} indra tvotāsa ā vayaṃ vajraṃ ghanā dadīmahi
GV01rv_01_u:146: RV_01.008.04.1{15} vayaṃ śūrebhirastṛbhirindra tvayā yujā vayam
GV01rv_01_u:148: RV_01.008.05.1{15} mahānindraḥ paraśca nu mahitvamastu vajriṇe
GV01rv_01_u:150: RV_01.008.06.1{16} samohe vā ya āśata narastokasya sanitau
GV01rv_01_u:152: RV_01.008.07.1{16} yaḥ kukṣiḥ somapātamaḥ samudra iva pinvate
GV01rv_01_u:154: RV_01.008.08.1{16} evā hyasya sūnṛtā virapśī gomatī mahī
GV01rv_01_u:156: RV_01.008.09.1{16} evā hi te vibhūtaya ūtaya indra māvate
GV01rv_01_u:158: RV_01.008.10.1{16} evā hyasya kāmyā stoma ukthaṃ ca śaṃsyā
GV01rv_01_u:162: RV_01.009.02.1{17} emenaṃ sṛjatā sute mandimindrāya mandine
GV01rv_01_u:166: RV_01.009.04.1{17} asṛgramindra te giraḥ prati tvāmudahāsata
GV01rv_01_u:168: RV_01.009.05.1{17} saṃ codaya citramarvāg rādha indra vareṇyam
GV01rv_01_u:170: RV_01.009.06.1{18} asmān su tatra codayendra rāye rabhasvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:172: RV_01.009.07.1{18} saṃ gomadindra vājavadasme pṛthu śravo bṛhat
GV01rv_01_u:174: RV_01.009.08.1{18} asme dhehi śravo bṛhad dyumnaṃ sahasrasātamam
GV01rv_01_u:178: RV_01.009.10.1{18} sute-sute nyokase bṛhad bṛhata edariḥ
GV01rv_01_u:181: RV_01.010.01.2{19} brahmāṇastvā śatakrata ud vaṃśamiva yemire
GV01rv_01_u:182: RV_01.010.02.1{19} yat sānoḥ sānumāruhad bhūryaspaṣṭa kartvam
GV01rv_01_u:183: RV_01.010.02.2{19} tadindro arthaṃ cetati yūthena vṛṣṇirejati
GV01rv_01_u:184: RV_01.010.03.1{19} yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā
GV01rv_01_u:185: RV_01.010.03.2{19} athā na indra somapā girāmupaśrutiṃ cara
GV01rv_01_u:186: RV_01.010.04.1{19} ehi stomānabhi svarābhi gṛṇīhyā ruva
GV01rv_01_u:187: RV_01.010.04.2{19} brahma ca no vasosacendra yajñaṃ ca vardhaya
GV01rv_01_u:189: RV_01.010.05.2{19} śakro yathā suteṣu ṇo rāraṇat sakhyeṣu ca
GV01rv_01_u:190: RV_01.010.06.1{19} tamit sakhitva īmahe taṃ rāye taṃ suvīrye
GV01rv_01_u:191: RV_01.010.06.2{19} sa śakra uta naḥ śakadindro vasu dayamānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:193: RV_01.010.07.2{20} gavāmapavrajaṃ vṛdhi kṛṇuṣva rādho adrivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:194: RV_01.010.08.1{20} nahi tvā rodasī ubhe ṛghāyamāṇaminvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:195: RV_01.010.08.2{20} jeṣaḥ svarvatīrapaḥ saṃ gā asmabhyaṃ dhūnuhi
GV01rv_01_u:196: RV_01.010.09.1{20} āśrutkarṇa śrudhī havaṃ nū cid dadhiṣva me giraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:197: RV_01.010.09.2{20} indra stomamimaṃ mama kṛṣvā yujaścidantaram
GV01rv_01_u:198: RV_01.010.10.1{20} vidmā hi tvā vṛṣantamaṃ vājeṣu havanaśrutam
GV01rv_01_u:200: RV_01.010.11.1{20} ā tū na indra kauśika mandasānaḥ sutaṃ piba
GV01rv_01_u:201: RV_01.010.11.2{20} navyamāyuḥpra sū tira kṛdhī sahasrasām ṛṣim
GV01rv_01_u:202: RV_01.010.12.1{20} pari tvā girvaṇo gira imā bhavantu viśvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:203: RV_01.010.12.2{20} vṛddhāyumanu vṛddhayo juṣṭā bhavantu juṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:204: RV_01.011.01.1{21} indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhan samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:206: RV_01.011.02.1{21} sakhye ta indra vājino mā bhema śavasas pate
GV01rv_01_u:208: RV_01.011.03.1{21} pūrvīrindrasya rātayo na vi dasyantyūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:209: RV_01.011.03.2{21} yadī vājasya gomata stotṛbhyo maṃhate magham
GV01rv_01_u:211: RV_01.011.04.2{21} indro viśvasyakarmaṇo dhartā vajrī puruṣṭutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:214: RV_01.011.06.1{21} tavāhaṃ śūra rātibhiḥ pratyāyaṃ sindhumāvadan
GV01rv_01_u:215: RV_01.011.06.2{21} upātiṣṭhanta girvaṇo viduṣ ṭe tasya kāravaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:217: RV_01.011.07.2{21} viduṣ ṭe tasya medhirāsteṣāṃ śravāṃsyut tira
GV01rv_01_u:219: RV_01.011.08.2{21} sahasraṃ yasya rātaya uta vā santi bhūyasīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:220: RV_01.012.01.1{22} agniṃ dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam
GV01rv_01_u:222: RV_01.012.02.1{22} agnim-agniṃ havīmabhiḥ sadā havanta viśpatim
GV01rv_01_u:224: RV_01.012.03.1{22} agne devānihā vaha jajñāno vṛktabarhiṣe
GV01rv_01_u:226: RV_01.012.04.1{22} tānuśato vi bodhaya yadagne yāsi dūtyam
GV01rv_01_u:228: RV_01.012.05.1{22} ghṛtāhavana dīdivaḥ prati ṣma riṣato daha
GV01rv_01_u:238: RV_01.012.10.1{23} sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devānihā vaha
GV01rv_01_u:240: RV_01.012.11.1{23} sa na stavāna ā bhara gāyatreṇa navīyasā
GV01rv_01_u:244: RV_01.013.01.1{24} susamiddho na ā vaha devānagne haviṣmate
GV01rv_01_u:246: RV_01.013.02.1{24} madhumantaṃ tanūnapād yajñaṃ deveṣu naḥ kave
GV01rv_01_u:248: RV_01.013.03.1{24} narāśaṃsamiha priyamasmin yajña upa hvaye
GV01rv_01_u:250: RV_01.013.04.1{24} agne sukhatame rathe devānīḷita ā vaha
GV01rv_01_u:254: RV_01.013.06.1{24} vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīrasaścataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:256: RV_01.013.07.1{25} naktoṣāsā supeśasāsmin yajña upa hvaye
GV01rv_01_u:258: RV_01.013.08.1{25} tā sujihvā upa hvaye hotārā daivyā kavī
GV01rv_01_u:260: RV_01.013.09.1{25} iḷā sarasvatī mahī tisro devīrmayobhuvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:264: RV_01.013.11.1{25} ava sṛjā vanaspate deva devebhyo haviḥ
GV01rv_01_u:266: RV_01.013.12.1{25} svāhā yajñaṃ kṛṇotanendrāya yajvano gṛhe
GV01rv_01_u:268: RV_01.014.01.1{26} aibhiragne duvo giro viśvebhiḥ somapītaye
GV01rv_01_u:270: RV_01.014.02.1{26} ā tvā kaṇvā ahūṣata gṛṇanti vipra te dhiyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:272: RV_01.014.03.1{26} indravāyū bṛhaspatiṃ mitrāgniṃ pūṣaṇaṃ bhagam
GV01rv_01_u:274: RV_01.014.04.1{26} pra vo bhriyanta indavo matsarā mādayiṣṇavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:278: RV_01.014.06.1{26} ghṛtapṛṣṭhā manoyujo ye tvā vahanti vahnayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:280: RV_01.014.07.1{27} tān yajatrān ṛtāvṛdho 'gne patnīvatas kṛdhi
GV01rv_01_u:282: RV_01.014.08.1{27} ye yajatrā ya īḍyāste te pibantu jihvayā
GV01rv_01_u:284: RV_01.014.09.1{27} ākīṃ sūryasya rocanād viśvān devānuṣarbudhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:286: RV_01.014.10.1{27} viśvebhiḥ somyaṃ madhvagna indreṇa vāyunā
GV01rv_01_u:288: RV_01.014.11.1{27} tvaṃ hotā manurhito 'gne yajñeṣu sīdasi
GV01rv_01_u:290: RV_01.014.12.1{27} yukṣvā hyaruṣī rathe harito deva rohitaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:292: RV_01.015.01.1{28} indra somaṃ piba ṛtunā tvā viśantvindavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:294: RV_01.015.02.1{28} marutaḥ pibata ṛtunā potrād yajñaṃ punītana
GV01rv_01_u:296: RV_01.015.03.1{28} abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā
GV01rv_01_u:298: RV_01.015.04.1{28} agne devānihā vaha sādayā yoniṣu triṣu
GV01rv_01_u:300: RV_01.015.05.1{28} brāhmaṇādindra rādhasaḥ pibā somam ṛtūnranu
GV01rv_01_u:302: RV_01.015.06.1{28} yuvaṃ dakṣaṃ dhṛtavrata mitrāvaruṇa dūḷabham
GV01rv_01_u:306: RV_01.015.08.1{29} draviṇodā dadātu no vasūni yāni śṛṇvire
GV01rv_01_u:308: RV_01.015.09.1{29} draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata
GV01rv_01_u:310: RV_01.015.10.1{29} yat tvā turīyam ṛtubhirdraviṇodo yajāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:312: RV_01.015.11.1{29} aśvinā pibataṃ madhu dīdyagnī śucivrata
GV01rv_01_u:316: RV_01.016.01.1{30} ā tvā vahantu harayo vṛṣaṇaṃ somapītaye
GV01rv_01_u:318: RV_01.016.02.1{30} imā dhānā ghṛtasnuvo harī ihopa vakṣataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:322: RV_01.016.04.1{30} upa naḥ sutamā gahi haribhirindra keśibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:324: RV_01.016.05.1{30} semaṃ na stomaṃ ā gahyupedaṃ savanaṃ sutam
GV01rv_01_u:326: RV_01.016.06.1{31} ime somāsa indavaḥ sutāso adhi barhiṣi
GV01rv_01_u:328: RV_01.016.07.1{31} ayaṃ te stomo agriyo hṛdispṛgastu śantamaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:330: RV_01.016.08.1{31} viśvamit savanaṃ sutamindro madāya gachati
GV01rv_01_u:332: RV_01.016.09.1{31} semaṃ naḥ kāmamā pṛṇa gobhiraśvaiḥ śatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:336: RV_01.017.02.1{32} gantārā hi stho 'vase havaṃ viprasya māvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:340: RV_01.017.04.1{32} yuvāku hi śacīnāṃ yuvāku sumatīnām
GV01rv_01_u:344: RV_01.017.06.1{33} tayoridavasā vayaṃ sanema ni ca dhīmahi
GV01rv_01_u:346: RV_01.017.07.1{33} indrāvaruṇa vāmahaṃ huve citrāya rādhase
GV01rv_01_u:348: RV_01.017.08.1{33} indrāvaruṇa nū nu vāṃ siṣāsantīṣu dhīṣvā
GV01rv_01_u:350: RV_01.017.09.1{33} pra vāmaśnotu suṣṭutirindrāvaruṇa yāṃ huve
GV01rv_01_u:352: RV_01.018.01.1{34} somānaṃ svaraṇaṃ kṛṇuhi brahmaṇas pate
GV01rv_01_u:354: RV_01.018.02.1{34} yo revān yo amīvahā vasuvit puṣṭivardhanaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:356: RV_01.018.03.1{34} mā naḥ śaṃso araruṣo dhūrtiḥ praṇaṃ martyasya
GV01rv_01_u:358: RV_01.018.04.1{34} sa ghā vīro na riṣyati yamindro brahmaṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:360: RV_01.018.05.1{34} tvaṃ taṃ brahmaṇas pate soma indraśca martyam
GV01rv_01_u:364: RV_01.018.07.1{35} yasmād ṛte na sidhyati yajño vipaścitaścana
GV01rv_01_u:366: RV_01.018.08.1{35} ād ṛdhnoti haviṣkṛtiṃ prāñcaṃ kṛṇotyadhvaram
GV01rv_01_u:370: RV_01.019.01.1{36} prati tyaṃ cārumadhvaraṃ gopīthāya pra hūyase
GV01rv_01_u:372: RV_01.019.02.1{36} nahi devo na martyo mahastava kratuṃ paraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:374: RV_01.019.03.1{36} ye maho rajaso vidurviśve devāso adruhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:378: RV_01.019.05.1{36} ye śubhrā ghoravarpasaḥ sukṣatrāso riśādasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:380: RV_01.019.06.1{37} ye nākasyādhi rocane divi devāsa āsate
GV01rv_01_u:382: RV_01.019.07.1{37} ya īṅkhayanti parvatān tiraḥ samudramarṇavam
GV01rv_01_u:384: RV_01.019.08.1{37} ā ye tanvanti raśmibhistiraḥ samudramojasā
GV01rv_01_u:386: RV_01.019.09.1{37} abhi tvā pūrvapītaye sṛjāmi somyaṃ madhu
GV01rv_01_u:388: RV_01.020.01.1{01} ayaṃ devāya janmane stomo viprebhirāsayā
GV01rv_01_u:390: RV_01.020.02.1{01} ya indrāya vacoyujā tatakṣurmanasā harī
GV01rv_01_u:392: RV_01.020.03.1{01} takṣan nāsatyābhyāṃ parijmānaṃ sukhaṃ ratham
GV01rv_01_u:394: RV_01.020.04.1{01} yuvānā pitarā punaḥ satyamantrā ṛjūyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:396: RV_01.020.05.1{01} saṃ vo madāso agmatendreṇa ca marutvatā
GV01rv_01_u:398: RV_01.020.06.1{02} uta tyaṃ camasaṃ navaṃ tvaṣṭurdevasya niṣkṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:400: RV_01.020.07.1{02} te no ratnāni dhattana trirā sāptāni sunvate
GV01rv_01_u:404: RV_01.021.01.1{03} ihendrāgnī upa hvaye tayorit stomamuśmasi
GV01rv_01_u:406: RV_01.021.02.1{03} tā yajñeṣu pra śaṃsatendrāgnī śumbhatā naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:408: RV_01.021.03.1{03} tā mitrasya praśastaya indrāgnī tā havāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:410: RV_01.021.04.1{03} ugrā santā havāmaha upedaṃ savanaṃ sutam
GV01rv_01_u:412: RV_01.021.05.1{03} tā mahāntā sadaspatī indrāgnī rakṣa ubjatam
GV01rv_01_u:414: RV_01.021.06.1{03} tena satyena jāgṛtamadhi pracetune pade
GV01rv_01_u:418: RV_01.022.02.1{04} yā surathā rathītamobhā devā divispṛśā
GV01rv_01_u:420: RV_01.022.03.1{04} yā vāṃ kaśā madhumatyaśvinā sūnṛtāvatī
GV01rv_01_u:422: RV_01.022.04.1{04} nahi vāmasti dūrake yatrā rathena gachathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:430: RV_01.022.08.1{05} sakhāya ā ni ṣīdata savitā stomyo nu naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:434: RV_01.022.10.1{05} ā gnā agna ihāvase hotrāṃ yaviṣṭha bhāratīm
GV01rv_01_u:436: RV_01.022.11.1{06} abhī no devīravasā mahaḥ śarmaṇā nṛpatnīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:440: RV_01.022.13.1{06} mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñaṃ mimikṣatām
GV01rv_01_u:442: RV_01.022.14.1{06} tayorid ghṛtavat payo viprā rihanti dhītibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:446: RV_01.022.16.1{07} ato devā avantu no yato viṣṇurvicakrame
GV01rv_01_u:448: RV_01.022.17.1{07} idaṃ viṣṇurvi cakrame tredhā ni dadhe padam
GV01rv_01_u:450: RV_01.022.18.1{07} trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇurgopā adābhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:452: RV_01.022.19.1{07} viṣṇoḥ karmāṇi paśyata yato vratāni paspaśe
GV01rv_01_u:454: RV_01.022.20.1{07} tad viṣṇoḥ paramaṃ padaṃ sadā paśyanti sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:456: RV_01.022.21.1{07} tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvāṃsaḥ samindhate
GV01rv_01_u:458: RV_01.023.01.1{08} tīvrāḥ somāsa ā gahyāśīrvantaḥ sutā ime
GV01rv_01_u:462: RV_01.023.03.1{08} indravāyū manojuvā viprā havanta ūtaye
GV01rv_01_u:464: RV_01.023.04.1{08} mitraṃ vayaṃ havāmahe varuṇaṃ somapītaye
GV01rv_01_u:466: RV_01.023.05.1{08} ṛtena yāv ṛtāvṛdhāv ṛtasya jyotiṣas patī
GV01rv_01_u:468: RV_01.023.06.1{09} varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhirūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:474: RV_01.023.09.1{09} hata vṛtraṃ sudānava indreṇa sahasā yujā
GV01rv_01_u:476: RV_01.023.10.1{09} viśvān devān havāmahe marutaḥ somapītaye
GV01rv_01_u:480: RV_01.023.12.1{10} haskārād vidyutas paryato jātā avantu naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:486: RV_01.023.15.1{10} uto sa mahyamindubhiḥ ṣaḍ yuktānanuseṣidhat
GV01rv_01_u:490: RV_01.023.17.1{11} amūryā upa sūrye yābhirvā sūryaḥ saha
GV01rv_01_u:492: RV_01.023.18.1{11} apo devīrupa hvaye yatra gāvaḥ pibanti naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:496: RV_01.023.20.1{11} apsu me somo abravīdantarviśvāni bheṣajā
GV01rv_01_u:498: RV_01.023.21.1{12} āpaḥ pṛṇīta bheṣajaṃ varūthaṃ tanve mama
GV01rv_01_u:500: RV_01.023.22.1{12} idamāpaḥ pra vahata yat kiṃ ca duritaṃ mayi
GV01rv_01_u:501: RV_01.023.22.2{12} yad vāhamabhidudroha yad vā śepa utānṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:503: RV_01.023.23.2{12} payasvānagna āgahi taṃ mā saṃ sṛja varcasā
GV01rv_01_u:504: RV_01.023.24.1{12} saṃ māgne varcasā sṛja saṃ prajayā samāyuṣā
GV01rv_01_u:505: RV_01.023.24.2{12} vidyurmeasya devā indro vidyāt saha ṛṣibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:506: RV_01.024.01.1{13} kasya nūnaṃ katamasyāmṛtānāṃ manāmahe cāru devasya nāma
GV01rv_01_u:507: RV_01.024.01.2{13} ko no mahyā aditaye punardāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyaṃ mātaraṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:508: RV_01.024.02.1{13} agnervayaṃ prathamasyāmṛtānāṃ manāmahe cāru devasya nāma
GV01rv_01_u:509: RV_01.024.02.2{13} sa no mahyā aditaye punardāt pitaraṃ ca dṛśeyaṃ mātaraṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:510: RV_01.024.03.1{13} abhi tvā deva savitarīśānaṃ vāryāṇām
GV01rv_01_u:512: RV_01.024.04.1{13} yaścid dhi ta itthā bhagaḥ śaśamānaḥ purā nidaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:516: RV_01.024.06.1{14} nahi te kṣatraṃ na saho na manyuṃ vayaścanāmī patayanta āpuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:517: RV_01.024.06.2{14} nemā āpo animiṣaṃ carantīrna ye vātasya praminantyabhvam
GV01rv_01_u:518: RV_01.024.07.1{14} abudhne rājā varuṇo vanasyordhvaṃ stūpaṃ dadate pūtadakṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:519: RV_01.024.07.2{14} nīcīnā sthurupari budhna eṣāmasme antarnihitāḥketavaḥ syuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:520: RV_01.024.08.1{14} uruṃ hi rājā varuṇaścakāra sūryāya panthāmanvetavā u
GV01rv_01_u:522: RV_01.024.09.1{14} śataṃ te rājan bhiṣajaḥ sahasramurvī gabhīrā sumatiṣ ṭe astu
GV01rv_01_u:523: RV_01.024.09.2{14} bādhasva dūre nirṛtiṃ parācaiḥ kṛtaṃ cidenaḥ pra mumugdhyasmat
GV01rv_01_u:524: RV_01.024.10.1{14} amī ya ṛkṣā nihitāsa uccā naktaṃ dadṛśre kuha cid diveyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:525: RV_01.024.10.2{14} adabdhāni varuṇasya vratāni vicākaśaccandramā naktameti
GV01rv_01_u:526: RV_01.024.11.1{15} tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānastadā śāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:527: RV_01.024.11.2{15} aheḷamāno varuṇeha bodhyuruśaṃsa mā na āyuḥpra moṣīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:528: RV_01.024.12.1{15} tadin naktaṃ tad divā mahyamāhustadayaṃ keto hṛda ā vi caṣṭe
GV01rv_01_u:529: RV_01.024.12.2{15} śunaḥśepo yamahvad gṛbhītaḥ so asmān rājā varuṇo mumoktu
GV01rv_01_u:530: RV_01.024.13.1{15} śunaḥśepo hyahvad gṛbhītastriṣvādityaṃ drupadeṣu baddhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:531: RV_01.024.13.2{15} avainaṃ rājā varuṇaḥ sasṛjyād vidvānadabdho vi mumoktu pāśān
GV01rv_01_u:532: RV_01.024.14.1{15} ava te heḷo varuṇa namobhirava yajñebhirīmahe havirbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:533: RV_01.024.14.2{15} kṣayannasmabhyamasura pracetā rājannenāṃsi śiśrathaḥ kṛtāni
GV01rv_01_u:534: RV_01.024.15.1{15} uduttamaṃ varuṇa pāśamasmadavādhamaṃ vi madhyamaṃ śrathāya
GV01rv_01_u:535: RV_01.024.15.2{15} athā vayamāditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma
GV01rv_01_u:536: RV_01.025.01.1{16} yaccid dhi te viśo yathā pra deva varuṇa vratam
GV01rv_01_u:538: RV_01.025.02.1{16} mā no vadhāya hatnave jihīḷānasya rīradhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:540: RV_01.025.03.1{16} vi mṛḷīkāya te mano rathīraśvaṃ na sanditam
GV01rv_01_u:542: RV_01.025.04.1{16} parā hi me vimanyavaḥ patanti vasyaiṣṭaye
GV01rv_01_u:544: RV_01.025.05.1{16} kadā kṣatraśriyaṃ naramā varuṇaṃ karāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:546: RV_01.025.06.1{17} tadit samānamāśāte venantā na pra yuchataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:548: RV_01.025.07.1{17} vedā yo vīnāṃ padamantarikṣeṇa patatām
GV01rv_01_u:550: RV_01.025.08.1{17} veda māso dhṛtavrato dvādaśa prajāvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:554: RV_01.025.10.1{17} ni ṣasāda dhṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsvā
GV01rv_01_u:558: RV_01.025.12.1{18} sa no viśvāhā sukraturādityaḥ supathā karat
GV01rv_01_u:560: RV_01.025.13.1{18} bibhrad drāpiṃ hiraṇyayaṃ varuṇo vasta nirṇijam
GV01rv_01_u:562: RV_01.025.14.1{18} na yaṃ dipsanti dipsavo na druhvāṇo janānām
GV01rv_01_u:564: RV_01.025.15.1{18} uta yo mānuṣeṣvā yaśaścakre asāmyā
GV01rv_01_u:566: RV_01.025.16.1{19} parā me yanti dhītayo gāvo na gavyūtīranu
GV01rv_01_u:568: RV_01.025.17.1{19} saṃ nu vocāvahai punaryato me madhvābhṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:570: RV_01.025.18.1{19} darśaṃ nu viśvadarṣataṃ darśaṃ rathamadhi kṣami
GV01rv_01_u:572: RV_01.025.19.1{19} imaṃ me varuṇa śrudhī havamadyā ca mṛḷaya
GV01rv_01_u:574: RV_01.025.20.1{19} tvaṃ viśvasya medhira divaśca gmaśca rājasi
GV01rv_01_u:576: RV_01.025.21.1{19} uduttamaṃ mumugdhi no vi pāśaṃ madhyamaṃ cṛta
GV01rv_01_u:578: RV_01.026.01.1{20} vasiṣvā hi miyedhya vastrāṇyūrjāṃ pate
GV01rv_01_u:580: RV_01.026.02.1{20} ni no hotā vareṇyaḥ sadā yaviṣṭha manmabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:582: RV_01.026.03.1{20} ā ni ṣmā sūnave pitāpiryajatyāpaye
GV01rv_01_u:584: RV_01.026.04.1{20} ā no barhī riśādaso varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_01_u:586: RV_01.026.05.1{20} pūrvya hotarasya no mandasva sakhyasya ca
GV01rv_01_u:587: RV_01.026.05.2{20} imā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:588: RV_01.026.06.1{21} yaccid dhi śaśvatā tanā devaṃ-devaṃ yajāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:590: RV_01.026.07.1{21} priyo no astu viśpatirhotā mandro vareṇyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:592: RV_01.026.08.1{21} svagnayo hi vāryaṃ devāso dadhire ca naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:598: RV_01.027.01.1{22} aśvaṃ na tvā vāravantaṃ vandadhyā agniṃ namobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:600: RV_01.027.02.1{22} sa ghā naḥ sūnuḥ śavasā pṛthupragāmā suśevaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:602: RV_01.027.03.1{22} sa no dūrāccāsācca ni martyādaghāyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:604: RV_01.027.04.1{22} imamū ṣu tvamasmākaṃ saniṃ gāyatraṃ navyāṃsam
GV01rv_01_u:606: RV_01.027.05.1{22} ā no bhaja parameṣvā vājeṣu madhyameṣu
GV01rv_01_u:608: RV_01.027.06.1{23} vibhaktāsi citrabhāno sindhorūrmā upāka ā
GV01rv_01_u:610: RV_01.027.07.1{23} yamagne pṛtsu martyamavā vājeṣu yaṃ junāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:612: RV_01.027.08.1{23} nakirasya sahantya paryetā kayasya cit
GV01rv_01_u:616: RV_01.027.10.1{23} jarābodha tad viviḍḍhi viśe-viśe yajñiyāya
GV01rv_01_u:618: RV_01.027.11.1{24} sa no mahānanimāno dhūmaketuḥ puruścandraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:620: RV_01.027.12.1{24} sa revāniva viśpatirdaivyaḥ ketuḥ śṛṇotu naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:622: RV_01.027.13.1{24} namo mahadbhyo namo arbhakebhyo namo yuvabhyo nama āśinebhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:623: RV_01.027.13.2{24} yajāma devān yadi śaknavāma mā jyāyasaḥ śaṃsamā vṛkṣi devāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:624: RV_01.028.01.1{25} yatra grāvā pṛthubudhna ūrdhvo bhavati sotave
GV01rv_01_u:630: RV_01.028.04.1{25} yatra manthāṃ vibadhnate raśmīn yamitavā iva
GV01rv_01_u:632: RV_01.028.05.1{25} yaccid dhi tvaṃ gṛhegṛha ulūkhalaka yujyase
GV01rv_01_u:633: RV_01.028.05.2{25} iha dyumattamaṃ vada yajatāmiva dundubhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:634: RV_01.028.06.1{26} uta sma te vanaspate vāto vi vātyagramit
GV01rv_01_u:635: RV_01.028.06.2{26} atho indrāya pātave sunu somamulūkhala
GV01rv_01_u:636: RV_01.028.07.1{26} āyajī vājasātamā tā hyuccā vijarbhṛtaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:638: RV_01.028.08.1{26} tā no adya vanaspatī ṛṣvāv ṛṣvebhiḥ sotṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:640: RV_01.028.09.1{26} ucchiṣṭaṃ camvorbhara somaṃ pavitra ā sṛja
GV01rv_01_u:642: RV_01.029.01.1{27} yaccid dhi satya somapā anāśastā iva smasi
GV01rv_01_u:643: RV_01.029.01.2{27} ā tū na indra śaṃsaya goṣvaśveṣu subhriṣu sahasreṣu tuvīmagha
GV01rv_01_u:644: RV_01.029.02.1{27} śiprin vājānāṃ pate śacīvastava daṃsanā
GV01rv_01_u:648: RV_01.029.04.1{27} sasantu tyā arātayo bodhantu śūra rātayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:650: RV_01.029.05.1{27} samindra gardabhaṃ mṛṇa nuvantaṃ pāpayāmuyā
GV01rv_01_u:652: RV_01.029.06.1{27} patāti kuṇḍṛṇācyā dūraṃ vāto vanādadhi
GV01rv_01_u:654: RV_01.029.07.1{27} sarvaṃ parikrośaṃ jahi jambhayā kṛkadāśvam
GV01rv_01_u:656: RV_01.030.01.1{28} ā va indraṃ kriviṃ yathā vājayantaḥ śatakratum
GV01rv_01_u:658: RV_01.030.02.1{28} śataṃ vā yaḥ śucīnāṃ sahasraṃ vā samāśirām
GV01rv_01_u:660: RV_01.030.03.1{28} saṃ yan madāya śuṣmiṇa enā hyasyodare
GV01rv_01_u:662: RV_01.030.04.1{28} ayamu te samatasi kapota iva garbhadhim
GV01rv_01_u:664: RV_01.030.05.1{28} stotraṃ rādhānāṃ pate girvāho vīra yasya te
GV01rv_01_u:666: RV_01.030.06.1{29} ūrdhvastiṣṭhā na ūtaye 'smin vāje śatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:670: RV_01.030.08.1{29} ā ghā gamad yadi śravat sahasriṇībhirūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:672: RV_01.030.09.1{29} anu pratnasyaukaso huve tuvipratiṃ naram
GV01rv_01_u:673: RV_01.030.09.2{29} yaṃ te pūrvaṃ pitā huve
GV01rv_01_u:674: RV_01.030.10.1{29} taṃ tvā vayaṃ viśvavārā śāsmahe puruhūta
GV01rv_01_u:678: RV_01.030.12.1{30} tathā tadastu somapāḥ sakhe vajrin tathā kṛṇu
GV01rv_01_u:680: RV_01.030.13.1{30} revatīrnaḥ sadhamāda indre santu tuvivājāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:682: RV_01.030.14.1{30} ā gha tvāvān tmanāpta stotṛbhyo dhṛṣṇaviyānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:684: RV_01.030.15.1{30} ā yad duvaḥ śatakratavā kāmaṃ jaritṝṇām
GV01rv_01_u:687: RV_01.030.16.2{31} sa no hiraṇyarathaṃ daṃsanāvān sa naḥ sanitā sanaye sa no 'dāt
GV01rv_01_u:688: RV_01.030.17.1{31} āśvināvaśvāvatyeṣā yataṃ śavīrayā gomad dasrā hiraṇyavat
GV01rv_01_u:689: RV_01.030.18.1{31} samānayojano hi vāṃ ratho dasrāvamartyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:691: RV_01.030.19.1{31} vyaghnyasya mūrdhani cakraṃ rathasya yemathuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:693: RV_01.030.20.1{31} kasta uṣaḥ kadhapriye bhuje marto amartye
GV01rv_01_u:695: RV_01.030.21.1{31} vayaṃ hi te amanmahyāntādā parākāt
GV01rv_01_u:699: RV_01.031.01.1{32} tvamagne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣirdevo devānāmabhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā
GV01rv_01_u:700: RV_01.031.01.2{32} tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso 'jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:701: RV_01.031.02.1{32} tvamagne prathamo aṅgirastamaḥ kavirdevānāṃ pari bhūṣasivratam
GV01rv_01_u:702: RV_01.031.02.2{32} vibhurviśvasmai bhuvanāya medhiro dvimātā śayuḥ katidhā cidāyave
GV01rv_01_u:703: RV_01.031.03.1{32} tvamagne prathamo mātariśvana āvirbhava sukratūyā vivasvate
GV01rv_01_u:705: RV_01.031.04.1{32} tvamagne manave dyāmavāśayaḥ purūravase sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:706: RV_01.031.04.2{32} śvātreṇa yat pitrormucyase paryā tvā pūrvamanayannāparaṃ punaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:707: RV_01.031.05.1{32} tvamagne vṛṣabhaḥ puṣṭivardhana udyatasruce bhavasi śravāyyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:708: RV_01.031.05.2{32} ya āhutiṃ pari vedā vaṣaṭkṛtimekāyuragre viśa āvivāsasi
GV01rv_01_u:709: RV_01.031.06.1{33} tvamagne vṛjinavartaniṃ naraṃ sakman piparṣi vidathe vicarṣaṇe
GV01rv_01_u:710: RV_01.031.06.2{33} yaḥ śūrasātā paritakmye dhane dabhrebhiścit samṛtāhaṃsi bhūyasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:711: RV_01.031.07.1{33} tvaṃ tamagne amṛtatva uttame martaṃ dadhāsi śravase dive dive
GV01rv_01_u:712: RV_01.031.07.2{33} yastātṛṣāṇa ubhayāya janmane mayaḥ kṛṇoṣi prayaā ca sūraye
GV01rv_01_u:713: RV_01.031.08.1{33} tvaṃ no agne sanaye dhanānāṃ yaśasaṃ kāruṃ kṛṇuhi stavānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:714: RV_01.031.08.2{33} ṛdhyāma karmāpasā navena devairdyāvāpṛthivī prāvataṃ naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:715: RV_01.031.09.1{33} tvaṃ no agne pitrorupastha ā devo deveṣvanavadya jāgṛviḥ
GV01rv_01_u:716: RV_01.031.09.2{33} tanūkṛd bodhi pramatiśca kārave tvaṃ kalyāṇa vasu viśvamopiṣe
GV01rv_01_u:717: RV_01.031.10.1{33} tvamagne pramatistvaṃ pitāsi nastvaṃ vayaskṛt tava jāmayo vayam
GV01rv_01_u:718: RV_01.031.10.2{33} saṃ tvā rāyaḥ śatinaḥ saṃ sahasriṇaḥ suvīraṃ yanti vratapāmadābhya
GV01rv_01_u:719: RV_01.031.11.1{34} tvāmagne prathamamāyumāyave devā akṛṇvan nahuṣasya viśpatim
GV01rv_01_u:720: RV_01.031.11.2{34} iḷāmakṛṇvan manuṣasya śāsanīṃ pituryat putro mamakasya jāyate
GV01rv_01_u:721: RV_01.031.12.1{34} tvaṃ no agne tava deva pāyubhirmaghono rakṣa tanvaśca vandya
GV01rv_01_u:722: RV_01.031.12.2{34} trātā tokasya tanaye gavāmasyanimeṣaṃ rakṣamāṇastava vrate
GV01rv_01_u:723: RV_01.031.13.1{34} tvamagne yajyave pāyurantaro 'niṣaṅgāya caturakṣa idhyase
GV01rv_01_u:724: RV_01.031.13.2{34} yo rātahavyo 'vṛkāya dhāyase kīreścin mantraṃ manasāvanoṣi tam
GV01rv_01_u:725: RV_01.031.14.1{34} tvamagna uruśaṃsāya vāghate spārhaṃ yad rekṇaḥ paramaṃ vanoṣi tat
GV01rv_01_u:726: RV_01.031.14.2{34} ādhrasya cit pramatirucyase pitā pra pākaṃśāssi pra diśo viduṣṭaraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:727: RV_01.031.15.1{34} tvamagne prayatadakṣiṇaṃ naraṃ varmeva syūtaṃ pari pāsi viśvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:728: RV_01.031.15.2{34} svādukṣadmā yo vasatau syonakṛjjīvayājaṃ yajate sopamā divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:729: RV_01.031.16.1{35} imāmagne śaraṇiṃ mīmṛṣo na imamadhvānaṃ yamagāma dūrāt
GV01rv_01_u:730: RV_01.031.16.2{35} āpiḥ pitā pramatiḥ somyānāṃ bhṛmirasy ṛṣikṛn martyānām
GV01rv_01_u:731: RV_01.031.17.1{35} manuṣvadagne aṅgirasvadaṅgiro yayātivat sadane pūrvavacchuce
GV01rv_01_u:732: RV_01.031.17.2{35} acha yāhyā vahā daivyaṃ janamā sādaya barhiṣi yakṣi ca priyam
GV01rv_01_u:733: RV_01.031.18.1{35} etenāgne brahmaṇā vāvṛdhasva śaktī vā yat te cakṛmā vidā vā
GV01rv_01_u:734: RV_01.031.18.2{35} uta pra ṇeṣyabhi vasyo asmān saṃ naḥ sṛja sumatyā vājavatyā
GV01rv_01_u:735: RV_01.032.01.1{36} indrasya nu vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yāni cakāra prathamāni vajrī
GV01rv_01_u:736: RV_01.032.01.2{36} ahannahimanvapastatarda pra vakṣaṇā abhinat parvatānām
GV01rv_01_u:737: RV_01.032.02.1{36} ahannahiṃ parvate śiśriyāṇaṃ tvaṣṭāsmai vajraṃ svaryaṃ tatakṣa
GV01rv_01_u:738: RV_01.032.02.2{36} vāśrā iva dhenavaḥ syandamānā añjaḥ samudramava jagmurāpaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:741: RV_01.032.04.1{36} yadindrāhan prathamajāmahīnāmān māyināmamināḥ prota māyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:742: RV_01.032.04.2{36} āt sūryaṃ janayan dyāmuṣāsaṃ tādītnāśatruṃ na kilā vivitse
GV01rv_01_u:743: RV_01.032.05.1{36} ahan vṛtraṃ vṛtrataraṃ vyaṃsamindro vajreṇa mahatā vadhena
GV01rv_01_u:744: RV_01.032.05.2{36} skandhāṃsīva kuliśenā vivṛkṇāhiḥ śayata upapṛk pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:745: RV_01.032.06.1{37} ayoddheva durmada ā hi juhve mahāvīraṃ tuvibādham ṛjīṣam
GV01rv_01_u:746: RV_01.032.06.2{37} nātārīdasya samṛtiṃ vadhānāṃ saṃ rujānāḥ pipiṣaindraśatruḥ
GV01rv_01_u:747: RV_01.032.07.1{37} apādahasto apṛtanyadindramāsya vajramadhi sānau jaghāna
GV01rv_01_u:748: RV_01.032.07.2{37} vṛṣṇo vadhriḥ pratimānaṃ bubhūṣan purutrā vṛtro aśayad vyastaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:749: RV_01.032.08.1{37} nadaṃ na bhinnamamuyā śayānaṃ mano ruhāṇā ati yantyāpaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:750: RV_01.032.08.2{37} yāścid vṛtro mahinā paryatiṣṭhat tāsāmahiḥ patsutaḥśīrbabhūva
GV01rv_01_u:751: RV_01.032.09.1{37} nīcāvayā abhavad vṛtraputrendro asyā ava vadharjabhāra
GV01rv_01_u:752: RV_01.032.09.2{37} uttarā sūradharaḥ putra āsīd dānuḥ śaye sahavatsā na dhenuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:754: RV_01.032.10.2{37} vṛtrasya niṇyaṃ vi carantyāpo dīrghaṃ tama āśayadindraśatruḥ
GV01rv_01_u:755: RV_01.032.11.1{38} dāsapatnīrahigopā atiṣṭhan niruddhā āpaḥ paṇineva gāvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:756: RV_01.032.11.2{38} apāṃ bilamapihitaṃ yadāsīd vṛtraṃ jaghanvānapatad vavāra
GV01rv_01_u:757: RV_01.032.12.1{38} aśvyo vāro abhavastadindra sṛke yat tvā pratyahan deva ekaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:758: RV_01.032.12.2{38} ajayo gā ajayaḥ śūra somamavāsṛjaḥ sartave sapta sindhūn
GV01rv_01_u:759: RV_01.032.13.1{38} nāsmai vidyun na tanyatuḥ siṣedha na yāṃ mihamakirad dhrāduniṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:760: RV_01.032.13.2{38} indraśca yad yuyudhāte ahiścotāparībhyo maghavā vi jigye
GV01rv_01_u:761: RV_01.032.14.1{38} aheryātāraṃ kamapaśya indra hṛdi yat te jaghnuṣo bhīragachat
GV01rv_01_u:762: RV_01.032.14.2{38} nava ca yan navatiṃ ca sravantīḥ śyeno na bhītoataro rajāṃsi
GV01rv_01_u:763: RV_01.032.15.1{38} indro yāto 'vasitasya rājā śamasya ca śṛṅgiṇo vajrabāhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:764: RV_01.032.15.2{38} sedu rājā kṣayati carṣaṇīnāmarān na nemiḥ pari tā babhūva
GV01rv_01_u:765: RV_01.033.01.1{01} etāyāmopa gavyanta indramasmākaṃ su pramatiṃ vāvṛdhāti
GV01rv_01_u:766: RV_01.033.01.2{01} anāmṛṇaḥ kuvidādasya rāyo gavāṃ ketaṃ paramāvarjate naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:767: RV_01.033.02.1{01} upedahaṃ dhanadāmapratītaṃ juṣṭaṃ na śyeno vasatimpatāmi
GV01rv_01_u:768: RV_01.033.02.2{01} indraṃ namasyannupamebhirarkairyaḥ stotṛbhyo havyo asti yāman
GV01rv_01_u:769: RV_01.033.03.1{01} ni sarvasena iṣudhīnrasakta samaryo gā ajati yasya vaṣṭi
GV01rv_01_u:770: RV_01.033.03.2{01} coṣkūyamāṇa indra bhūri vāmaṃ mā paṇirbhūrasmadadhi pravṛddha
GV01rv_01_u:772: RV_01.033.04.2{01} dhanoradhi viṣuṇak te vyāyannayajvanaḥ sanakāḥ pretimīyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:773: RV_01.033.05.1{01} parā cicchīrṣā vavṛjusta indrāyajvāno yajvabhiḥ spardhamānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:774: RV_01.033.05.2{01} pra yad divo hariva sthātarugra niravratānadhamorodasyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:776: RV_01.033.06.2{02} vṛṣāyudho na vadhrayo niraṣṭāḥ pravadbhirindrāccitayanta āyan
GV01rv_01_u:777: RV_01.033.07.1{02} tvametān rudato jakṣataścāyodhayo rajasa indra pāre
GV01rv_01_u:778: RV_01.033.07.2{02} avādaho diva ā dasyumuccā pra sunvataḥ stuvataḥ śaṃsamāvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:779: RV_01.033.08.1{02} cakrāṇāsaḥ parīṇahaṃ pṛthivyā hiraṇyena maṇinā śumbhamānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:780: RV_01.033.08.2{02} na hinvānāsastitirusta indraṃ pari spaśo adadhāt sūryeṇa
GV01rv_01_u:781: RV_01.033.09.1{02} pari yadindra rodasī ubhe abubhojīrmahinā viśvataḥ sīm
GV01rv_01_u:783: RV_01.033.10.1{02} na ye divaḥ pṛthivyā antamāpurna māyābhirdhanadāṃ paryabhūvan
GV01rv_01_u:784: RV_01.033.10.2{02} yujaṃ vajraṃ vṛṣabhaścakra indro nirjyotiṣā tamaso gā adukṣat
GV01rv_01_u:785: RV_01.033.11.1{03} anu svadhāmakṣarannāpo asyāvardhata madhya ā nāvyānām
GV01rv_01_u:786: RV_01.033.11.2{03} sadhrīcīnena manasā tamindra ojiṣṭhena hanmanāhannabhi dyūn
GV01rv_01_u:788: RV_01.033.12.2{03} yāvat taro maghavan yāvadojo vajreṇa śatrumavadhīḥ pṛtanyum
GV01rv_01_u:789: RV_01.033.13.1{03} abhi sidhmo ajigādasya śatrūn vi tigmena vṛṣabheṇa puro 'bhet
GV01rv_01_u:790: RV_01.033.13.2{03} saṃ vajreṇāsṛjad vṛtramindraḥ pra svāṃ matimatiracchāśadānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:791: RV_01.033.14.1{xx} āvaḥ kutsam indra yasmi cākan prāvo yudhyantaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ daśadyum /
GV01rv_01_u:792: RV_01.033.14.2{xx} śaphacyuto reṇur nakṣata dyām uc chvaitreyo nṛṣāhyāya tasthau //
GV01rv_01_u:793: RV_01.033.15.1{xx} āvaḥ śamaṃ vṛṣabhaṃ tugryāsu kṣetrajeṣe maghavañchvitryaṃ gām /
GV01rv_01_u:794: RV_01.033.15.2{xx} jyok cid atra tasthivāṃso akrañchatrūyatām adharā vedanākaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:795: RV_01.034.01.1{xx} triś cin no adyā bhavataṃ navedasā vibhur vāṃ yāma uta rātir aśvinā /
GV01rv_01_u:796: RV_01.034.01.2{xx} yuvor hi yantraṃ himyeva vāsaso 'bhyāyaṃsenyā bhavatam manīṣibhiḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:797: RV_01.034.02.1{xx} trayaḥ pavayo madhuvāhane rathe somasya venām anu viśva id viduḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:798: RV_01.034.02.2{xx} traya skambhāsa skabhitāsa ārabhe trir naktaṃ yāthas trir v aśvinā divā //
GV01rv_01_u:799: RV_01.034.03.1{xx} samāne ahan trir avadyagohanā trir adya yajñam madhunā mimikṣatam /
GV01rv_01_u:800: RV_01.034.03.2{xx} trir vājavatīr iṣo aśvinā yuvaṃ doṣā asmabhyam uṣasaś ca pinvatam //
GV01rv_01_u:801: RV_01.034.04.1{xx} trir vartir yātaṃ trir anuvrate jane triḥ suprāvyetredheva śikṣatam /
GV01rv_01_u:802: RV_01.034.04.2{xx} trir nāndyaṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ triḥ pṛkṣo asme akṣareva pinvatam //
GV01rv_01_u:803: RV_01.034.05.1{xx} trir no rayiṃ vahatam aśvinā yuvaṃ trir devatātā trir utāvataṃ dhiyaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:804: RV_01.034.05.2{xx} triḥ saubhagatvaṃ trir uta śravāṃsi nas triṣṭhaṃ vāṃ sūre duhitā ruhad ratham //
GV01rv_01_u:805: RV_01.034.06.1{xx} trir no aśvinā divyāni bheṣajā triḥ pārthivāni trir u dattam adbhyaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:806: RV_01.034.06.2{xx} omānaṃ śaṃyor mamakāya sūnave tridhātu śarma vahataṃ śubhas patī //
GV01rv_01_u:807: RV_01.034.07.1{xx} trir no aśvinā yajatā dive-dive pari tridhātu pṛthivīm aśāyatam /
GV01rv_01_u:808: RV_01.034.07.2{xx} tisro nāsatyā rathyā parāvata ātmeva vātaḥ svasarāṇi gachatam //
GV01rv_01_u:809: RV_01.034.08.1{xx} trir aśvinā sindhubhiḥ saptamātṛbhis traya āhāvās tredhā haviṣ kṛtam /
GV01rv_01_u:810: RV_01.034.08.2{xx} tisraḥ pṛthivīr upari pravā divo nākaṃ rakṣethe dyubhir aktubhir hitam //
GV01rv_01_u:811: RV_01.034.09.1{xx} kva trī cakrā trivṛto rathasya kva trayo vandhuro ye sanīḷāḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:812: RV_01.034.09.2{xx} kadā yogo vājino rāsabhasya yena yajñaṃ nāsatyopayāthaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:813: RV_01.034.10.1{xx} ā nāsatyā gachataṃ hūyate havir madhvaḥ pibatam madhupebhir āsabhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:814: RV_01.034.10.2{xx} yuvor hi pūrvaṃ savitoṣaso ratham ṛtāya citraṃ ghṛtavantam iṣyati //
GV01rv_01_u:815: RV_01.034.11.1{xx} ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātam madhupeyam aśvinā /
GV01rv_01_u:816: RV_01.034.11.2{xx} prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā //
GV01rv_01_u:817: RV_01.034.12.1{xx} ā no aśvinā trivṛtā rathenārvāñcaṃ rayiṃ vahataṃ suvīram /
GV01rv_01_u:818: RV_01.034.12.2{xx} śṛṇvantā vām avase johavīmi vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
GV01rv_01_u:819: RV_01.035.01.1{xx} hvayāmy agnim prathamaṃ svastaye hvayāmi mitrāvaruṇāv ihāvase /
GV01rv_01_u:820: RV_01.035.01.2{xx} hvayāmi rātrīṃ jagato niveśanīṃ hvayāmi devaṃ savitāram ūtaye //
GV01rv_01_u:821: RV_01.035.02.1{xx} ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtam martyaṃ ca /
GV01rv_01_u:822: RV_01.035.02.2{xx} hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
GV01rv_01_u:823: RV_01.035.03.1{xx} yāti devaḥ pravatā yāty udvatā yāti śubhrābhyāṃ yajato haribhyām /
GV01rv_01_u:824: RV_01.035.03.2{xx} ā devo yāti savitā parāvato 'pa viśvā duritā bādhamānaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:825: RV_01.035.04.1{xx} abhīvṛtaṃ kṛśanair viśvarūpaṃ hiraṇyaśamyaṃ yajato bṛhantam /
GV01rv_01_u:826: RV_01.035.04.2{xx} āsthād rathaṃ savitā citrabhānuḥ kṛṣṇā rajāṃsi taviṣīṃ dadhānaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:827: RV_01.035.05.1{xx} vi janāñchyāvāḥ śitipādo akhyan rathaṃ hiraṇyapraraugaṃ vahantaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:828: RV_01.035.05.2{xx} śaśvad viśaḥ savitur daivyasyopasthe viśvā bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:829: RV_01.035.06.1{xx} tisro dyāvaḥ savitur dvā upasthāṃ ekā yamasya bhuvane virāṣāṭ /
GV01rv_01_u:830: RV_01.035.06.2{xx} āṇiṃ na rathyam amṛtādhi tasthur iha bravītu ya u tac ciketat //
GV01rv_01_u:831: RV_01.035.07.1{xx} vi suparṇo antarikṣāṇy akhyad gabhīravepā asuraḥ sunīthaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:832: RV_01.035.07.2{xx} kvedānīṃ sūryaḥ kaś ciketa katamāṃ dyāṃ raśmir asyā tatāna //
GV01rv_01_u:833: RV_01.035.08.1{xx} aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn /
GV01rv_01_u:834: RV_01.035.08.2{xx} hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
GV01rv_01_u:835: RV_01.035.09.1{xx} hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate /
GV01rv_01_u:836: RV_01.035.09.2{xx} apāmīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti //
GV01rv_01_u:837: RV_01.035.10.1{07} hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḷīkaḥ svavān yātvarvāṃ
GV01rv_01_u:838: RV_01.035.10.2{07} apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānānasthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:839: RV_01.035.11.1{07} ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe
GV01rv_01_u:840: RV_01.035.11.2{07} tebhirno adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva
GV01rv_01_u:841: RV_01.036.01.1{08} pra vo yahvaṃ purūṇāṃ viśāṃ devayatīnām
GV01rv_01_u:842: RV_01.036.01.2{08} agniṃ sūktebhirvacobhirīmahe yaṃ sīmidanya īḷate
GV01rv_01_u:843: RV_01.036.02.1{08} janāso agniṃ dadhire sahovṛdhaṃ haviṣmanto vidhema te
GV01rv_01_u:844: RV_01.036.02.2{08} sa tvaṃ no adya sumanā ihāvitā bhavā vājeṣu santya
GV01rv_01_u:845: RV_01.036.03.1{08} pra tvā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe hotāraṃ viśvavedasam
GV01rv_01_u:846: RV_01.036.03.2{08} mahaste sato vi carantyarcayo divi spṛśanti bhānavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:847: RV_01.036.04.1{08} devāsastvā varuṇo mitro aryamā saṃ dūtaṃ pratnamindhate
GV01rv_01_u:848: RV_01.036.04.2{08} viśvaṃ so agne jayati tvayā dhanaṃ yaste dadāśa martyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:849: RV_01.036.05.1{08} mandro hotā gṛhapatiragne dūto viśāmasi
GV01rv_01_u:850: RV_01.036.05.2{08} tve viśvā saṃgatāni vratā dhruvā yāni devā akṛṇvata
GV01rv_01_u:851: RV_01.036.06.1{09} tve idagne subhage yaviṣṭhya viśvamā hūyate haviḥ
GV01rv_01_u:852: RV_01.036.06.2{09} satvaṃ no adya sumanā utāparaṃ yakṣi devān suvīryā
GV01rv_01_u:853: RV_01.036.07.1{09} taṃ ghemitthā namasvina upa svarājamāsate
GV01rv_01_u:854: RV_01.036.07.2{09} hotrābhiragniṃ manuṣaḥ samindhate titirvāṃso ati sridhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:855: RV_01.036.08.1{09} ghnanto vṛtramataran rodasī apa uru kṣayāya cakrire
GV01rv_01_u:856: RV_01.036.08.2{09} bhuvat kaṇve vṛṣā dyumnyāhutaḥ krandadaśvo gaviṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:857: RV_01.036.09.1{09} saṃ sīdasva mahānasi śocasva devavītamaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:858: RV_01.036.09.2{09} vi dhūmamagne aruṣaṃ miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam
GV01rv_01_u:859: RV_01.036.10.1{09} yaṃ tvā devāso manave dadhuriha yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana
GV01rv_01_u:860: RV_01.036.10.2{09} yaṃ kaṇvo medhyātithirdhanaspṛtaṃ yaṃ vṛṣā yamupastutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:861: RV_01.036.11.1{10} yamagniṃ medhyātithiḥ kaṇva īdha ṛtādadhi
GV01rv_01_u:862: RV_01.036.11.2{10} tasya preṣo dīdiyustamimā ṛcastamagniṃ vardhayāmasi
GV01rv_01_u:863: RV_01.036.12.1{10} rāyas pūrdhi svadhāvo 'sti hi te 'gne deveṣvāpyam
GV01rv_01_u:864: RV_01.036.12.2{10} tvaṃvājasya śrutyasya rājasi sa no mṛḷa mahānasi
GV01rv_01_u:865: RV_01.036.13.1{10} ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā
GV01rv_01_u:867: RV_01.036.14.1{10} ūrdhvo naḥ pāhyaṃhaso ni ketunā viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha
GV01rv_01_u:868: RV_01.036.14.2{10} kṛdhī na ūrdhvāñcarathāya jīvase vidā deveṣu no duvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:869: RV_01.036.15.1{10} pāhi no agne rakṣasaḥ pāhi dhūrterarāvṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:870: RV_01.036.15.2{10} pāhi rīṣata uta vā jighāṃsato bṛhadbhāno yaviṣṭhya
GV01rv_01_u:871: RV_01.036.16.1{11} ghaneva viṣvag vi jahyarāvṇastapurjambha yo asmadhruk
GV01rv_01_u:872: RV_01.036.16.2{11} yo martyaḥ śiśīte atyaktubhirmā naḥ sa ripurīśata
GV01rv_01_u:874: RV_01.036.17.2{11} agniḥ prāvan mitrota medhyātithimagniḥ sātā upastutam
GV01rv_01_u:875: RV_01.036.18.1{11} agninā turvaśaṃ yaduṃ parāvata ugrādevaṃ havāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:876: RV_01.036.18.2{11} agnirnayan navavāstvaṃ bṛhadrathaṃ turvītiṃ dasyave sahaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:877: RV_01.036.19.1{11} ni tvāmagne manurdadhe jyotirjanāya śaśvate
GV01rv_01_u:878: RV_01.036.19.2{11} dīdetha kaṇva ṛtajāta ukṣito yaṃ namasyanti kṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:879: RV_01.036.20.1{11} tveṣāso agneramavanto arcayo bhīmāso na pratītaye
GV01rv_01_u:880: RV_01.036.20.2{11} rakṣasvinaḥ sadamid yātumāvato viśvaṃ samatriṇaṃ daha
GV01rv_01_u:881: RV_01.037.01.1{12} krīḷaṃ vaḥ śardho mārutamanarvāṇaṃ ratheśubham
GV01rv_01_u:885: RV_01.037.03.1{12} iheva śṛṇva eṣāṃ kaśā hasteṣu yad vadān
GV01rv_01_u:887: RV_01.037.04.1{12} pra vaḥ śardhāya ghṛṣvaye tveṣadyumnāya śuṣmiṇe
GV01rv_01_u:889: RV_01.037.05.1{12} pra śaṃsā goṣvaghnyaṃ krīḷaṃ yacchardho mārutam
GV01rv_01_u:891: RV_01.037.06.1{13} ko vo varṣiṣṭha ā naro divaśca gmaśca dhūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:892: RV_01.037.06.2{xx} yat sīm antaṃ na dhūnutha //
GV01rv_01_u:893: RV_01.037.07.1{xx} ni vo yāmāya mānuṣo dadhra ugrāya manyave /
GV01rv_01_u:895: RV_01.037.08.1{xx} yeṣām ajmeṣu pṛthivī jujurvāṃ iva viśpatiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:897: RV_01.037.09.1{xx} sthiraṃ hi jānam eṣāṃ vayo mātur niretave /
GV01rv_01_u:898: RV_01.037.09.2{xx} yat sīm anu dvitā śavaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:899: RV_01.037.10.1{xx} ud u tye sūnavo giraḥ kāṣṭhā ajmeṣv atnata /
GV01rv_01_u:901: RV_01.037.11.1{xx} tyaṃ cid ghā dīrgham pṛthum miho napātam amṛdhram /
GV01rv_01_u:903: RV_01.037.12.1{xx} maruto yad dha vo balaṃ janāṃ acucyavītana /
GV01rv_01_u:905: RV_01.037.13.1{xx} yad dha yānti marutaḥ saṃ ha bruvate 'dhvann ā /
GV01rv_01_u:907: RV_01.037.14.1{xx} pra yāta śībham āśubhiḥ santi kaṇveṣu vo duvaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:909: RV_01.037.15.1{xx} asti hi ṣmā madāya vaḥ smasi ṣmā vayam eṣām /
GV01rv_01_u:911: RV_01.038.01.1{xx} kad dha nūnaṃ kadhapriyaḥ pitā putraṃ na hastayoḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:913: RV_01.038.02.1{xx} kva nūnaṃ kad vo arthaṃ gantā divo na pṛthivyāḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:914: RV_01.038.02.2{xx} kva vo gāvo na raṇyanti //
GV01rv_01_u:915: RV_01.038.03.1{xx} kva vaḥ sumnā navyāṃsi marutaḥ kva suvitā /
GV01rv_01_u:917: RV_01.038.04.1{xx} yad yūyam pṛśnimātaro martāsaḥ syātana /
GV01rv_01_u:919: RV_01.038.05.1{xx} mā vo mṛgo na yavase jaritā bhūd ajoṣyaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:921: RV_01.038.06.1{xx} mo ṣu ṇaḥ parā-parā nirṛtir durhaṇā vadhīt /
GV01rv_01_u:923: RV_01.038.07.1{xx} satyaṃ tveṣā amavanto dhanvañ cid ā rudriyāsaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:925: RV_01.038.08.1{xx} vāśreva vidyun mimāti vatsaṃ na mātā siṣakti /
GV01rv_01_u:927: RV_01.038.09.1{xx} divā cit tamaḥ kṛṇvanti parjanyenodavāhena /
GV01rv_01_u:929: RV_01.038.10.1{xx} adha svanān marutāṃ viśvam ā sadma pārthivam /
GV01rv_01_u:931: RV_01.038.11.1{xx} maruto vīḷupāṇibhiś citrā rodhasvatīr anu /
GV01rv_01_u:933: RV_01.038.12.1{xx} sthirā vaḥ santu nemayo rathā aśvāsa eṣām /
GV01rv_01_u:935: RV_01.038.13.1{xx} achā vadā tanā girā jarāyai brahmaṇas patim /
GV01rv_01_u:937: RV_01.038.14.1{xx} mimīhi ślokam āsyaparjanya iva tatanaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:939: RV_01.038.15.1{xx} vandasva mārutaṃ gaṇaṃ tveṣam panasyum arkiṇam /
GV01rv_01_u:941: RV_01.039.01.1{xx} pra yad itthā parāvataḥ śocir na mānam asyatha /
GV01rv_01_u:942: RV_01.039.01.2{xx} kasya kratvā marutaḥ kasya varpasā kaṃ yātha kaṃ ha dhūtayaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:943: RV_01.039.02.1{xx} sthirā vaḥ santv āyudhā parāṇude vīḷū uta pratiṣkabhe /
GV01rv_01_u:944: RV_01.039.02.2{xx} yuṣmākam astu taviṣī panīyasī mā martyasya māyinaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:945: RV_01.039.03.1{xx} parā ha yat sthiraṃ hatha naro vartayathā guru /
GV01rv_01_u:946: RV_01.039.03.2{xx} vi yāthana vaninaḥ pṛthivyā vy āśāḥ parvatānām //
GV01rv_01_u:947: RV_01.039.04.1{xx} nahi vaḥ śatrur vivide adhi dyavi na bhūmyāṃ riśādasaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:948: RV_01.039.04.2{xx} yuṣmākam astu taviṣī tanā yujā rudrāso nū cid ādhṛṣe //
GV01rv_01_u:949: RV_01.039.05.1{xx} pra vepayanti parvatān vi viñcanti vanaspatīn /
GV01rv_01_u:950: RV_01.039.05.2{xx} pro ārata maruto durmadā iva devāsaḥ sarvayā viśā //
GV01rv_01_u:951: RV_01.039.06.1{xx} upo ratheṣu pṛṣatīr ayugdhvam praṣṭir vahati rohitaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:952: RV_01.039.06.2{xx} ā vo yāmāya pṛthivī cid aśrod abībhayanta mānuṣāḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:953: RV_01.039.07.1{xx} ā vo makṣū tanāya kaṃ rudrā avo vṛṇīmahe /
GV01rv_01_u:954: RV_01.039.07.2{xx} gantā nūnaṃ no 'vasā yathā puretthā kaṇvāya bibhyuṣe //
GV01rv_01_u:955: RV_01.039.08.1{xx} yuṣmeṣito maruto martyeṣita ā yo no abhva īṣate /
GV01rv_01_u:956: RV_01.039.08.2{xx} vi taṃ yuyota śavasā vy ojasā vi yuṣmākābhir ūtibhiḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:957: RV_01.039.09.1{19} asāmi hi prayajyavaḥ kaṇvaṃ dada pracetasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:958: RV_01.039.09.2{19} asāmibhirmaruta ā na ūtibhirgantā vṛṣtiṃ na vidyutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:959: RV_01.039.10.1{19} asāmyojo bibhṛthā sudānavo 'sāmi dhūtayaḥ śavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:960: RV_01.039.10.2{19} ṛṣidviṣe marutaḥ parimanyava iṣuṃ na sṛjata dviṣam
GV01rv_01_u:961: RV_01.040.01.1{20} ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇas pate devayantastvemahe
GV01rv_01_u:962: RV_01.040.01.2{20} upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūrbhavā sacā
GV01rv_01_u:963: RV_01.040.02.1{20} tvāmid dhi sahasas putra martya upabrūte dhane hite
GV01rv_01_u:964: RV_01.040.02.2{20} suvīryaṃ maruta ā svaśvyaṃ dadhīta yo va ācake
GV01rv_01_u:965: RV_01.040.03.1{20} praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devyetu sūnṛtā
GV01rv_01_u:966: RV_01.040.03.2{20} achā vīraṃnaryaṃ paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:967: RV_01.040.04.1{20} yo vāghate dadāti sūnaraṃ vasu sa dhatte akṣiti śravaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:968: RV_01.040.04.2{20} tasmā iḷāṃ suvīrāmā yajāmahe supratūrtimanehasam
GV01rv_01_u:969: RV_01.040.05.1{20} pra nūnaṃ brahmaṇas patirmantraṃ vadatyukthyam
GV01rv_01_u:970: RV_01.040.05.2{20} yasminnindro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okāṃsi cakrire
GV01rv_01_u:971: RV_01.040.06.1{21} tamid vocemā vidatheṣu śambhuvaṃ mantraṃ devā anehasam
GV01rv_01_u:972: RV_01.040.06.2{21} imāṃ ca vācaṃ pratiharyathā naro viśved vāmā vo aśnavat
GV01rv_01_u:974: RV_01.040.07.2{21} pra-pra dāśvān pastyābhirasthitāntarvāvat kṣayaṃ dadhe
GV01rv_01_u:975: RV_01.040.08.1{21} upa kṣstraṃ pṛñcīta hanti rājabhirbhaye cit sukṣitiṃ dadhe
GV01rv_01_u:976: RV_01.040.08.2{21} nāsya vartā na tarutā mahādhane nārbhe asti vajriṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:977: RV_01.041.01.1{22} yaṃ rakṣanti pracetaso varuṇo mitro aryamā
GV01rv_01_u:978: RV_01.041.01.2{22} nū cit sa dabhyate janaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:979: RV_01.041.02.1{22} yaṃ bāhuteva piprati pānti martyaṃ riṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:981: RV_01.041.03.1{22} vi durgā vi dviṣaḥ puro ghnanti rājāna eṣām
GV01rv_01_u:983: RV_01.041.04.1{22} sugaḥ panthā anṛkṣara ādityāsa ṛtaṃ yate
GV01rv_01_u:985: RV_01.041.05.1{22} yaṃ yajñaṃ nayathā nara ādityā ṛjunā pathā
GV01rv_01_u:986: RV_01.041.05.2{22} pra vaḥ sa dhītaye naśat
GV01rv_01_u:987: RV_01.041.06.1{23} sa ratnaṃ martyo vasu viśvaṃ tokamuta tmanā
GV01rv_01_u:989: RV_01.041.07.1{23} kathā rādhāma sakhāyaḥ stomaṃ mitrasyāryamṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:991: RV_01.041.08.1{23} mā vo ghnantaṃ mā śapantaṃ prati voce devayantam
GV01rv_01_u:995: RV_01.042.01.1{24} saṃ pūṣannadhvanastira vyaṃho vimuco napāt
GV01rv_01_u:997: RV_01.042.02.1{24} yo naḥ pūṣannagho vṛko duḥśeva ādideśati
GV01rv_01_u:999: RV_01.042.03.1{24} apa tyaṃ paripanthinaṃ muṣīvāṇaṃ huraścitam
GV01rv_01_u:1001: RV_01.042.04.1{24} tvaṃ tasya dvayāvino 'ghaśaṃsasya kasya cit
GV01rv_01_u:1003: RV_01.042.05.1{24} ā tat te dasra mantumaḥ pūṣannavo vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_01_u:1007: RV_01.042.07.1{25} ati naḥ saścato naya sugā naḥ supathā kṛṇu
GV01rv_01_u:1009: RV_01.042.08.1{25} abhi sūyavasaṃ naya na navajvāro adhvane
GV01rv_01_u:1011: RV_01.042.09.1{25} śagdhi pūrdhi pra yaṃsi ca śiśīhi prāsyudaram
GV01rv_01_u:1013: RV_01.042.10.1{25} na pūṣaṇaṃ methāmasi sūktairabhi gṛṇīmasi
GV01rv_01_u:1015: RV_01.043.01.1{26} kad rudrāya pracetase mīḷhuṣṭamāya tavyase
GV01rv_01_u:1017: RV_01.043.02.1{26} yathā no aditiḥ karat paśve nṛbhyo yathā gave
GV01rv_01_u:1019: RV_01.043.03.1{26} yathā no mitro varuṇo yathā rudraściketati
GV01rv_01_u:1023: RV_01.043.05.1{26} yaḥ śukra iva sūryo hiraṇyamiva rocate
GV01rv_01_u:1025: RV_01.043.06.1{27} śaṃ naḥ karatyarvate sugaṃ meṣāya meṣye
GV01rv_01_u:1027: RV_01.043.07.1{27} asme soma śriyamadhi ni dhehi śatasya nṛṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1029: RV_01.043.08.1{27} mā naḥ somaparibādho mārātayo juhuranta
GV01rv_01_u:1030: RV_01.043.08.2{27} ā na indo vāje bhaja
GV01rv_01_u:1031: RV_01.043.09.1{27} yāste prajā amṛtasya parasmin dhāmannṛtasya
GV01rv_01_u:1032: RV_01.043.09.2{27} mūrdhā nābhā soma vena ābhūṣantīḥ soma vedaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1034: RV_01.044.01.2{28} ā dāśuṣe jātavedo vahā tvamadyā devānuṣarbudhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1035: RV_01.044.02.1{28} juṣṭo hi dūto asi havyavāhano 'gne rathīradhvarāṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1036: RV_01.044.02.2{28} sajūraśvibhyāmuṣasā suvīryamasme dhehi śravo bṛhat
GV01rv_01_u:1037: RV_01.044.03.1{28} adyā dūtaṃ vṛṇīmahe vasumagniṃ purupriyam
GV01rv_01_u:1039: RV_01.044.04.1{28} śreṣṭhaṃ yaviṣṭhamatithiṃ svāhutaṃ juṣṭaṃ janāya dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1042: RV_01.044.05.2{28} agne trātāramamṛtaṃ miyedhya yajiṣṭhaṃ havyavāhana
GV01rv_01_u:1043: RV_01.044.06.1{29} suśaṃso bodhi gṛṇate yaviṣṭhya madhujihvaḥ svāhutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1044: RV_01.044.06.2{29} praskaṇvasya pratirannāyurjīvase namasyā daivyaṃ janam
GV01rv_01_u:1045: RV_01.044.07.1{29} hotāraṃ viśvavedasaṃ saṃ hi tvā viśa indhate
GV01rv_01_u:1046: RV_01.044.07.2{29} sa ā vaha puruhūta pracetaso 'gne devāniha dravat
GV01rv_01_u:1048: RV_01.044.08.2{29} kaṇvāsastvā sutasomāsa indhate havyavāhaṃ svadhvara
GV01rv_01_u:1049: RV_01.044.09.1{29} patir hi adhvarāṇām agne dūto viśām asi
GV01rv_01_u:1050: RV_01.044.09.2{29} uṣarbudha āvaha somapītaye devānadya svardṛśaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1051: RV_01.044.10.1{29} agne pūrvā anūṣaso vibhāvaso dīdetha viśvadarṣataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1052: RV_01.044.10.2{29} asi grāmeṣvavitā purohito 'si yajñeṣu mānuṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1053: RV_01.044.11.1{30} ni tvā yajñasya sādhanamagne hotāram ṛtvijam
GV01rv_01_u:1054: RV_01.044.11.2{30} manuṣvad deva dhīmahi pracetasaṃ jīraṃ dūtamamartyam
GV01rv_01_u:1055: RV_01.044.12.1{30} yad devānāṃ mitramahaḥ purohito 'ntaro yāsi dūtyam
GV01rv_01_u:1058: RV_01.044.13.2{30} ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram
GV01rv_01_u:1059: RV_01.044.14.1{30} śṛṇvantu stomaṃ marutaḥ sudānavo 'gnijihvā ṛtāvṛdhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1060: RV_01.044.14.2{30} pibatu somaṃ varuṇo dhṛtavrato 'śvibhyāmuṣasā sajūḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1062: RV_01.045.01.2{31} yajā svadhvaraṃ janaṃ manujātaṃ ghṛtapruṣam
GV01rv_01_u:1063: RV_01.045.02.1{31} śruṣṭīvāno hi dāśuṣe devā agne vicetasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1066: RV_01.045.03.2{31} aṅgirasvan mahivrata praskaṇvasya śrudhī havam
GV01rv_01_u:1069: RV_01.045.05.1{31} ghṛtāhavana santyemā u ṣu śrudhī giraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1070: RV_01.045.05.2{31} yābhiḥ kaṇvasya sūnavo havante 'vase tvā
GV01rv_01_u:1071: RV_01.045.06.1{32} tvāṃ citraśravastama havante vikṣu jantavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1073: RV_01.045.07.1{32} ni tvā hotāram ṛtvijaṃ dadhire vasuvittamam
GV01rv_01_u:1074: RV_01.045.07.2{32} śrutkarṇaṃ saprathastamaṃ viprā agne diviṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1075: RV_01.045.08.1{32} ā tvā viprā acucyavuḥ sutasomā abhi prayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1076: RV_01.045.08.2{32} bṛhad bhā bibhrato haviragne martāya dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1078: RV_01.045.09.2{32} ihādya daivyaṃjanaṃ barhirā sādayā vaso
GV01rv_01_u:1079: RV_01.045.10.1{32} arvāñcaṃ daivyaṃ janamagne yakṣva sahūtibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1080: RV_01.045.10.2{32} ayaṃ somaḥ sudānavastaṃ pāta tiroahnyam
GV01rv_01_u:1081: RV_01.046.01.1{33} eṣo uṣā apūrvya vyuchati priyā divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1083: RV_01.046.02.1{33} yā dasrā sindhumātarā manotarā rayīṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1085: RV_01.046.03.1{33} vacyante vāṃ kakuhāso jūrṇāyāmadhi viṣṭapi
GV01rv_01_u:1087: RV_01.046.04.1{33} haviṣā jāro apāṃ piparti papurirnarā
GV01rv_01_u:1089: RV_01.046.05.1{33} ādāro vāṃ matīnāṃ nāsatyā matavacasā
GV01rv_01_u:1091: RV_01.046.06.1{34} yā naḥ pīparadaśvinā jyotiṣmatī tamastiraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1093: RV_01.046.07.1{34} ā no nāvā matīnāṃ yātaṃ pārāya gantave
GV01rv_01_u:1095: RV_01.046.08.1{34} aritraṃ vāṃ divas pṛthu tīrthe sindhūnāṃ rathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1097: RV_01.046.09.1{34} divas kaṇvāsa indavo vasu sindhūnāṃ pade
GV01rv_01_u:1099: RV_01.046.10.1{34} abhūdu bhā u aṃśave hiraṇyaṃ prati sūryaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1101: RV_01.046.11.1{35} abhūdu pārametave panthā ṛtaysa sādhuyā
GV01rv_01_u:1105: RV_01.046.13.1{35} vāvasānā vivasvati somasya pītyā girā
GV01rv_01_u:1109: RV_01.046.15.1{35} ubhā pibatamaśvinobhā naḥ śarma yachatam
GV01rv_01_u:1111: RV_01.047.01.1{01} ayaṃ vāṃ madhumattamaḥ sutaḥ soma ṛtāvṛdhā
GV01rv_01_u:1112: RV_01.047.01.2{01} tamaśvinā pibataṃ tiroahnyaṃ dhattaṃ ratnāni dāśuśe
GV01rv_01_u:1113: RV_01.047.02.1{01} trivandhureṇa trivṛtā supeśasā rathenā yātamaśvinā
GV01rv_01_u:1114: RV_01.047.02.2{01} kaṇvāso vāṃ brahma kṛṇvantyadhvare teṣāṃ su śṛṇutaṃ havam
GV01rv_01_u:1115: RV_01.047.03.1{01} aśvinā madhumattamaṃ pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
GV01rv_01_u:1116: RV_01.047.03.2{01} athādya dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe dāśvāṃsamupa gachatam
GV01rv_01_u:1117: RV_01.047.04.1{01} triṣadhasthe barhiṣi viśvavedasā madhvā yajñaṃ mimikṣatam
GV01rv_01_u:1118: RV_01.047.04.2{01} kaṇvāso vāṃ sutasomā abhidyavo yuvāṃ havante aśvinā
GV01rv_01_u:1120: RV_01.047.05.2{01} tābhiḥ ṣvasmānavataṃ śubhas patī pātaṃ somam ṛtāvṛdhā
GV01rv_01_u:1121: RV_01.047.06.1{02} sudāse dasrā vasu bibhratā rathe pṛkṣo vahatamaśvinā
GV01rv_01_u:1122: RV_01.047.06.2{02} rayiṃ samudrāduta vā divas paryasme dhattaṃ puruspṛham
GV01rv_01_u:1123: RV_01.047.07.1{02} yan nāsatyā parāvati yad vā stho adhi turvaśe
GV01rv_01_u:1124: RV_01.047.07.2{02} ato rathena suvṛtā na ā gataṃ sākaṃ sūryasya raśmibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1125: RV_01.047.08.1{02} arvāñcā vāṃ saptayo 'dhvaraśriyo vahantu savanedupa
GV01rv_01_u:1126: RV_01.047.08.2{02} iṣaṃ pṛñcantā sukṛte sudānava ā barhiḥ sīdataṃ narā
GV01rv_01_u:1127: RV_01.047.09.1{02} tena nāsatyā gataṃ rathena sūryatvacā
GV01rv_01_u:1128: RV_01.047.09.2{02} yena śaśvadūhathurdāśuṣe vasu madhvaḥ somasya pītaye
GV01rv_01_u:1129: RV_01.047.10.1{02} ukthebhirarvāgavase purūvasū arkaiśca ni hvayāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:1130: RV_01.047.10.2{02} śaśvat kaṇvānāṃ sadasi priye hi kaṃ somaṃ papathuraśvinā
GV01rv_01_u:1131: RV_01.048.01.1{03} saha vāmena na uṣo vyuchā duhitardivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1132: RV_01.048.01.2{03} saha dyumnena bṛhatā vibhāvari rāyā devi dāsvatī
GV01rv_01_u:1134: RV_01.048.02.2{03} udīraya prati mā sūnṛtā uṣaścoda rādho maghonām
GV01rv_01_u:1135: RV_01.048.03.1{03} uvāsoṣā uchācca nu devī jīrā rathānām
GV01rv_01_u:1136: RV_01.048.03.2{03} ye asyā ācaraṇeṣu dadhrire samudre na śravasyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1137: RV_01.048.04.1{03} uṣo ye te pra yāmeṣu yuñjate mano dānāya sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1138: RV_01.048.04.2{03} atrāha tat kaṇva eṣāṃ kaṇvatamo nāma gṛṇāti nṛṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1139: RV_01.048.05.1{03} ā ghā yoṣeva sūnaryuṣā yāti prabhuñjatī
GV01rv_01_u:1140: RV_01.048.05.2{03} jarayantī vṛjanaṃ padvadīyata ut pātayati pakṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1141: RV_01.048.06.1{04} vi yā sṛjati samanaṃ vyarthinaḥ padāṃ na vetyodatī
GV01rv_01_u:1142: RV_01.048.06.2{04} vayo nakiṣ ṭe paptivāṃsa āsate vyuṣṭau vājinīvati
GV01rv_01_u:1144: RV_01.048.07.2{04} śataṃ rathebhiḥ subhagoṣā iyaṃ vi yātyabhi mānuṣān
GV01rv_01_u:1145: RV_01.048.08.1{04} viśvamasyā nānāma cakṣase jagajjyotiṣ kṛṇoti sūnarī
GV01rv_01_u:1146: RV_01.048.08.2{04} apa dveṣo maghonī duhitā diva uṣā uchadapa sridhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1147: RV_01.048.09.1{04} uṣa ā bhāhi bhānunā candreṇa duhitardivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1148: RV_01.048.09.2{04} āvahantī bhūryasmabhyaṃ saubhagaṃ vyuchantī diviṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1149: RV_01.048.10.1{04} viśvasya hi prāṇanaṃ jīvanaṃ tve vi yaduchasi sūnari
GV01rv_01_u:1150: RV_01.048.10.2{04} sā no rathena bṛhatā vibhāvari śrudhi citrāmaghe havam
GV01rv_01_u:1151: RV_01.048.11.1{05} uṣo vājaṃ hi vaṃsva yaścitro mānuṣe jane
GV01rv_01_u:1152: RV_01.048.11.2{05} tenā vaha sukṛto adhvarānupa ye tvā gṛṇanti vahnayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1154: RV_01.048.12.2{05} sāsmāsu dhā gomadaśvāvadukthyamuṣo vājaṃ suvīryam
GV01rv_01_u:1155: RV_01.048.13.1{05} yasyā ruśanto arcayaḥ prati bhadrā adṛkṣata
GV01rv_01_u:1156: RV_01.048.13.2{05} sā no rayiṃ viśvavāraṃ supeśasamuṣā dadātu sugmyam
GV01rv_01_u:1157: RV_01.048.14.1{05} ye cid dhi tvām ṛṣayaḥ pūrva ūtaye juhūre 'vase mahi
GV01rv_01_u:1158: RV_01.048.14.2{05} sā na stomānabhi gṛṇīhi rādhasoṣaḥ śukreṇa śociṣā
GV01rv_01_u:1159: RV_01.048.15.1{05} uṣo yadadya bhānunā vi dvārāv ṛṇavo divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1160: RV_01.048.15.2{05} pra no yachatādavṛkaṃ pṛthu chardiḥ pra devi gomatīriṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1161: RV_01.048.16.1{05} saṃ no rāyā bṛhatā viśvapeśasā mimikṣvā samiḷābhirā
GV01rv_01_u:1162: RV_01.048.16.2{05} saṃ dyumnena viśvaturoṣo mahi saṃ vājairvājinīvati
GV01rv_01_u:1163: RV_01.049.01.1{06} uṣo bhadrebhirā gahi divaścid rocanādadhi
GV01rv_01_u:1164: RV_01.049.01.2{06} vahantvaruṇapsava upa tvā somino gṛham
GV01rv_01_u:1165: RV_01.049.02.1{06} supeśasaṃ sukhaṃ rathaṃ yamadhyasthā uṣastvam
GV01rv_01_u:1166: RV_01.049.02.2{06} tenā suśravasaṃ janaṃ prāvādya duhitardivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1168: RV_01.049.03.2{06} uṣaḥ prārannṛtūnranu divo antebhyas pari
GV01rv_01_u:1170: RV_01.049.04.2{06} tāṃ tvāmuṣarvasūyavo gīrbhiḥ kaṇvā ahūṣata
GV01rv_01_u:1171: RV_01.050.01.1{07} udu tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1173: RV_01.050.02.1{07} apa tye tāyavo yathā nakṣatrā yantyaktubhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1175: RV_01.050.03.1{07} adṛśramasya ketavo vi raśmayo janānanu
GV01rv_01_u:1179: RV_01.050.05.1{07} pratyaṃ devānāṃ viśaḥ pratyaṅṅ udeṣi mānuṣān
GV01rv_01_u:1181: RV_01.050.06.1{08} yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janānanu
GV01rv_01_u:1183: RV_01.050.07.1{08} vi dyāmeṣi rajas pṛthvahā mimāno aktubhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1185: RV_01.050.08.1{08} sapta tvā harito rathe vahanti deva sūrya
GV01rv_01_u:1187: RV_01.050.09.1{08} ayukta sapta śundhyuvaḥ sūro rathasya naptyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1189: RV_01.050.10.1{08} ud vayaṃ tamasas pari jyotiṣ paśyanta uttaram
GV01rv_01_u:1192: RV_01.050.11.2{08} hṛdrogaṃ mamasūrya harimāṇaṃ ca nāśaya
GV01rv_01_u:1193: RV_01.050.12.1{08} śukeṣu me harimāṇaṃ ropaṇākāsu dadhmasi
GV01rv_01_u:1194: RV_01.050.12.2{08} atho hāridraveṣu me harimāṇaṃ ni dadhmasi
GV01rv_01_u:1196: RV_01.050.13.2{08} dviṣantaṃ mahyaṃ randhayan mo aham dviṣate radham
GV01rv_01_u:1197: RV_01.051.01.1{09} abhi tyaṃ meṣaṃ puruhūtam ṛgmiyamindraṃ gīrbhirmadatā vasvo arṇavam
GV01rv_01_u:1198: RV_01.051.01.2{09} yasya dyāvo na vicaranti mānuṣā bhuje maṃhiṣṭhamabhi vipramarcata
GV01rv_01_u:1200: RV_01.051.02.2{09} indraṃ dakṣāsa ṛbhavo madacyutaṃ śatakratuṃ javanī sūnṛtāruhat
GV01rv_01_u:1202: RV_01.051.03.2{09} sasena cid vimadāyāvaho vasvājāvadriṃ vāvasānasyanartayan
GV01rv_01_u:1203: RV_01.051.04.1{09} tvamapāmapidhānāvṛṇor apādhārayaḥ parvate dānumad vasu
GV01rv_01_u:1204: RV_01.051.04.2{09} vṛtraṃ yadindra śavasāvadhīrahimādit sūryaṃ divyārohayo dṛśe
GV01rv_01_u:1205: RV_01.051.05.1{09} tvaṃ māyābhirapa māyino 'dhamaḥ svadhābhirye adhi śuptāvajuhvata
GV01rv_01_u:1206: RV_01.051.05.2{09} tvaṃ piprornṛmaṇaḥ prārujaḥ puraḥ pra ṛjiśvānaṃ dasyuhatyeṣvāvitha
GV01rv_01_u:1208: RV_01.051.06.2{10} mahāntaṃ cidarbudaṃ ni kramīḥ padā sanādeva dasyuhatyāya jajñiṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1209: RV_01.051.07.1{10} tve viśvā taviṣī sadhryag ghitā tava rādhaḥ somapīthāya harṣate
GV01rv_01_u:1210: RV_01.051.07.2{10} tava vajraścikite bāhvorhito vṛścā śatrorava viśvāni vṛṣṇyā
GV01rv_01_u:1211: RV_01.051.08.1{10} vi jānīhyāryān ye ca dasyavo barhiṣmate randhayā śāsadavratān
GV01rv_01_u:1212: RV_01.051.08.2{10} śākī bhava yajamānasya coditā viśvet tā te sadhamādeṣu cākana
GV01rv_01_u:1214: RV_01.051.09.2{10} vṛddhasya cid vardhato dyāminakṣata stavāno vamro vi jaghāna sandihaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1215: RV_01.051.10.1{10} takṣad yat ta uśanā sahasā saho vi rodasī majmanā bādhate śavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1216: RV_01.051.10.2{10} ā tvā vātasya nṛmaṇo manoyuja ā pūryamāṇamavahannabhi śravaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1217: RV_01.051.11.1{11} mandiṣṭa yaduśane kāvye sacānindro vaṅkū vaṅkutarādhi tiṣṭhati
GV01rv_01_u:1218: RV_01.051.11.2{11} ugro yayiṃ nirapaḥ srotasāsṛjad vi śuṣṇasya dṛṃhitā airayat puraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1219: RV_01.051.12.1{11} ā smā rathaṃ vṛṣapāṇeṣu tiṣṭhasi śāryātasya prabhṛtāyeṣu mandase
GV01rv_01_u:1220: RV_01.051.12.2{11} indra yathā sutasomeṣu cākano 'narvāṇaṃślokamā rohase divi
GV01rv_01_u:1221: RV_01.051.13.1{11} adadā arbhāṃ mahate vacasyave kakṣīvate vṛcayāmindra sunvate
GV01rv_01_u:1222: RV_01.051.13.2{11} menābhavo vṛṣaṇaśvasya sukrato viśvet tā te savaneṣu pravācyā
GV01rv_01_u:1223: RV_01.051.14.1{11} indro aśrāyi sudhyo nireke pajreṣu stomo duryo na yūpaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1224: RV_01.051.14.2{11} aśvayurgavyū rathayurvasūyurindra id rāyaḥ kṣayati prayantā
GV01rv_01_u:1225: RV_01.051.15.1{11} idaṃ namo vṛṣabhāya svarāje satyaśuṣmāya tavase 'vāci
GV01rv_01_u:1226: RV_01.051.15.2{11} asminnindra vṛjane sarvavīrāḥ smat sūribhistava śarman syāma
GV01rv_01_u:1227: RV_01.052.01.1{12} tyaṃ su meṣaṃ mahayā svarvidaṃ śataṃ yasya subhvaḥ sākamīrate
GV01rv_01_u:1228: RV_01.052.01.2{12} atyaṃ na vājaṃ havanasyadaṃ rathamendraṃ vavṛtyāmavase suvṛktibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1229: RV_01.052.02.1{12} sa parvato na dharuṇeṣvacyutaḥ sahasramūtistaviṣīṣu vāvṛdhe
GV01rv_01_u:1230: RV_01.052.02.2{12} indro yad vṛtramavadhīn nadīvṛtamubjannarṇāṃsijarhṛṣāṇo andhasā
GV01rv_01_u:1231: RV_01.052.03.1{12} sa hi dvaro dvariṣu vavra ūdhani candrabudhno madavṛddho manīṣibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1232: RV_01.052.03.2{12} indraṃ tamahve svapasyayā dhiyā maṃhiṣṭharātiṃ sa hi paprirandhasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1233: RV_01.052.04.1{12} ā yaṃ pṛṇanti divi sadmabarhiṣaḥ samudraṃ na subhvaḥ svā abhiṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1234: RV_01.052.04.2{12} taṃ vṛtrahatye anu tasthurūtayaḥ śuṣmāindramavātā ahrutapsavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1235: RV_01.052.05.1{12} abhi svavṛṣṭiṃ made asya yudhyato raghvīriva pravaṇe sasrurūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1236: RV_01.052.05.2{12} indro yad vajrī dhṛṣamāṇo andhasā bhinad valasya paridhīnriva tritaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1237: RV_01.052.06.1{13} parīṃ ghṛṇā carati titviṣe śavo 'po vṛtvī rajaso budhnamāśayat
GV01rv_01_u:1238: RV_01.052.06.2{13} vṛtrasya yat pravaṇe durgṛbhiśvano nijaghantha hanvorindra tanyatum
GV01rv_01_u:1239: RV_01.052.07.1{13} hradaṃ na hi tvā nyṛṣantyūrmayo brahmāṇīndra tava yāni vardhanā
GV01rv_01_u:1240: RV_01.052.07.2{13} tvaṣṭā cit te yujyaṃ vāvṛdhe śavastatakṣa vajramabhibhūtyojasam
GV01rv_01_u:1241: RV_01.052.08.1{13} jaghanvānu haribhiḥ sambhṛtakratavindra vṛtraṃ manuṣe gātuyannapaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1242: RV_01.052.08.2{13} ayachathā bāhvorvajramāyasamadhārayo divyā sūryaṃ dṛśe
GV01rv_01_u:1243: RV_01.052.09.1{13} bṛhat svaścandramamavad yadukthyamakṛṇvata bhiyasā rohaṇaṃ divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1244: RV_01.052.09.2{13} yan mānuṣapradhanā indramūtayaḥ svarnṛṣāco maruto 'madannanu
GV01rv_01_u:1245: RV_01.052.10.1{13} dyauścidasyāmavānaheḥ svanādayoyavīd bhiyasā vajra indra te
GV01rv_01_u:1246: RV_01.052.10.2{13} vṛtrasya yad badbadhānasya rodasī made sutasya śavasābhinacchiraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1247: RV_01.052.11.1{14} yadin nvindra pṛthivī daśabhujirahāni viśvā tatanantakṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1248: RV_01.052.11.2{14} atrāha te maghavan viśrutaṃ saho dyāmanu śavasā barhaṇā bhuvat
GV01rv_01_u:1249: RV_01.052.12.1{14} tvamasya pāre rajaso vyomanaḥ svabhūtyojā avase dhṛṣanmanaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1250: RV_01.052.12.2{14} cakṛṣe bhūmiṃ pratimānamojaso 'paḥ svaḥ paribhūreṣyā divam
GV01rv_01_u:1251: RV_01.052.13.1{14} tvaṃ bhuvaḥ pratimānaṃ pṛthivyā ṛṣvavīrasya bṛhataḥ patirbhūḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1252: RV_01.052.13.2{14} viśvamāprā antarikṣaṃ mahitvā satyamaddhā nakiranyastvāvān
GV01rv_01_u:1253: RV_01.052.14.1{14} na yasya dyāvāpṛthivī anu vyaco na sindhavo rajaso antamānaśuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1254: RV_01.052.14.2{14} nota svavṛṣṭiṃ made asya yudhyata eko anyaccakṛṣe viśvamānuṣak
GV01rv_01_u:1255: RV_01.052.15.1{14} ārcannatra marutaḥ sasminnājau viśve devāso amadannanutvā
GV01rv_01_u:1256: RV_01.052.15.2{14} vṛtrasya yad bhṛṣṭimatā vadhena ni tvamindra pratyānaṃ jaghantha
GV01rv_01_u:1257: RV_01.053.01.1{15} nyū ṣu vācaṃ pra mahe bharāmahe gira indrāya sadane vivasvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1258: RV_01.053.01.2{15} nū cid dhi ratnaṃ sasatāmivāvidan na duṣṭutirdraviṇodeṣu śasyate
GV01rv_01_u:1259: RV_01.053.02.1{15} duro aśvasya dura indra gorasi duro yavasya vasuna inas patiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1260: RV_01.053.02.2{15} śikṣānaraḥ pradivo akāmakarśanaḥ sakhā sakhibhyastamidaṃ gṛṇīmasi
GV01rv_01_u:1261: RV_01.053.03.1{15} śacīva indra purukṛd dyumattama tavedidamabhitaścekite vasu
GV01rv_01_u:1262: RV_01.053.03.2{15} ataḥ saṃgṛbhyābhibhūta ā bhara mā tvāyato jarituḥ kāmamūnayīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1263: RV_01.053.04.1{15} ebhirdyubhiḥ sumanā ebhirindubhirnirundhāno amatiṃ gobhiraśvinā
GV01rv_01_u:1264: RV_01.053.04.2{15} indreṇa dasyuṃ darayanta indubhiryutadveṣasaḥsamiṣā rabhemahi
GV01rv_01_u:1265: RV_01.053.05.1{15} samindra rāyā samiṣā rabhemahi saṃ vājebhiḥ puruścandrairabhidyubhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1266: RV_01.053.05.2{15} saṃ devyā pramatyā vīraśuṣmayā goagrayāśvāvatyā rabhemahi
GV01rv_01_u:1267: RV_01.053.06.1{16} te tvā madā amadan tāni vṛṣṇyā te somāso vṛtrahatyeṣu satpate
GV01rv_01_u:1268: RV_01.053.06.2{16} yat kārave daśa vṛtrāṇyaprati barhiṣmate ni sahasrāṇi barhayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1269: RV_01.053.07.1{16} yudhā yudhamupa ghedeṣi dhṛṣṇuyā purā puraṃ samidaṃ haṃsyojasā
GV01rv_01_u:1270: RV_01.053.07.2{16} namyā yadindra sakhyā parāvati nibarhayo namuciṃ nāma māyinam
GV01rv_01_u:1272: RV_01.053.08.2{16} tvaṃ śatā vaṅgṛdasyābhinat puro 'nānudaḥ pariṣūtā ṛjiśvanā
GV01rv_01_u:1274: RV_01.053.09.2{16} ṣaṣṭiṃ sahasrā navatiṃ nava śruto ni cakreṇa rathyā duṣpadāvṛṇak
GV01rv_01_u:1275: RV_01.053.10.1{16} tvamāvitha suśravasaṃ tavotibhistava trāmabhirindra tūrvayāṇam
GV01rv_01_u:1276: RV_01.053.10.2{16} tvamasmai kutsamatithigvamāyuṃ mahe rājñe yūne arandhanāyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1277: RV_01.053.11.1{16} ya udṛcīndra devagopāḥ sakhāyaste śivatamā asāma
GV01rv_01_u:1278: RV_01.053.11.2{16} tvāṃ stoṣāma tvayā suvīrā drāghīya āyuḥ prataraṃ dadhānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1279: RV_01.054.01.1{17} mā no asmin maghavan pṛtsvaṃhasi nahi te antaḥ śavasaḥ parīṇaśe
GV01rv_01_u:1280: RV_01.054.01.2{17} akrandayo nadyo roruvad vanā kathā na kṣoṇīrbhiyasā samārata
GV01rv_01_u:1281: RV_01.054.02.1{17} arcā śakrāya śākine śacīvate śṛṇvantamindraṃ mahayannabhi ṣṭuhi
GV01rv_01_u:1282: RV_01.054.02.2{17} yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā rodasī ubhe vṛṣā vṛṣatvā vṛṣabho nyṛñjate
GV01rv_01_u:1283: RV_01.054.03.1{17} arcā dive bṛhate śūṣyaṃ vacaḥ svakṣatraṃ yasya dhṛṣato dhṛṣan manaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1284: RV_01.054.03.2{17} bṛhacchravā asuro barhaṇā kṛtaḥ puro haribhyāṃ vṛṣabho ratho hi ṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1285: RV_01.054.04.1{17} tvaṃ divo bṛhataḥ sānu kopayo 'va tmanā dhṛṣatā śambaraṃ bhinat
GV01rv_01_u:1286: RV_01.054.04.2{17} yan māyino vrandino mandinā dhṛṣacchitāṃ gabhastimaśaniṃ pṛtanyasi
GV01rv_01_u:1287: RV_01.054.05.1{17} ni yad vṛṇakṣi śvasanasya mūrdhani śuṣṇasya cid vrandinororuvad vanā
GV01rv_01_u:1288: RV_01.054.05.2{17} prācīnena manasā barhaṇāvatā yadadyā cit kṛṇavaḥ kastvā pari
GV01rv_01_u:1289: RV_01.054.06.1{18} tvamāvitha naryaṃ turvaśaṃ yaduṃ tvaṃ turvītiṃ vayyaṃśatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:1290: RV_01.054.06.2{18} tvaṃ rathametaśaṃ kṛtvye dhane tvaṃ puro navatiṃ dambhayo nava
GV01rv_01_u:1291: RV_01.054.07.1{18} sa ghā rājā satpatiḥ śūśuvajjano rātahavyaḥ prati yaḥ śāsaminvati
GV01rv_01_u:1292: RV_01.054.07.2{18} ukthā vā yo abhigṛṇāti rādhasā dānurasmā uparā pinvate divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1293: RV_01.054.08.1{18} asamaṃ kṣatramasamā manīṣā pra somapā apasā santu neme
GV01rv_01_u:1294: RV_01.054.08.2{18} ye ta indra daduṣo vardhayanti mahi kṣatraṃ sthaviraṃ vṛṣṇyaṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:1296: RV_01.054.09.2{18} vyaśnuhi tarpayā kāmameṣāmathā mano vasudeyāya kṛṣva
GV01rv_01_u:1298: RV_01.054.10.2{18} abhīmindro nadyo vavriṇā hitā viśvā anuṣṭhāḥ pravaṇeṣu jighnate
GV01rv_01_u:1299: RV_01.054.11.1{18} sa śevṛdhamadhi dhā dyumnamasme mahi kṣatraṃ janāṣāḷindra tavyam
GV01rv_01_u:1300: RV_01.054.11.2{18} rakṣā ca no maghonaḥ pāhi sūrīn rāye ca naḥ svapatyā iṣe dhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1301: RV_01.055.01.1{19} divaścidasya varimā vi papratha indraṃ na mahnā pṛthivīcana prati
GV01rv_01_u:1302: RV_01.055.01.2{19} bhīmastuviṣmāñcarṣaṇibhya ātapaḥ śiśīte vajraṃ tejase na vaṃsagaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1303: RV_01.055.02.1{19} so arṇavo na nadyaḥ samudriyaḥ prati gṛbhṇāti viśritā varīmabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1304: RV_01.055.02.2{19} indraḥ somasya pītaye vṛṣāyate sanāt sa yudhma ojasā panasyate
GV01rv_01_u:1305: RV_01.055.03.1{19} tvaṃ tamindra parvataṃ na bhojase maho nṛmṇasya dharmaṇāmirajyasi
GV01rv_01_u:1306: RV_01.055.03.2{19} pra vīryeṇa devatāti cekite viśvasmā ugraḥ karmaṇe purohitaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1307: RV_01.055.04.1{19} sa id vane namasyubhirvacasyate cāru janeṣu prabruvāṇa indriyam
GV01rv_01_u:1308: RV_01.055.04.2{19} vṛṣā chandurbhavati haryato vṛṣā kṣemeṇa dhenāmmaghavā yadinvati
GV01rv_01_u:1309: RV_01.055.05.1{19} sa in mahāni samithāni majmanā kṛṇoti yudhma ojasā janebhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1310: RV_01.055.05.2{19} adhā cana śrad dadhati tviṣīmata indrāya vajraṃ nighanighnate vadham
GV01rv_01_u:1311: RV_01.055.06.1{20} sa hi śravasyuḥ sadanāni kṛtrimā kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasāvināśayan
GV01rv_01_u:1312: RV_01.055.06.2{20} jyotīṃṣi kṛṇvannavṛkāṇi yajyave 'va sukratuḥ sartavā apaḥ sṛjat
GV01rv_01_u:1313: RV_01.055.07.1{20} dānāya manaḥ somapāvannastu te 'rvāñcā harī vandanaśrudā kṛdhi
GV01rv_01_u:1314: RV_01.055.07.2{20} yamiṣṭhāsaḥ sārathayo ya indra te na tvā ketāā dabhnuvanti bhūrṇayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1315: RV_01.055.08.1{20} aprakṣitaṃ vasu bibharṣi hastayoraṣāḷhaṃ sahastanvi śruto dadhe
GV01rv_01_u:1316: RV_01.055.08.2{20} āvṛtāso 'vatāso na kartṛbhistanūṣu te kratavaindra bhūrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1317: RV_01.056.01.1{21} eṣa pra pūrvīrava tasya camriṣo 'tyo na yoṣāmudayaṃsta bhurvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1318: RV_01.056.01.2{21} dakṣaṃ mahe pāyayate hiraṇyayaṃ rathamāvṛtyā hariyogam ṛbhvasam
GV01rv_01_u:1319: RV_01.056.02.1{21} taṃ gūrtayo nemanniṣaḥ parīṇasaḥ samudraṃ na saṃcaraṇe saniṣyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1320: RV_01.056.02.2{21} patiṃ dakṣasya vidathasya nū saho giriṃ na venā adhi roha tejasā
GV01rv_01_u:1321: RV_01.056.03.1{21} sa turvaṇirmahānareṇu pauṃsye girerbhṛṣṭirna bhrājate tujā śavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1322: RV_01.056.03.2{21} yena śuṣṇaṃ māyinamāyaso made dudhraābhūṣu rāmayan ni dāmani
GV01rv_01_u:1323: RV_01.056.04.1{21} devī yadi taviṣī tvāvṛdhotaya indraṃ siṣaktyuṣasaṃ na sūryaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1324: RV_01.056.04.2{21} yo dhṛṣṇunā śavasā bādhate tama iyarti reṇuṃ bṛhadarhariṣvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1325: RV_01.056.05.1{21} vi yat tiro dharuṇamacyutaṃ rajo 'tiṣṭhipo diva ātāsubarhaṇā
GV01rv_01_u:1326: RV_01.056.05.2{21} svarmīḷhe yan mada indra harṣyāhan vṛtraṃ nirapāmaubjo arṇavam
GV01rv_01_u:1327: RV_01.056.06.1{21} tvaṃ divo dharuṇaṃ dhiṣa ojasā pṛthivyā indra sadaneṣu māhinaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1328: RV_01.056.06.2{21} tvaṃ sutasya made ariṇā apo vi vṛtrasya samayā pāṣyārujaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1329: RV_01.057.01.1{22} pra maṃhiṣṭhāya bṛhate bṛhadraye satyaśuṣmāya tavase matiṃ bhare
GV01rv_01_u:1330: RV_01.057.01.2{22} apāmiva pravaṇe yasya durdharaṃ rādho viśvāyuśavase apāvṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:1331: RV_01.057.02.1{22} adha te viśvamanu hāsadiṣṭaya āpo nimneva savanā haviṣmataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1332: RV_01.057.02.2{22} yat parvate na samaśīta haryata indrasya vajraḥ śnathitā hiraṇyayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1333: RV_01.057.03.1{22} asmai bhīmāya namasā samadhvara uṣo na śubhra ā bharāpanīyase
GV01rv_01_u:1334: RV_01.057.03.2{22} yasya dhāma śravase nāmendriyaṃ jyotirakāriharito nāyase
GV01rv_01_u:1335: RV_01.057.04.1{22} ime ta indra te vayaṃ puruṣṭuta ye tvārabhya carāmasi prabhūvaso
GV01rv_01_u:1336: RV_01.057.04.2{22} nahi tvadanyo girvaṇo giraḥ saghat kṣoṇīriva prati no harya tad vacaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1337: RV_01.057.05.1{22} bhūri ta indra vīryaṃ tava smasyasya stoturmaghavan kāmamā pṛṇa
GV01rv_01_u:1338: RV_01.057.05.2{22} anu te dyaurbṛhatī vīryaṃ mama iyaṃ ca te pṛthivī nema ojase
GV01rv_01_u:1339: RV_01.057.06.1{22} tvaṃ tamindra parvataṃ mahāmuruṃ vajreṇa vajrin parvaśaścakartitha
GV01rv_01_u:1340: RV_01.057.06.2{22} avāsṛjo nivṛtāḥ sartavā apaḥ satrā viśvaṃ dadhiṣe kevalaṃ sahaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1341: RV_01.058.01.1{23} nū cit sahojā amṛto ni tundate hotā yad dūto abhavad vivasvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1342: RV_01.058.01.2{23} vi sādhiṣṭhebhiḥ pathibhī rajo mama ā devatātāhaviṣā vivāsati
GV01rv_01_u:1343: RV_01.058.02.1{23} ā svamadma yuvamāno ajarastṛṣvaviṣyannataseṣu tiṣṭhati
GV01rv_01_u:1344: RV_01.058.02.2{23} atyo na pṛṣṭhaṃ pruṣitasya rocate divo na sānu stanayannacikradat
GV01rv_01_u:1345: RV_01.058.03.1{23} krāṇā rudrebhirvasubhiḥ purohito hotā niṣatto rayiṣāḷamartyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1346: RV_01.058.03.2{23} ratho na vikṣv ṛñjasāna āyuṣu vyānuṣag vāryā deva ṛṇvati
GV01rv_01_u:1347: RV_01.058.04.1{23} vi vātajūto ataseṣu tiṣṭhate vṛthā juhūbhiḥ sṛṇyā tuviṣvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1348: RV_01.058.04.2{23} tṛṣu yadagne vanino vṛṣāyase kṛṣṇaṃ ta ema ruśadūrme ajara
GV01rv_01_u:1349: RV_01.058.05.1{23} tapurjambho vana ā vātacodito yūthe na sāhvānava vāti vaṃsagaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1350: RV_01.058.05.2{23} abhivrajannakṣitaṃ pājasā rajaḥ sthātuścarathaṃ bhayate patatriṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1351: RV_01.058.06.1{24} dadhuṣ ṭvā bhṛgavo mānuṣeṣvā rayiṃ na cāruṃ suhavaṃ janebhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1352: RV_01.058.06.2{24} hotāramagne atithiṃ vareṇyaṃ mitraṃ na śevaṃ divyāya janmane
GV01rv_01_u:1353: RV_01.058.07.1{24} hotāraṃ sapta juhvo yajiṣṭhaṃ yaṃ vāghato vṛṇate adhvareṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1354: RV_01.058.07.2{24} agniṃ viśveṣāmaratiṃ vasūnāṃ saparyāmi prayasā yāmi ratnam
GV01rv_01_u:1355: RV_01.058.08.1{24} achidrā sūno sahaso no adya stotṛbhyo mitramahaḥ śarma yacha
GV01rv_01_u:1356: RV_01.058.08.2{24} agne gṛṇantamaṃhasa uruṣyorjo napāt pūrbhirāyasībhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1357: RV_01.058.09.1{24} bhavā varūthaṃ gṛṇate vibhāvo bhavā maghavan maghavadbhyaḥśarma
GV01rv_01_u:1358: RV_01.058.09.2{24} uruṣyāgne aṃhaso gṛṇantaṃ prātarmakṣū dhiyāvasurjagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1359: RV_01.059.01.1{25} vayā idagne agnayaste anye tve viśve amṛtā mādayante
GV01rv_01_u:1360: RV_01.059.01.2{25} vaiśvānara nābhirasi kṣitīnāṃ sthūṇeva janānupamid yayantha
GV01rv_01_u:1361: RV_01.059.02.1{25} mūrdhā divo nābhiragniḥ pṛthivyā athābhavadaratī rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1362: RV_01.059.02.2{25} taṃ tvā devāso 'janayanta devaṃ vaiśvānara jyotiridāryāya
GV01rv_01_u:1363: RV_01.059.03.1{25} ā sūrye na raśmayo dhruvāso vaiśvānare dadhire 'gnā vasūni
GV01rv_01_u:1364: RV_01.059.03.2{25} yā parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu yā mānuṣeṣvasi tasya rājā
GV01rv_01_u:1365: RV_01.059.04.1{25} bṛhatī iva sūnave rodasī giro hotā manuṣyo na dakṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1366: RV_01.059.04.2{25} svarvate satyaśuṣmāya pūrvīrvaiśvānarāya nṛtamāya yahvīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1367: RV_01.059.05.1{25} divaścit te bṛhato jātavedo vaiśvānara pra ririce mahitvam
GV01rv_01_u:1368: RV_01.059.05.2{25} rājā kṛṣṭīnāmasi mānuṣīṇāṃ yudhā devebhyo varivaścakartha
GV01rv_01_u:1369: RV_01.059.06.1{25} pra nū mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasya vocaṃ yaṃ pūravo vṛtrahaṇaṃ sacante
GV01rv_01_u:1370: RV_01.059.06.2{25} vaiśvānaro dasyumagnirjaghanvānadhūnot kāṣṭhā ava śambaraṃ bhet
GV01rv_01_u:1371: RV_01.059.07.1{25} vaiśvānaro mahimnā viśvakṛṣṭirbharadvājeṣu yajato vibhāvā
GV01rv_01_u:1372: RV_01.059.07.2{25} śātavaneye śatinībhiragniḥ puruṇīthe jarate sūnṛtāvān
GV01rv_01_u:1373: RV_01.060.01.1{26} vahniṃ yaśasaṃ vidathasya ketuṃ suprāvyaṃ dūtaṃ sadyoartham
GV01rv_01_u:1374: RV_01.060.01.2{26} dvijanmānaṃ rayimiva praśastaṃ rātiṃ bharad bhṛgavemātariśvā
GV01rv_01_u:1375: RV_01.060.02.1{26} asya śāsurubhayāsaḥ sacante haviṣmanta uśijo ye ca martāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1376: RV_01.060.02.2{26} divaścit pūrvo nyasādi hotāpṛchyo viśpatirvikṣuvedhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1377: RV_01.060.03.1{26} taṃ navyasī hṛda ā jāyamānamasmat sukīrtirmadhujihvamaśyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1378: RV_01.060.03.2{26} yam ṛtvijo vṛjane mānuṣāsaḥ prayasvanta āyavo jījananta
GV01rv_01_u:1379: RV_01.060.04.1{26} uśik pāvako vasurmānuṣeṣu vareṇyo hotādhāyi vikṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1380: RV_01.060.04.2{26} damūnā gṛhapatirdama ā agnirbhuvad rayipatī rayīṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1381: RV_01.060.05.1{26} taṃ tvā vayaṃ patimagne rayīṇāṃ pra śaṃsāmo matibhirgotamāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1382: RV_01.060.05.2{26} āśuṃ na vājambharaṃ marjayantaḥ prātarmakṣū dhiyāvasurjagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1383: RV_01.061.01.1{27} asmā idu pra tavase turāya prayo na harmi stomaṃ māhināya
GV01rv_01_u:1385: RV_01.061.02.1{27} asmā idu praya iva pra yaṃsi bharāmyāṅgūṣaṃ bādhe suvṛkti
GV01rv_01_u:1386: RV_01.061.02.2{27} indrāya hṛdā manasā manīṣā pratnāya patye dhiyomarjayanta
GV01rv_01_u:1387: RV_01.061.03.1{27} asmā idu tyamupamaṃ svarṣāṃ bharāmyāṅgūṣamāsyena
GV01rv_01_u:1389: RV_01.061.04.1{27} asmā idu stomaṃ saṃ hinomi rathaṃ na taṣṭeva tatsināya
GV01rv_01_u:1390: RV_01.061.04.2{27} giraśca girvāhase suvṛktīndrāya viśvaminvaṃ medhirāya
GV01rv_01_u:1391: RV_01.061.05.1{27} asmā idu saptimiva śravasyendrāyārkaṃ juhvā samañje
GV01rv_01_u:1392: RV_01.061.05.2{27} vīraṃ dānaukasaṃ vandadhyai purāṃ gūrtaśravasaṃ darmāṇam
GV01rv_01_u:1393: RV_01.061.06.1{28} asmā idu tvaṣṭā takṣad vajraṃ svapastamaṃ svaryaṃ raṇāya
GV01rv_01_u:1394: RV_01.061.06.2{28} vṛtrasya cid vidad yena marma tujannīśānastujatā kiyedhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1395: RV_01.061.07.1{28} asyedu mātuḥ savaneṣu sadyo mahaḥ pituṃ papivāñcārvannā
GV01rv_01_u:1396: RV_01.061.07.2{28} muṣāyad viṣṇuḥ pacataṃ sahīyān vidhyad varāhantiro adrimastā
GV01rv_01_u:1397: RV_01.061.08.1{28} asmā idu gnāścid devapatnīrindrāyārkamahihatya ūvuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1398: RV_01.061.08.2{28} pari dyāvāpṛthivī jabhra urvī nāsya te mahimānaṃ pariṣṭaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1399: RV_01.061.09.1{28} asyedeva pra ririce mahitvaṃ divas pṛthivyāḥ paryantarikṣāt
GV01rv_01_u:1400: RV_01.061.09.2{28} svarāḷ indro dama ā viśvagūrtaḥ svariramatro vavakṣe raṇāya
GV01rv_01_u:1401: RV_01.061.10.1{28} asyedeva śavasā śuṣantaṃ vi vṛścad vajreṇa vṛtramindraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1402: RV_01.061.10.2{28} gā na vrāṇā avanīramuñcadabhi śravo dāvane sacetāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1403: RV_01.061.11.1{29} asyedu tveṣasā ranta sindhavaḥ pari yad vajreṇa sīmayachat
GV01rv_01_u:1404: RV_01.061.11.2{29} īśānakṛd dāśuṣe daśasyan turvītaye gādhaṃ turvaṇiḥ kaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1405: RV_01.061.12.1{29} asmā idu pra bharā tūtujāno vṛtrāya vajramīśānaḥ kiyedhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1406: RV_01.061.12.2{29} gorna parva vi radā tiraśceṣyannarṇāṃsyapāṃ caradhyai
GV01rv_01_u:1407: RV_01.061.13.1{29} asyedu pra brūhi pūrvyāṇi turasya karmāṇi navya ukthaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1408: RV_01.061.13.2{29} yudhe yadiṣṇāna āyudhāny ṛghāyamāṇo niriṇāti śatrūn
GV01rv_01_u:1409: RV_01.061.14.1{29} asyedu bhiyā girayaśca dṛḷhā dyāvā ca bhūmā januṣastujete
GV01rv_01_u:1410: RV_01.061.14.2{29} upo venasya joguvāna oṇiṃ sadyo bhuvad vīryāya nodhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1411: RV_01.061.15.1{29} asmā idu tyadanu dāyyeṣāmeko yad vavne bhūrerīśānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1412: RV_01.061.15.2{29} praitaśaṃ sūrye paspṛdhānaṃ sauvaśvye suṣvimāvadindraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1413: RV_01.061.16.1{29} evā te hāriyojanā suvṛktīndra brahmāṇi gotamāso akran
GV01rv_01_u:1414: RV_01.061.16.2{29} aiṣu viśvapeśasaṃ dhiyaṃ dhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1415: RV_01.062.01.1{01} pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣamāṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat
GV01rv_01_u:1416: RV_01.062.01.2{01} suvṛktibhiḥ stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya
GV01rv_01_u:1417: RV_01.062.02.1{01} pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvamāṅgūṣyaṃ śavasānāya sāma
GV01rv_01_u:1418: RV_01.062.02.2{01} yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan
GV01rv_01_u:1419: RV_01.062.03.1{01} indrasyāṅgirasāṃ ceṣṭau vidat saramā tanayāya dhāsim
GV01rv_01_u:1420: RV_01.062.03.2{01} bṛhaspatirbhinadadriṃ vidad gāḥ samusriyābhirvāvaśanta naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1421: RV_01.062.04.1{01} sa suṣṭubhā sa stubhā sapta vipraiḥ svareṇādriṃ svaryo navagvaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1422: RV_01.062.04.2{01} saraṇyubhiḥ phaligamindra śakra valaṃ raveṇadarayo daśagvaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1423: RV_01.062.05.1{01} gṛṇāno aṅgirobhirdasma vi varuṣasā sūryeṇa gobhirandhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1424: RV_01.062.05.2{01} vi bhūmyā aprathaya indra sānu divo raja uparamastabhāyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1425: RV_01.062.06.1{02} tadu prayakṣatamamasya karma dasmasya cārutamamasti daṃsaḥ
