GV01rv_01_u:1426: RV_01.062.06.2{02} upahvare yaduparā apinvan madhvarṇaso nadyaścatasraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1427: RV_01.062.07.1{02} dvitā vi vavre sanajā sanīḷe ayāsya stavamānebhirarkaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1428: RV_01.062.07.2{02} bhago na mene parame vyomannadhārayad rodasī sudaṃsāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1429: RV_01.062.08.1{02} sanād divaṃ pari bhūmā virūpe punarbhuvā yuvatī svebhirevaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1431: RV_01.062.09.1{02} sanemi sakhyaṃ svapasyamānaḥ sūnurdādhāra śavasā sudaṃsāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1432: RV_01.062.09.2{02} āmāsu cid dadhiṣe pakvamantaḥ payaḥ kṛṣṇāsu ruśad rohiṇīṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1433: RV_01.062.10.1{02} sanāt sanīlā avanīravātā vratā rakṣante amṛtāḥ sahobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1434: RV_01.062.10.2{02} purū sahasrā janayo na patnīrduvasyanti svasāro ahrayāṇam
GV01rv_01_u:1435: RV_01.062.11.1{03} sanāyuvo namasā navyo arkairvasūyavo matayo dasma dadruḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1436: RV_01.062.11.2{03} patiṃ na patnīruśatīruśantaṃ spṛśanti tvā śavasāvanmanīṣāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1437: RV_01.062.12.1{03} sanādeva tava rāyo gabhastau na kṣīyante nopa dasyanti dasma
GV01rv_01_u:1438: RV_01.062.12.2{03} dyumānasi kratumānindra dhīraḥ śikṣā śacīvastava naḥ śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1439: RV_01.062.13.1{03} sanāyate gotama indra navyamatakṣad brahma hariyojanāya
GV01rv_01_u:1440: RV_01.062.13.2{03} sunīthāya naḥ śavasāna nodhāḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1441: RV_01.063.01.1{04} tvaṃ mahānindra yo ha śuṣmairdyāvā jajñānaḥ pṛthivīame dhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1442: RV_01.063.01.2{04} yad dha te viśvā girayaścidabhvā bhiyā dṛḷhāsaḥ kiraṇā naijan
GV01rv_01_u:1443: RV_01.063.02.1{04} ā yad dharī indra vivratā verā te vajraṃ jaritā bāhvordhāt
GV01rv_01_u:1444: RV_01.063.02.2{04} yenāviharyatakrato amitrān pura iṣṇāsi puruhūta pūrvīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1445: RV_01.063.03.1{04} tvaṃ satya indra dhṛṣṇuretān tvam ṛbhukṣā naryastvaṃṣāṭ
GV01rv_01_u:1446: RV_01.063.03.2{04} tvaṃ śuṣṇaṃ vṛjane pṛkṣa āṇau yūne kutsāyadyumate sacāhan
GV01rv_01_u:1447: RV_01.063.04.1{04} tvaṃ ha tyadindra codīḥ sakhā vṛtraṃ yad vajrin vṛṣakarmannubhnāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1448: RV_01.063.04.2{04} yad dha śūra vṛṣamaṇaḥ parācairvi dasyūnryonāvakṛto vṛthāṣāṭ
GV01rv_01_u:1449: RV_01.063.05.1{04} tvaṃ ha tyadindrāriṣaṇyan dṛḷhasya cin martānāmajuṣṭau
GV01rv_01_u:1450: RV_01.063.05.2{04} vyasmadā kāṣṭhā arvate varghaneva vajriñchnathihyamitrān
GV01rv_01_u:1451: RV_01.063.06.1{05} tvāṃ ha tyadindrārṇasātau svarmīḷhe nara ājā havante
GV01rv_01_u:1452: RV_01.063.06.2{05} tava svadhāva iyamā samarya ūtirvājeṣvatasāyyā bhūt
GV01rv_01_u:1453: RV_01.063.07.1{05} tvaṃ ha tyadindra sapta yudhyan puro vajrin purukutsāya dardaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1454: RV_01.063.07.2{05} barhirna yat sudāse vṛthā vargaṃho rājan varivaḥ pūrave kaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1455: RV_01.063.08.1{05} tvaṃ tyāṃ na indra deva citrāmiṣamāpo na pīpayaḥ parijman
GV01rv_01_u:1456: RV_01.063.08.2{05} yayā śūra pratyasmabhyaṃ yaṃsi tmanamūrjaṃ na viśvadha kṣaradhyai
GV01rv_01_u:1457: RV_01.063.09.1{05} akāri ta indra gotamebhirbrahmāṇyoktā namasā haribhyām
GV01rv_01_u:1458: RV_01.063.09.2{05} supeśasaṃ vājamā bharā naḥ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1459: RV_01.064.01.1{06} vṛṣṇe śardhāya sumakhāya vedhase nodhaḥ suvṛktiṃ pra bharā marudbhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1460: RV_01.064.01.2{06} apo na dhīro manasā suhastyo giraḥ samañje vidatheṣvābhuvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1461: RV_01.064.02.1{06} te jajñire diva ṛṣvāsa ukṣaṇo rudrasya maryā asurā arepasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1462: RV_01.064.02.2{06} pāvakāsaḥ śucayaḥ sūryā iva satvāno na drapsinoghoravarpasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1463: RV_01.064.03.1{06} yuvāno rudrā ajarā abhogghano vavakṣuradhrigāvaḥ parvatā iva
GV01rv_01_u:1464: RV_01.064.03.2{06} dṛḷhā cid viśvā bhuvanāni pārthivā pra cyāvayantidivyāni majmanā
GV01rv_01_u:1465: RV_01.064.04.1{06} citrairañjibhirvapuṣe vyañjate vakṣassu rukmānadhi yetire śubhe
GV01rv_01_u:1466: RV_01.064.04.2{06} aṃseṣveṣāṃ ni mimṛkṣur ṛṣṭayaḥ sākaṃ jajñire svadhayā divo naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1467: RV_01.064.05.1{06} īśānakṛto dhunayo riśādaso vātān vidyutastaviṣībhirakrata
GV01rv_01_u:1468: RV_01.064.05.2{06} duhantyūdhardivyāni dhūtayo bhūmiṃ pinvanti payasāparijrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1469: RV_01.064.06.1{07} pinvantyapo marutaḥ sudānavaḥ payo ghṛtavad vidatheṣvābhuvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1470: RV_01.064.06.2{07} atyaṃ na mihe vi nayanti vājinamutsaṃ duhanti stanayantamakṣitam
GV01rv_01_u:1471: RV_01.064.07.1{07} mahiṣāso māyinaścitrabhānavo girayo na svatavaso raghuṣyadaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1472: RV_01.064.07.2{07} mṛgā iva hastinaḥ khādathā vanā yadāruṇīṣu taviṣīrayugdhvam
GV01rv_01_u:1473: RV_01.064.08.1{07} siṃhā iva nānadati pracetasaḥ piśā iva supiśo viśvavedasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1474: RV_01.064.08.2{07} kṣapo jinvantaḥ pṛṣatībhir ṛṣṭibhiḥ samit sabādhaḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1475: RV_01.064.09.1{07} rodasī ā vadatā gaṇaśriyo nṛṣācaḥ śūrāḥ śavasāhimanyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1476: RV_01.064.09.2{07} ā vandhureṣvamatirna darśatā vidyun na tasthau maruto ratheṣu vaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1478: RV_01.064.10.2{07} astāra iṣuṃ dadhire gabhastyoranantaśuṣmā vṛṣakhādayo naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1479: RV_01.064.11.1{08} hiraṇyayebhiḥ pavibhiḥ payovṛdha ujjighnanta āpathyo na parvatān
GV01rv_01_u:1480: RV_01.064.11.2{08} makhā ayāsaḥ svasṛto dhruvacyuto dudhrakṛto maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1481: RV_01.064.12.1{08} ghṛṣuṃ pāvakaṃ vaninaṃ vicarṣaṇiṃ rudrasya sūnuṃ havasā gṛṇīmasi
GV01rv_01_u:1482: RV_01.064.12.2{08} rajasturaṃ tavasaṃ mārutaṃ gaṇam ṛjīṣiṇaṃvṛṣaṇaṃ saścata śriye
GV01rv_01_u:1483: RV_01.064.13.1{08} pra nū sa martaḥ śavasā janānati tasthau va ūtī maruto yamāvata
GV01rv_01_u:1484: RV_01.064.13.2{08} arvadbhirvajaṃ bharate dhanā nṛbhirāpṛchyaṃkratumā kṣeti puṣyati
GV01rv_01_u:1485: RV_01.064.14.1{08} carkṛtyaṃ marutaḥ pṛtsu duṣṭaraṃ dyumantaṃ śuṣmaṃ maghavatsu dhattana
GV01rv_01_u:1486: RV_01.064.14.2{08} dhanaspṛtamukthyaṃ viśvacarṣaṇiṃ tokaṃ puṣyema tanayaṃ śataṃ himaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1487: RV_01.064.15.1{08} nū ṣṭhiraṃ maruto vīravantam ṛtīṣāhaṃ rayimasmāsu dhatta
GV01rv_01_u:1488: RV_01.064.15.2{08} sahasriṇaṃ śatinaṃ śūśuvāṃsaṃ prātar makṣū dhiyāvasur jagamyāt
GV01rv_01_u:1489: RV_01.065.01.1{09} paśvā na tāyuṃ guhā catantaṃ namo yujānaṃ namo vahantam
GV01rv_01_u:1490: RV_01.065.01.2{09} sajoṣā dhīrāḥ padairanu gmannupa tvā sīdan viśveyajatrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1491: RV_01.065.02.1{09} ṛtasya devā anu vratā gurbhuvat pariṣṭirdyaurna bhūma
GV01rv_01_u:1492: RV_01.065.02.2{09} vardhantīmāpaḥ panvā suśiśvim ṛtasya yonā garbhe sujātam
GV01rv_01_u:1493: RV_01.065.03.1{09} puṣṭirna raṇvā kṣitirna pṛthivī girirna bhujma kṣodo na śambhu
GV01rv_01_u:1494: RV_01.065.03.2{09} atyo nājman sargaprataktaḥ sindhurna kṣodaḥ ka īṃ varāte
GV01rv_01_u:1495: RV_01.065.04.1{09} jāmiḥ sindhūnāṃ bhrāteva svasrāmibhyān na rājā vanānyatti
GV01rv_01_u:1496: RV_01.065.04.2{09} yad vātajūto vanā vyasthādagnirha dāti romā pṛthivyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1497: RV_01.065.05.1{09} śvasityapsu haṃso na sīdan kratvā cetiṣṭho viśāmuṣarbhut
GV01rv_01_u:1498: RV_01.065.05.2{09} somo na vedhā ṛtaprajātaḥ paśurna śiśvā vibhurdūrebhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1499: RV_01.066.01.1{10} rayirna citrā sūro na sandṛgāyurna prāṇo nityo nasūnuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1500: RV_01.066.01.2{10} takvā na bhūrṇirvanā siṣakti payo na dhenuḥ śucirvibhāvā
GV01rv_01_u:1501: RV_01.066.02.1{10} dādhāra kṣemamoko na raṇvo yavo na pakvo jetā janānām
GV01rv_01_u:1502: RV_01.066.02.2{10} ṛṣirna stubhvā vikṣu praśasto vājī na prīto vayodadhati
GV01rv_01_u:1503: RV_01.066.03.1{10} durokaśociḥ kraturna nityo jāyeva yonāvaraṃ viśvasmai
GV01rv_01_u:1504: RV_01.066.03.2{10} citro yadabhrāṭ chveto na vikṣu ratho na rukmī tveṣaḥ samatsu
GV01rv_01_u:1505: RV_01.066.04.1{10} seneva sṛṣṭāmaṃ dadhātyasturna didyut tveṣapratīkā
GV01rv_01_u:1506: RV_01.066.04.2{10} yamo ha jāto yamo janitvaṃ jāraḥ kanīnāṃ patirjanīnām
GV01rv_01_u:1507: RV_01.066.05.1{10} taṃ vaścarāthā vayaṃ vasatyāstaṃ na gāvo nakṣanta iddham
GV01rv_01_u:1508: RV_01.066.05.2{10} sindhurna kṣodaḥ pra nīcīrainon navanta gāvaḥ svardṛśīke
GV01rv_01_u:1509: RV_01.067.01.1{11} vaneṣu jāyurmarteṣu mitro vṛṇīte śruṣṭiṃ rājevājuryam
GV01rv_01_u:1510: RV_01.067.01.2{11} kṣemo na sādhuḥ kraturna bhadro bhuvat svādhirhotā havyavāṭ
GV01rv_01_u:1511: RV_01.067.02.1{11} haste dadhāno nṛmṇā viśvānyame devān dhād guhā niṣīdan
GV01rv_01_u:1512: RV_01.067.02.2{11} vidantīmatra naro dhiyandhā hṛdā yat taṣṭān mantrānaśaṃsan
GV01rv_01_u:1513: RV_01.067.03.1{11} ajo na kṣāṃ dādhāra pṛthivīṃ tastambha dyāṃ mantrebhiḥ satyaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1514: RV_01.067.03.2{11} priyā padāni paśvo ni pāhi viśvāyuragne guhā guhaṃ gāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1515: RV_01.067.04.1{11} ya īṃ ciketa guhā bhavantamā yaḥ sasāda dhārām ṛtasya
GV01rv_01_u:1516: RV_01.067.04.2{11} vi ye cṛtanty ṛtā sapanta ādid vasūni pra vavācāsmai
GV01rv_01_u:1517: RV_01.067.05.1{11} vi yo vīrutsu rodhan mahitvota prajā uta prasūṣvantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1518: RV_01.067.05.2{11} cittirapāṃ dame viśvāyuḥ sadmeva dhīrāḥ sammāya cakruḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1519: RV_01.068.01.1{12} śrīṇannupa sthād divaṃ bhuraṇyu sthātuścarathamaktūnvyūrṇot
GV01rv_01_u:1520: RV_01.068.01.2{12} pari yadeṣāmeko viśveṣāṃ bhuvad devo devānāṃ mahitvā
GV01rv_01_u:1521: RV_01.068.02.1{12} ādit te viśve kratuṃ juṣanta śuṣkād yad deva jīvo janiṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1522: RV_01.068.02.2{12} bhajanta viśve devatvaṃ nāma ṛtaṃ sapanto amṛtamevaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1523: RV_01.068.03.1{12} ṛtasya preṣā ṛtasya dhītirviśvāyurviśve apāṃsi cakruḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1524: RV_01.068.03.2{12} yastubhyaṃ dāśād yo vā te śikṣāt tasmai cikitvānrayiṃ dayasva
GV01rv_01_u:1525: RV_01.068.04.1{12} hotā niṣatto manorapatye sa cin nvāsāṃ patī rayīṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1526: RV_01.068.04.2{12} ichanta reto mithastanūṣu saṃ jānata svairdakṣairamūrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1527: RV_01.068.05.1{12} piturna putrāḥ kratuṃ juṣanta śroṣan ye asya śāsaṃ turāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1528: RV_01.068.05.2{12} vi rāya aurṇod duraḥ purukṣuḥ pipeśa nākaṃ stṛbhirdamūnāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1529: RV_01.069.01.1{13} śukraḥ śuśukvānuṣo na jāraḥ paprā samīcī divo najyotiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1530: RV_01.069.01.2{13} pari prajātaḥ kratvā babhūtha bhuvo devānāṃ pitā putraḥ san
GV01rv_01_u:1531: RV_01.069.02.1{13} vedhā adṛpto agnirvijānannūdharna gonāṃ svādmā pitūnām
GV01rv_01_u:1532: RV_01.069.02.2{13} jane na śeva āhūryaḥ san madhye niṣatto raṇvo duroṇe
GV01rv_01_u:1533: RV_01.069.03.1{13} putro na jāto raṇvo duroṇe vājī na prīto viśo vi tārīt
GV01rv_01_u:1534: RV_01.069.03.2{13} viśo yadahve nṛbhiḥ sanīḷā agnirdevatvā viśvānyaśyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1535: RV_01.069.04.1{13} nakiṣ ṭa etā vratā minanti nṛbhyo yadebhyaḥ śruṣṭiṃ cakartha
GV01rv_01_u:1536: RV_01.069.04.2{13} tat tu te daṃso yadahan samānairnṛbhiryad yukto vive rapāṃsi
GV01rv_01_u:1537: RV_01.069.05.1{13} uṣo na jāro vibhāvosraḥ saṃjñātarūpaściketadasmai
GV01rv_01_u:1538: RV_01.069.05.2{13} tmanā vahanto duro vy ṛṇvan navanta viśve svardṛśīke
GV01rv_01_u:1539: RV_01.070.01.1{14} vanema pūrvīraryo manīṣā agniḥ suśoko viśvānyaśyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1540: RV_01.070.01.2{14} ā daivyāni vratā cikitvānā mānuṣasya janasya janma
GV01rv_01_u:1541: RV_01.070.02.1{14} garbho yo apāṃ garbho vanānāṃ garbhaśca sthātāṃ garbhaścarathām
GV01rv_01_u:1542: RV_01.070.02.2{14} adrau cidasmā antarduroṇe viśāṃ na viśvo amṛtaḥ svādhīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1543: RV_01.070.03.1{14} sa hi kṣapāvānagnī rayīṇāṃ dāśad yo asmā araṃ sūktaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1544: RV_01.070.03.2{14} etā cikitvo bhūmā ni pāhi devānāṃ janma martāṃśca vidvān
GV01rv_01_u:1545: RV_01.070.04.1{14} vardhān yaṃ pūrvīḥ kṣapo virūpā sthātuśca ratham ṛtapravītam
GV01rv_01_u:1546: RV_01.070.04.2{14} arādhi hotā svarniṣattaḥ kṛṇvan viśvānyapāṃsi satyā
GV01rv_01_u:1547: RV_01.070.05.1{14} goṣu praśastiṃ vaneṣu dhiṣe bharanta viśve baliṃ svarṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1548: RV_01.070.05.2{14} vi tvā naraḥ purutrā saparyan piturna jivrervi vedobharanta
GV01rv_01_u:1549: RV_01.070.06.1{14} sādhurna gṛdhnurasteva śūro yāteva bhīmastveṣaḥ samatsu
GV01rv_01_u:1550: RV_01.071.01.1{15} upa pra jinvannuśatīruśantaṃ patiṃ na nityaṃ janayaḥ sanīḷāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1552: RV_01.071.02.1{15} vīḷu cid dṛḷhā pitaro na ukthairadriṃ rujannaṅgiraso raveṇa
GV01rv_01_u:1553: RV_01.071.02.2{15} cakrurdivo bṛhato gātumasme ahaḥ svarvividuḥ ketumusrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1554: RV_01.071.03.1{15} dadhannṛtaṃ dhanayannasya dhītimādidaryo didhiṣvo vibhṛtrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1555: RV_01.071.03.2{15} atṛṣyantīrapaso yantyachā devāñ janma prayasā vardhayantīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1556: RV_01.071.04.1{15} mathīd yadīṃ vibhṛto mātariśvā gṛhe-gṛhe śyeto jenyo bhūt
GV01rv_01_u:1557: RV_01.071.04.2{15} ādīṃ rājñe na sahīyase sacā sannā dūtyaṃ bhṛgavāṇo vivāya
GV01rv_01_u:1558: RV_01.071.05.1{15} mahe yat pitra īṃ rasaṃ dive karava tsarat pṛśanyaścikitvān
GV01rv_01_u:1559: RV_01.071.05.2{15} sṛjadastā dhṛṣatā didyumasmai svāyāṃ devo duhitari tviṣiṃ dhāt
GV01rv_01_u:1560: RV_01.071.06.1{16} sva ā yastubhyaṃ dama ā vibhāti namo vā dāśāduśato anu dyūn
GV01rv_01_u:1561: RV_01.071.06.2{16} vardho agne vayo asya dvibarhā yāsad rāyā sarathaṃ yaṃ junāsi
GV01rv_01_u:1562: RV_01.071.07.1{16} agniṃ viśvā abhi pṛkṣaḥ sacante samudraṃ na sravataḥ sapta yahvīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1563: RV_01.071.07.2{16} na jāmibhirvi cikite vayo no vidā deveṣu pramatiṃ cikitvān
GV01rv_01_u:1564: RV_01.071.08.1{16} ā yadiṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ chuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaurabhīke
GV01rv_01_u:1565: RV_01.071.08.2{16} agniḥ śardhamanavadyaṃ yuvānaṃ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayacca
GV01rv_01_u:1566: RV_01.071.09.1{16} mano na yo 'dhvanaḥ sadya etyekaḥ satrā sūro vasva īśe
GV01rv_01_u:1567: RV_01.071.09.2{16} rājānā mitrāvaruṇā supāṇī goṣu priyamamṛtaṃ rakṣamāṇā
GV01rv_01_u:1568: RV_01.071.10.1{16} mā no agne sakhyā pitryāṇi pra marṣiṣṭhā abhi viduṣ kaviḥ san
GV01rv_01_u:1569: RV_01.071.10.2{16} nabho na rūpaṃ jarimā mināti purā tasyā abhiśasteradhīhi
GV01rv_01_u:1570: RV_01.072.01.1{17} ni kāvyā vedhasaḥ śaśvatas karhaste dadhāno naryā purūṇi
GV01rv_01_u:1571: RV_01.072.01.2{17} agnirbhuvad rayipatī rayīṇāṃ satrā cakrāṇo amṛtāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:1572: RV_01.072.02.1{17} asme vatsaṃ pari ṣantaṃ na vindannichanto viśve amṛtā amūrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1573: RV_01.072.02.2{17} śramayuvaḥ padavyo dhiyandhāstasthuḥ pade paramecārvagneḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1574: RV_01.072.03.1{17} tisro yadagne śaradastvāmicchuciṃ ghṛtena śucayaḥ saparyān
GV01rv_01_u:1575: RV_01.072.03.2{17} nāmāni cid dadhire yajñiyānyasūdayanta tanvaḥ sujātāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1576: RV_01.072.04.1{17} ā rodasī bṛhatī vevidānāḥ pra rudriyā jabhrire yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1577: RV_01.072.04.2{17} vidan marto nemadhitā cikitvānagniṃ pade parame tasthivāṃsam
GV01rv_01_u:1578: RV_01.072.05.1{17} saṃjānānā upa sīdannabhijñu patnīvanto namasyaṃ namasyan
GV01rv_01_u:1579: RV_01.072.05.2{17} ririkvāṃsastanvaḥ kṛṇvata svāḥ sakhā sakhyurnimiṣirakṣamāṇāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1580: RV_01.072.06.1{18} triḥ sapta yad guhyāni tve it padāvidan nihitā yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1581: RV_01.072.06.2{18} tebhī rakṣante amṛtaṃ sajoṣāḥ paśūñca sthātṝñcarathaṃ ca pāhi
GV01rv_01_u:1582: RV_01.072.07.1{18} vidvānagne vayunāni kṣitīnāṃ vyānuṣak churudho jīvasedhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1583: RV_01.072.07.2{18} antarvidvānadhvano devayānānatandro dūto abhavo havirvāṭ
GV01rv_01_u:1584: RV_01.072.08.1{18} svādhyo diva ā sapta yahvī rāyo duro vy ṛtajñā ajānan
GV01rv_01_u:1585: RV_01.072.08.2{18} vidad gavyaṃ saramā dṛḷhamūrvaṃ yenā nu kaṃ mānuṣībhojate viṭ
GV01rv_01_u:1586: RV_01.072.09.1{18} ā ye viśvā svapatyāni tasthuḥ kṛṇvānāso amṛtatvāya gātum
GV01rv_01_u:1587: RV_01.072.09.2{18} mahnā mahadbhiḥ pṛthivī vi tasthe mātā putrairaditirdhāyase veḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1588: RV_01.072.10.1{18} adhi sriyaṃ ni dadhuścārumasmin divo yadakṣī amṛtā akṛṇvan
GV01rv_01_u:1589: RV_01.072.10.2{18} adha kṣaranti sindhavo na sṛṣṭāḥ pra nī cīragnearuṣīrajānan
GV01rv_01_u:1590: RV_01.073.01.1{19} rayirna yaḥ pitṛvitto vayodhāḥ supraṇītiścikituṣo naśāsuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1591: RV_01.073.01.2{19} syonāśīratithirna prīṇāno hoteva sadma vidhato vi tārīt
GV01rv_01_u:1592: RV_01.073.02.1{19} devo na yaḥ savitā satyamanmā kratvā nipāti vṛjanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:1593: RV_01.073.02.2{19} purupraśasto amatirna satya ātmeva śevo didhiṣāyyo bhūt
GV01rv_01_u:1594: RV_01.073.03.1{19} devo na yaḥ pṛthivīṃ viśvadhāyā upakṣeti hitamitro na rājā
GV01rv_01_u:1595: RV_01.073.03.2{19} puraḥsadaḥ śarmasado na vīrā anavadyā patijuṣṭeva nārī
GV01rv_01_u:1596: RV_01.073.04.1{19} taṃ tvā naro dama ā nityamiddhamagne sacanta kṣitiṣu dhruvāsu
GV01rv_01_u:1597: RV_01.073.04.2{19} adhi dyumnaṃ ni dadhurbhūryasmin bhavā viśvāyurdharuṇo rayīṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1598: RV_01.073.05.1{19} vi pṛkṣo agne maghavāno aśyurvi sūrayo dadato viśvamāyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1599: RV_01.073.05.2{19} sanema vājaṃ samitheṣvaryo bhāgaṃ deveṣu śravasedadhānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1600: RV_01.073.06.1{20} ṛtasya hi dhenavo vāvaśānāḥ smadūdhnīḥ pīpayanta dyubhaktāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1601: RV_01.073.06.2{20} parāvataḥ sumatiṃ bhikṣamāṇā vi sindhavaḥ samayā sasruradrim
GV01rv_01_u:1602: RV_01.073.07.1{20} tve agne sumatiṃ bhikṣamāṇā divi śravo dadhire yajñiyāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1603: RV_01.073.07.2{20} naktā ca cakruruṣasā virūpe kṛṣṇaṃ ca varṇamaruṇaṃ ca saṃ dhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1604: RV_01.073.08.1{20} yān rāye martān suṣūdo agne te syāma maghavāno vayaṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:1605: RV_01.073.08.2{20} chāyeva viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ sisakṣyāpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam
GV01rv_01_u:1606: RV_01.073.09.1{20} arvadbhiragne arvato nṛbhirnṝn vīrairvīrān vanuyāmā tvotāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1607: RV_01.073.09.2{20} īśānāsaḥ pitṛvittasya rāyo vi sūrayaḥ śatahimā no aśyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1608: RV_01.073.10.1{20} etā te agna ucathāni vedho juṣṭāni santu manase hṛde ca
GV01rv_01_u:1609: RV_01.073.10.2{20} śakema rāyaḥ sudhuro yamaṃ te 'dhi śravo devabhaktaṃ dadhānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1612: RV_01.074.02.1{21} yaḥ snīhitīṣu pūrvyaḥ saṃjagmānāsu kṛṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1616: RV_01.074.04.1{21} yasya dūto asi kṣaye veṣi havyāni vītaye
GV01rv_01_u:1618: RV_01.074.05.1{21} tamit suhavyamaṅgiraḥ sudevaṃ sahaso yaho
GV01rv_01_u:1620: RV_01.074.06.1{22} ā ca vahāsi tāniha devānupa praśastaye
GV01rv_01_u:1622: RV_01.074.07.1{22} na yorupabdiraśvyaḥ śṛṇve rathasya kaccana
GV01rv_01_u:1626: RV_01.074.09.1{22} uta dyumat suvīryaṃ bṛhadagne vivāsasi
GV01rv_01_u:1630: RV_01.075.02.1{23} athā te aṅgirastamāgne vedhastama priyam
GV01rv_01_u:1634: RV_01.075.04.1{23} tvaṃ jāmirjanānāmagne mitro asi priyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1636: RV_01.075.05.1{23} yajā no mitrāvaruṇā yajā devān ṛtaṃ bṛhat
GV01rv_01_u:1638: RV_01.076.01.1{24} kā ta upetirmanaso varāya bhuvadagne śantamā kā manīṣā
GV01rv_01_u:1639: RV_01.076.01.2{24} ko vā yajñaiḥ pari dakṣaṃ ta āpa kena vā te manasādāśema
GV01rv_01_u:1640: RV_01.076.02.1{24} ehyagna iha hotā ni ṣīdādabdhaḥ su puraetā bhavā naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1641: RV_01.076.02.2{24} avatāṃ tvā rodasī viśvaminve yajā mahe saumanasāya devān
GV01rv_01_u:1642: RV_01.076.03.1{24} pra su viśvān rakṣaso dhakṣyagne bhavā yajñānāmabhiśastipāvā
GV01rv_01_u:1643: RV_01.076.03.2{24} athā vaha somapatiṃ haribhyāmātithyamasmai cakṛmā sudāvne
GV01rv_01_u:1644: RV_01.076.04.1{24} prajāvatā vacasā vahnirāsā ca huve ni ca satsīha devaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1645: RV_01.076.04.2{24} veṣi hotramuta potraṃ yajatra bodhi prayantarjanitarvasūnām
GV01rv_01_u:1646: RV_01.076.05.1{24} yathā viprasya manuṣo havirbhirdevānayajaḥ kavibhiḥ kaviḥ san
GV01rv_01_u:1647: RV_01.076.05.2{24} evā hotaḥ satyatara tvamadyāgne mandrayā juhvā yajasva
GV01rv_01_u:1648: RV_01.077.01.1{25} kathā dāśemāgnaye kāsmai devajuṣṭocyate bhāmine gīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1649: RV_01.077.01.2{25} yo martyeṣvamṛta ṛtāvā hotā yajiṣṭha it kṛṇoti devān
GV01rv_01_u:1650: RV_01.077.02.1{25} yo adhvareṣu śantama ṛtāvā hotā tamū namobhirā kṛṇudhvam
GV01rv_01_u:1651: RV_01.077.02.2{25} agniryad vermartāya devān sa cā bodhāti manasāyajāti
GV01rv_01_u:1652: RV_01.077.03.1{25} sa hi kratuḥ sa maryaḥ sa sādhurmitro na bhūdadbhutasya rathīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1653: RV_01.077.03.2{25} taṃ medheṣu prathamaṃ devayantīrviśa upa bruvate dasmamārīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1654: RV_01.077.04.1{25} sa no nṛṇāṃ nṛtamo riśāda agnirgiro 'vasā vetu dhītim
GV01rv_01_u:1655: RV_01.077.04.2{25} tanā ca ye maghavānaḥ śaviṣṭha vājaprasūtā iṣayantamanma
GV01rv_01_u:1657: RV_01.077.05.2{25} sa eṣu dyumnaṃ pīpayat sa vājaṃ sa puṣṭiṃ yāti joṣamā cikitvān
GV01rv_01_u:1658: RV_01.078.01.1{26} abhi tvā gotamā girā jātavedo vicarṣaṇe
GV01rv_01_u:1660: RV_01.078.02.1{26} tamu tvā gotamo girā rāyaskāmo duvasyati
GV01rv_01_u:1664: RV_01.078.04.1{26} tamu tvā vṛtrahantamaṃ yo dasyūnravadhūnuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1666: RV_01.078.05.1{26} avocāma rahūgaṇā agnaye madhumad vacaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1668: RV_01.079.01.1{27} hiraṇyakeśo rajaso visāre 'hirdhunirvāta iva dhrajīmān
GV01rv_01_u:1669: RV_01.079.01.2{27} śucibhrājā uṣaso navedā yaśasvatīrapasyuvo na satyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1670: RV_01.079.02.1{27} ā te suparṇā aminantamevaiḥ kṛṣṇo nonāva vṛṣabho yadīdam
GV01rv_01_u:1671: RV_01.079.02.2{27} śivābhirna smayamānābhirāgāt patanti mihaḥ stanayantyabhrā
GV01rv_01_u:1672: RV_01.079.03.1{27} yadīm ṛtasya payasā piyāno nayannṛtasya pathibhī rajiṣṭhaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1673: RV_01.079.03.2{27} aryamā mitro varunaḥ parijmā tvacaṃ pṛñcantyuparasya yonau
GV01rv_01_u:1674: RV_01.079.04.1{27} agne vājasya gomata īśānaḥ sahaso yaho
GV01rv_01_u:1675: RV_01.079.04.2{27} asme dhehi jātavedo mahi śravaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1676: RV_01.079.05.1{27} sa idhano vasuṣ kaviragnirīḷenyo girā
GV01rv_01_u:1679: RV_01.079.06.2{27} sa tigmajambha rakṣaso daha prati
GV01rv_01_u:1680: RV_01.079.07.1{28} avā no agna ūtibhirgāyatrasya prabharmaṇi
GV01rv_01_u:1682: RV_01.079.08.1{28} ā no agne rayiṃ bhara satrāsāhaṃ vareṇyam
GV01rv_01_u:1684: RV_01.079.09.1{28} ā no agne sucetunā rayiṃ viśvāyupoṣasam
GV01rv_01_u:1688: RV_01.079.11.1{28} yo no agne 'bhidāsatyanti dūre padīṣṭa saḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1692: RV_01.080.01.1{29} itthā hi soma in made brahmā cakāra vardhanam
GV01rv_01_u:1693: RV_01.080.01.2{29} śaviṣṭha vajrinnojasā pṛthivyā niḥ śaśā ahimarcannanu svarājyam
GV01rv_01_u:1694: RV_01.080.02.1{29} sa tvāmadad vṛṣā madaḥ somaḥ śyenābhṛtaḥ sutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1696: RV_01.080.03.1{29} prehyabhīhi dhṛṣṇuhi na te vajro ni yaṃsate
GV01rv_01_u:1697: RV_01.080.03.2{29} indra nṛmṇaṃ hi te śavo hano vṛtraṃ jayā apo 'rcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1698: RV_01.080.04.1{29} nirindra bhūmyā adhi vṛtraṃ jaghantha nirdivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1699: RV_01.080.04.2{29} sṛjā marutvatīrava jīvadhanyā imā apo 'rcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1700: RV_01.080.05.1{29} indro vṛtrasya dodhataḥ sānuṃ vajreṇa hīḷitaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1702: RV_01.080.06.1{30} adhi sānau ni jighnate vajreṇa śataparvaṇā
GV01rv_01_u:1703: RV_01.080.06.2{30} mandāna indro andhasaḥ sakhibhyo gātumichatyarcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1705: RV_01.080.07.2{30} yad dha tyammāyinaṃ mṛgaṃ tamu tvaṃ māyayāvadhīrarcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1706: RV_01.080.08.1{30} vi te vajrāso asthiran navatiṃ nāvyā anu
GV01rv_01_u:1707: RV_01.080.08.2{30} mahat ta indra vīryaṃ bāhvoste balaṃ hitamarcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1708: RV_01.080.09.1{30} sahasraṃ sākamarcata pari ṣṭobhata viṃśatiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1710: RV_01.080.10.1{30} indro vṛtrasya taviṣīṃ nirahan sahasā sahaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1711: RV_01.080.10.2{30} mahat tadasya pauṃsyaṃ vṛtraṃ jaghanvānasṛjadarcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1712: RV_01.080.11.1{31} ime cit tava manyave vepete bhiyasā mahī
GV01rv_01_u:1714: RV_01.080.12.1{31} na vepasā na tanyatendraṃ vṛtro vi bībhayat
GV01rv_01_u:1716: RV_01.080.13.1{31} yad vṛtraṃ tava caśaniṃ vajreṇa samayodhayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1717: RV_01.080.13.2{31} ahimindrajighāṃsato divi te badbadhe śavo 'rcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1718: RV_01.080.14.1{31} abhiṣṭane te adrivo yat sthā jagacca rejate
GV01rv_01_u:1719: RV_01.080.14.2{31} tvaṣṭā cit tava manyava indra vevijyate bhiyārcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1720: RV_01.080.15.1{31} nahi nu yādadhīmasīndraṃ ko vīryā paraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1721: RV_01.080.15.2{31} tasmin nṛmṇamuta kratuṃ devā ojāṃsi saṃ dadhurarcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1722: RV_01.080.16.1{31} yamatharva manuṣ pitā dadhyaṃ dhiyamatnata
GV01rv_01_u:1723: RV_01.080.16.2{31} tasmin brahmāṇi purvathendra ukthā samagmatārcann...
GV01rv_01_u:1724: RV_01.081.01.1{01} indro madāya vāvṛdhe śavase vṛtrahā nṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1725: RV_01.081.01.2{01} tamin mahatsvājiṣūtemarbhe havāmahe sa vājeṣu pra no 'viṣat
GV01rv_01_u:1726: RV_01.081.02.1{01} asi hi vīra senyo 'si bhūri parādadiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1727: RV_01.081.02.2{01} asi dabhrasya cidvṛdho yajamānāya śikṣasi sunvate bhūri te vasu
GV01rv_01_u:1728: RV_01.081.03.1{01} yadudīrata ājayo dhṛṣṇave dhīyate dhanā
GV01rv_01_u:1729: RV_01.081.03.2{01} yukṣvā madacyutā harī kaṃ hanaḥ kaṃ vasau dadho 'smānindra vasau dadhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1730: RV_01.081.04.1{01} kratvāmahānanuṣvadhaṃ bhīma ā vāvṛdhe śavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1731: RV_01.081.04.2{01} śriyaṛṣva upākayorni śiprī harivān dadhe hastayorvajramāyasam
GV01rv_01_u:1732: RV_01.081.05.1{01} ā paprau pārthivaṃ rajo badbadhe rocanā divi
GV01rv_01_u:1733: RV_01.081.05.2{01} na tvāvānindra kaścana na jāto na janiṣyate 'ti viśvaṃ vavakṣitha
GV01rv_01_u:1734: RV_01.081.06.1{02} yo aryo martabhojanaṃ parādadāti dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1735: RV_01.081.06.2{02} indro asmabhyaṃśikṣatu vi bhajā bhūri te vasu bhakṣīya tava rādhasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1736: RV_01.081.07.1{02} made-made hi no dadiryūthā gavām ṛjukratuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1737: RV_01.081.07.2{02} saṃ gṛbhāyapurū śatobhayāhastyā vasu śiśīhi rāya ā bhara
GV01rv_01_u:1738: RV_01.081.08.1{02} mādayasva sute sacā śavase śūra rādhase
GV01rv_01_u:1739: RV_01.081.08.2{02} vidmā hi tvāpurūvasumupa kāmān sasṛjmahe 'thā no 'vitā bhava
GV01rv_01_u:1740: RV_01.081.09.1{02} ete ta indra jantavo viśvaṃ puṣyanti vāryam
GV01rv_01_u:1741: RV_01.081.09.2{02} antarhi khyojanānāmaryo vedo adāśuṣāṃ teṣāṃ no veda ā bhara
GV01rv_01_u:1742: RV_01.082.01.1{03} upo ṣu śṛṇuhī giro maghavan mātathā iva
GV01rv_01_u:1743: RV_01.082.01.2{03} yadā naḥ sūnṛtāvataḥ kara ādarthayāsa id yojā nvindra te harī
GV01rv_01_u:1745: RV_01.082.02.2{03} astoṣata svabhānavo viprā naviṣṭhayā matī yojā ...
GV01rv_01_u:1746: RV_01.082.03.1{03} susandṛśaṃ tvā vayaṃ maghavan vandiṣīmahi
GV01rv_01_u:1747: RV_01.082.03.2{03} pra nūnaṃ pūrṇavandhura stuto yāhi vaśānanu yojā ...
GV01rv_01_u:1748: RV_01.082.04.1{03} sa ghā taṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ rathamadhi tiṣṭhāti govidam
GV01rv_01_u:1749: RV_01.082.04.2{03} yaḥpātraṃ hāriyojanaṃ pūrṇamindra ciketati yojā ...
GV01rv_01_u:1750: RV_01.082.05.1{03} yuktaste astu dakṣiṇa uta savyaḥ śatakrato
GV01rv_01_u:1751: RV_01.082.05.2{03} tena jāyāmupa priyāṃ mandāno yāhyandhaso yojā ...
GV01rv_01_u:1752: RV_01.082.06.1{03} yunajmi te brahmaṇā keśinā harī upa pra yāhi dadhiṣe gabhastyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1753: RV_01.082.06.2{03} ut tvā sutāso rabhasā amandiṣuḥ pūṣaṇvān vajrin samu patnyāmadaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1754: RV_01.083.01.1{04} aśvāvati prathamo goṣu gachati suprāvīrindra martyastavotibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1755: RV_01.083.01.2{04} tamit pṛṇakṣi vasunā bhavīyasā sindhumāpo yathābhito vicetasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1756: RV_01.083.02.1{04} āpo na devīrupa yanti hotriyamavaḥ paśyanti vitataṃ yathā rajaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1757: RV_01.083.02.2{04} prācairdevāsaḥ pra ṇayanti devayuṃ brahmapriyaṃ joṣayante varā iva
GV01rv_01_u:1758: RV_01.083.03.1{04} adhi dvayoradadhā ukthyaṃ vaco yatasrucā mithunā yā saparyataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1759: RV_01.083.03.2{04} asaṃyatto vrate te kṣeti puṣyati bhadrā śaktiryajamānāya sunvate
GV01rv_01_u:1760: RV_01.083.04.1{04} ādaṅgirāḥ prathamaṃ dadhire vaya iddhāgnayaḥ śamyā yesukṛtyayā
GV01rv_01_u:1761: RV_01.083.04.2{04} sarvaṃ paṇeḥ samavindanta bhojanamaśvāvantaṃ gomantamā paśuṃ naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1762: RV_01.083.05.1{04} yajñairatharvā prathamaḥ pathastate tataḥ sūryo vratapāvena ājani
GV01rv_01_u:1763: RV_01.083.05.2{04} ā gā ājaduśanā kāvyaḥ sacā yamasya jātamamṛtaṃ yajāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:1764: RV_01.083.06.1{04} barhirvā yat svapatyāya vṛjyate 'rko vā ślokamāghoṣatedivi
GV01rv_01_u:1765: RV_01.083.06.2{04} grāvā yatra vadati kārurukthyastasyedindro abhipitveṣu raṇyati
GV01rv_01_u:1766: RV_01.084.01.1{05} asāvi soma indra te śaviṣṭha dhṛṣṇavā gahi
GV01rv_01_u:1767: RV_01.084.01.2{05} ā tvā pṛṇaktvindriyaṃ rajaḥ sūryo na raśmibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1769: RV_01.084.02.2{05} ṛṣīṇāṃ ca stutīrupa yajñaṃ ca mānuṣāṇām
GV01rv_01_u:1770: RV_01.084.03.1{05} ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan rathaṃ yuktā te brahmaṇā harī
GV01rv_01_u:1771: RV_01.084.03.2{05} arvācīnaṃ su te mano grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā
GV01rv_01_u:1772: RV_01.084.04.1{05} imamindra sutaṃ piba jyeṣṭhamamartyaṃ madam
GV01rv_01_u:1773: RV_01.084.04.2{05} śukrasya tvābhyakṣaran dhārā ṛtasya sādane
GV01rv_01_u:1775: RV_01.084.05.2{05} sutā amatsurindavo jyeṣṭhaṃ namasyatā sahaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1776: RV_01.084.06.1{06} nakiṣ ṭvad rathītaro harī yadindra yachase
GV01rv_01_u:1777: RV_01.084.06.2{06} nakiṣ ṭvānu majmanā nakiḥ svaśva ānaśe
GV01rv_01_u:1778: RV_01.084.07.1{06} ya eka id vidayate vasu martāya dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:1780: RV_01.084.08.1{06} kadā martamarādhasaṃ padā kṣumpamiva sphurat
GV01rv_01_u:1781: RV_01.084.08.2{06} kadā naḥśuśravad gira indro aṅga
GV01rv_01_u:1782: RV_01.084.09.1{06} yaścid dhi tvā bahubhya ā sutāvānāvivāsati
GV01rv_01_u:1783: RV_01.084.09.2{06} ugraṃ tat patyate śava indro aṅga
GV01rv_01_u:1784: RV_01.084.10.1{06} svādoritthā viṣūvato madhvaḥ pibanti gauryaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1785: RV_01.084.10.2{06} yā indreṇa sayāvarīrvṛṣṇā madanti śobhase vasvīranu svarājyam
GV01rv_01_u:1786: RV_01.084.11.1{07} tā asya pṛśanāyuvaḥ somaṃ śrīṇanti pṛśnayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1787: RV_01.084.11.2{07} priyā indrasya dhenavo vajraṃ hinvanti sāyakaṃ vasvīr...
GV01rv_01_u:1788: RV_01.084.12.1{07} tā asya namasā sahaḥ saparyanti pracetasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1789: RV_01.084.12.2{07} vratānyasya saścire purūṇi pūrvacittaye vasvīr...
GV01rv_01_u:1796: RV_01.084.16.1{08} ko adya yuṅkte dhuri gā ṛtasya śimīvato bhāmino durhṛṇāyūn
GV01rv_01_u:1797: RV_01.084.16.2{08} asanniṣūn hṛtsvaso mayobhūn ya eṣāṃ bhṛtyām ṛṇadhat sa jīvāt
GV01rv_01_u:1798: RV_01.084.17.1{08} ka īṣate tujyate ko bibhāya ko maṃsate santamindraṃ ko anti
GV01rv_01_u:1799: RV_01.084.17.2{08} kastokāya ka ibhāyota rāye 'dhi bravat tanve ko janāya
GV01rv_01_u:1800: RV_01.084.18.1{08} ko agnimīṭṭe haviṣā ghṛtena srucā yajātā ṛtubhirdhruvebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1801: RV_01.084.18.2{08} kasmai devā ā vahānāśu homa ko maṃsate vītihotraḥ sudevaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1802: RV_01.084.19.1{08} tvamaṅga pra śaṃsiṣo devaḥ śaviṣṭha martyam
GV01rv_01_u:1803: RV_01.084.19.2{08} na tvadanyo maghavannasti marḍitendra bravīmi te vacaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1804: RV_01.084.20.1{08} mā te rādhāṃsi mā ta ūtayo vaso 'smān kadā canā dabhan
GV01rv_01_u:1805: RV_01.084.20.2{08} viśvā ca na upamimīhi mānuṣa vasūni carṣaṇibhya ā
GV01rv_01_u:1806: RV_01.085.01.1{09} pra ye śumbhante janayo na saptayo yāman rudrasya sūnavaḥsudaṃsasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1807: RV_01.085.01.2{09} rodasī hi marutaścakrire vṛdhe madanti vīrā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1808: RV_01.085.02.1{09} ta ukṣitāso mahimānamāśata divi rudrāso adhi cakrire sadaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1809: RV_01.085.02.2{09} arcanto arkaṃ janayanta indriyamadhi śriyo dadhire pṛśnimātaraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1810: RV_01.085.03.1{09} gomātaro yacchubhayante añjibhistanūṣu śubhrā dadhire virukmataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1811: RV_01.085.03.2{09} bādhante viśvamabhimātinamapa vartmānyeṣāmanu rīyate ghṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:1812: RV_01.085.04.1{09} vi ye bhrājante sumakhāsa ṛṣṭibhiḥ pracyāvayanto acyutācidojasā
GV01rv_01_u:1813: RV_01.085.04.2{09} manojuvo yan maruto ratheṣvā vṛṣavrātāsaḥ pṛṣatīrayugdhvam
GV01rv_01_u:1814: RV_01.085.05.1{09} pra yad ratheṣu pṛṣatīrayugdhvaṃ vāje adriṃ maruto raṃhayantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1815: RV_01.085.05.2{09} utāruṣasya vi ṣyanti dhārāścarmevodabhirvyundanti bhūma
GV01rv_01_u:1816: RV_01.085.06.1{09} ā vo vahantu saptayo raghuṣyado raghupatvānaḥ pra jigāta bāhubhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1817: RV_01.085.06.2{09} sīdatā barhiruru vaḥ sadas kṛtaṃ mādayadhvaṃ maruto madhvo andhasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1818: RV_01.085.07.1{10} te 'vardhanta svatavaso mahitvanā nākaṃ tasthururu cakrire sadaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1819: RV_01.085.07.2{10} viṣṇuryad dhāvad vṛṣaṇaṃ madacyutaṃ vayo na sīdannadhi barhiṣi priye
GV01rv_01_u:1820: RV_01.085.08.1{10} śūrā ived yuyudhayo na jagmayaḥ śravasyavo na pṛtanāsu yetire
GV01rv_01_u:1821: RV_01.085.08.2{10} bhayante viśvā bhuvanā marudbhyo rājāna iva tveṣasandṛśo naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1822: RV_01.085.09.1{10} tvaṣṭā yad vajraṃ sukṛtaṃ hiraṇyayaṃ sahasrabhṛṣṭiṃ svapā avartayat
GV01rv_01_u:1823: RV_01.085.09.2{10} dhatta indro naryapāṃsi kartave 'han vṛtraṃ nirapāmaubjadarṇavam
GV01rv_01_u:1824: RV_01.085.10.1{10} ūrdhvaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ ta ojasā dadṛhāṇaṃ cid bibhidurviparvatam
GV01rv_01_u:1825: RV_01.085.10.2{10} dhamanto vāṇaṃ marutaḥ sudānavo made somasya raṇyāni cakrire
GV01rv_01_u:1826: RV_01.085.11.1{10} jihmaṃ nunudre 'vataṃ tayā diśāsiñcannutsaṃ gotamāya tṛṣṇaje
GV01rv_01_u:1827: RV_01.085.11.2{10} ā gachantīmavasā citrabhānavaḥ kāmaṃ viprasyatarpayanta dhāmabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1828: RV_01.085.12.1{10} yā vaḥ śarma śaśamānāya santi tridhātūni dāśuṣe yachatādhi
GV01rv_01_u:1829: RV_01.085.12.2{10} asmabhyaṃ tāni maruto vi yanta rayiṃ no dhatta vṛṣaṇaḥ suvīram
GV01rv_01_u:1830: RV_01.086.01.1{11} maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1832: RV_01.086.02.1{11} yajñairvā yajñavāhaso viprasya vā matīnām
GV01rv_01_u:1834: RV_01.086.03.1{11} uta vā yasya vājino 'nu vipramatakṣata
GV01rv_01_u:1836: RV_01.086.04.1{11} asya vīrasya barhiṣi sutaḥ somo diviṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:1838: RV_01.086.05.1{11} asya śroṣantvā bhuvo viśvā yaścarṣaṇīrabhi
GV01rv_01_u:1842: RV_01.086.07.1{12} subhagaḥ sa prayajyavo maruto astu martyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1844: RV_01.086.08.1{12} śaśamānasya vā naraḥ svedasya satyaśavasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1846: RV_01.086.09.1{12} yūyaṃ tat satyaśavasa āviṣ karta mahitvanā
GV01rv_01_u:1848: RV_01.086.10.1{12} gūhatā guhyaṃ tamo vi yāta viśvamatriṇam
GV01rv_01_u:1850: RV_01.087.01.1{13} pratvakṣasaḥ pratavaso virapśino 'nānatā avithurā ṛjīṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1851: RV_01.087.01.2{13} juṣṭatamāso nṛtamāso añjibhirvyānajre ke cidusrā iva stṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1852: RV_01.087.02.1{13} upahvareṣu yadacidhvaṃ yayiṃ vaya iva marutaḥ kena cit pathā
GV01rv_01_u:1853: RV_01.087.02.2{13} ścotanti kośā upa vo ratheṣvā ghṛtamukṣatā madhuvarṇamarcate
GV01rv_01_u:1854: RV_01.087.03.1{13} praiṣāmajmeṣu vithureva rejate bhūmiryāmeṣu yad dha yuñjate śubhe
GV01rv_01_u:1855: RV_01.087.03.2{13} te krīḷayo dhunayo bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ svayaṃ mahitvaṃ panayanta dhūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1856: RV_01.087.04.1{13} sa hi svasṛt pṛṣadaśvo yuvā gaṇo 'yā īśānastaviṣībhirāvṛtaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1857: RV_01.087.04.2{13} asi satya ṛṇayāvānedyo 'syā dhiyaḥ prāvitāthā vṛṣā gaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1858: RV_01.087.05.1{13} pituḥ pratnasya janmanā vadāmasi somasya jihvā pra jigāti cakṣasā
GV01rv_01_u:1859: RV_01.087.05.2{13} yadīmindraṃ śamy ṛkvāṇa āśatādin nāmāni yajñiyāni dadhire
GV01rv_01_u:1860: RV_01.087.06.1{13} śriyase kaṃ bhānubhiḥ saṃ mimikṣire te raśmibhista ṛkvabhiḥ sukhādayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1861: RV_01.087.06.2{13} te vāśīmanta iṣmiṇo abhīravo vidre priyasya mārutasya dhāmnaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1862: RV_01.088.01.1{14} ā vidyunmadbhirmarutaḥ svarkai rathebhiryāta ṛṣṭimadbhiraśvaparṇaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1863: RV_01.088.01.2{14} ā varṣiṣṭhayā na iṣā vayo na paptatā sumāyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1864: RV_01.088.02.1{14} te 'ruṇebhirvaramā piśaṅgaiḥ śubhe kaṃ yānti rathatūrbhiraśvaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1865: RV_01.088.02.2{14} rukmo na citraḥ svadhitīvān pavyā rathasya jaṅghananta bhūma
GV01rv_01_u:1866: RV_01.088.03.1{14} śriye kaṃ vo adhi tanūṣu vāśīrmedhā vanā na kṛṇavanta ūrdhvā
GV01rv_01_u:1867: RV_01.088.03.2{14} yuṣmabhyaṃ kaṃ marutaḥ sujātāstuvidyumnāso dhanayante adrim
GV01rv_01_u:1868: RV_01.088.04.1{14} ahāni gṛdhrāḥ paryā va āgurimāṃ dhiyaṃ vārkāryāṃca devīm
GV01rv_01_u:1869: RV_01.088.04.2{14} brahma kṛṇvanto gotamāso arkairūrdhvaṃ nunudrautsadhiṃ pibadhyai
GV01rv_01_u:1870: RV_01.088.05.1{14} etat tyan na yojanamaceti sasvarha yan maruto gotamo vaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1872: RV_01.088.06.1{14} eṣā syā vo maruto 'nubhartrī prati ṣṭobhati vāghato na vāṇī
GV01rv_01_u:1874: RV_01.089.01.1{15} ā no bhadrāḥ kratavo xyantu viśvato 'dabdhāso aparītāsa udbhidaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1875: RV_01.089.01.2{15} devā no yathā sadamid vṛdhe asannaprāyuvo rakṣitāro dive-dive
GV01rv_01_u:1876: RV_01.089.02.1{15} devānāṃ bhadrā sumatirṛjūyatāṃ devānāṃ rātirabhi noni vartatām
GV01rv_01_u:1877: RV_01.089.02.2{15} devānāṃ sakhyamupa sedimā vayaṃ devā na āyuḥ pra tirantu jīvase
GV01rv_01_u:1878: RV_01.089.03.1{15} tān pūrvayā nividā hūmahe vayaṃ bhagaṃ mitramaditiṃ dakṣamasridham
GV01rv_01_u:1879: RV_01.089.03.2{15} aryamaṇaṃ varuṇaṃ somamaśvinā sarasvatīnaḥ subhagā mayas karat
GV01rv_01_u:1880: RV_01.089.04.1{15} tan no vāto mayobhu vātu bheṣajaṃ tan mātā pṛthivī tatpitā dyauḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1881: RV_01.089.04.2{15} tad grāvāṇaḥ somasuto mayobhuvastadaśvinā śṛṇutaṃ dhiṣṇyā yuvam
GV01rv_01_u:1882: RV_01.089.05.1{15} tamīśānaṃ jagatastasthuṣas patiṃ dhiyaṃjinvamavase hūmahe vayam
GV01rv_01_u:1883: RV_01.089.05.2{15} pūṣā no yathā vedasāmasad vṛdhe rakṣitā pāyuradabdhaḥ svastaye
GV01rv_01_u:1884: RV_01.089.06.1{16} svasti na indro vṛddhaśravāḥ svasti naḥ puṣā viśvavedāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1885: RV_01.089.06.2{16} svasti nastārkṣyo ariṣṭanemiḥ svasti no bṛhaspatirdadhātu
GV01rv_01_u:1886: RV_01.089.07.1{16} pṛṣadaśvā marutaḥ pṛśnimātaraḥ śubhaṃyāvāno vidatheṣujagmayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1887: RV_01.089.07.2{16} agnijihvā manavaḥ sūracakṣaso viśve no devā avasā gamanniha
GV01rv_01_u:1888: RV_01.089.08.1{16} bhadraṃ karṇebhiḥ śṛṇuyāma devā bhadraṃ paśyemākṣabhiryajatrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1890: RV_01.089.09.1{16} śatamin nu śarado anti devā yatrā naścakrā jarasaṃ tanūnām
GV01rv_01_u:1891: RV_01.089.09.2{16} putrāso yatra pitaro bhavanti mā no madhyā rīriṣatāyurgantoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1892: RV_01.089.10.1{16} aditirdyauraditirantarikṣamaditirmātā sa pitā sa putraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1893: RV_01.089.10.2{16} viśve devā aditiḥ pañca janā aditirjātamaditirjanitvam
GV01rv_01_u:1894: RV_01.090.01.1{17} ṛjunītī no varuṇo mitro nayatu vidvān
GV01rv_01_u:1896: RV_01.090.02.1{17} te hi vasvo vasavānāste apramūrā mahobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1898: RV_01.090.03.1{17} te asmabhyaṃ śarma yaṃsannamṛtā martyebhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1900: RV_01.090.04.1{17} vi naḥ pathaḥ suvitāya ciyantvindro marutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1902: RV_01.090.05.1{17} uta no dhiyo goagrāḥ pūṣan viṣṇavevayāvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1904: RV_01.090.06.1{18} madhu vātā ṛtāyate madhu kṣaranti sindhavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1906: RV_01.090.07.1{18} madhu naktamutoṣaso madhumat pārthivaṃ rajaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1910: RV_01.090.09.1{18} śaṃ no mitraḥ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatvaryamā
GV01rv_01_u:1911: RV_01.090.09.2{18} śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇururukramaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1912: RV_01.091.01.1{19} tvaṃ soma pra cikito manīṣā tvaṃ rajiṣṭhamanu neṣi panthām
GV01rv_01_u:1913: RV_01.091.01.2{19} tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnamabhajanta dhīrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:1914: RV_01.091.02.1{19} tvaṃ soma kratubhiḥ subhūstvaṃ dakṣaiḥ sudakṣo viśvavedāḥ

GV01rv_01_u:2267: RV_01.106.01.1{24} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇamagnimūtaye mārutaṃ śardho aditiṃhavāmahe

GV01rv_01_u:2287: RV_01.108.01.1{26} ya indrāgnī citratamo ratho vāmabhi viśvāni bhuvanāni caṣṭe

GV01rv_01_u:2289: RV_01.108.02.1{26} yāvadidaṃ bhuvanaṃ viśvamastyuruvyacā varimatā gabhīram
GV01rv_01_u:2290: RV_01.108.02.2{26} tāvānayaṃ pātave somo astvaramindrāgnī manase yuvabhyām
GV01rv_01_u:2291: RV_01.108.03.1{26} cakrāthe hi sadhryaṃ nāma bhadraṃ sadhrīcīnā vṛtrahaṇāuta sthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2292: RV_01.108.03.2{26} tāvindrāgnī sadhryañcā niṣadyā vṛṣṇaḥ somasya vṛṣaṇā vṛṣethām
GV01rv_01_u:2294: RV_01.108.04.2{26} tīvraiḥ somaiḥ pariṣiktebhirarvāgendrāgnī saumanasāya yātam
GV01rv_01_u:2295: RV_01.108.05.1{26} yānīndrāgnī cakrathurvīryāṇi yāni rūpāṇyuta vṛṣṇyāni
GV01rv_01_u:2296: RV_01.108.05.2{26} yā vāṃ pratnāni sakhyā śivāni tebhiḥ somasya pibataṃ sutasya
GV01rv_01_u:2297: RV_01.108.06.1{27} yadabravaṃ prathamaṃ vāṃ vṛṇāno 'yaṃ somo asurairno vihavyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2298: RV_01.108.06.2{27} tāṃ satyāṃ śraddhāmabhyā hi yātamathā somasya pibataṃ sutasya

GV01rv_01_u:2300: RV_01.108.07.2{27} ataḥ pari vṛṣaṇāvā hi yātamathā somasya pibataṃ sutasya
GV01rv_01_u:2301: RV_01.108.08.1{27} yadindrāgnī yaduṣu turvaśeṣu yad druhyuṣvanuṣu pūruṣu sthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2303: RV_01.108.09.1{27} yadindrāgnī avamasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ madhyamasyāṃ paramasyāmuta sthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2305: RV_01.108.10.1{27} yadindrāgnī paramasyāṃ pṛthivyāṃ madhyamasyāmavamasyāmuta sthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2307: RV_01.108.11.1{27} yadindrāgnī divi ṣṭho yat pṛthivyāṃ yat parvateṣvoṣadhīṣvapsu
GV01rv_01_u:2309: RV_01.108.12.1{27} yadindrāgnī uditā sūryasya madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayethe
GV01rv_01_u:2311: RV_01.108.13.1{27} evendrāgnī papivāṃsā sutasya viśvāsmabhyaṃ saṃ jayatandhanāni
GV01rv_01_u:2313: RV_01.109.01.1{28} vi hyakhyaṃ manasā vasya ichannindrāgnī jñāsa uta vā sajātān
GV01rv_01_u:2314: RV_01.109.01.2{28} nānyā yuvat pramatirasti mahyaṃ sa vāṃ dhiyaṃ vājayantīmatakṣam
GV01rv_01_u:2315: RV_01.109.02.1{28} aśravaṃ hi bhūridāvattarā vāṃ vijāmāturuta vā ghā syālāt
GV01rv_01_u:2316: RV_01.109.02.2{28} athā somasya prayatī yuvabhyāmindrāgnī stomaṃ janayāmi navyam
GV01rv_01_u:2317: RV_01.109.03.1{28} mā chedma raśmīnriti nādhamānāḥ pitṝṇāṃ śaktīranuyachamānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2318: RV_01.109.03.2{28} indrāgnibhyāṃ kaṃ vṛṣaṇo madanti tā hyadrī dhiṣaṇāyā upasthe
GV01rv_01_u:2319: RV_01.109.04.1{28} yuvābhyāṃ devī dhiṣaṇā madāyendrāgnī somamuśatī sunoti
GV01rv_01_u:2320: RV_01.109.04.2{28} tāvaśvinā bhadrahastā supāṇī ā dhāvataṃ madhunā pṛṅktamapsu
GV01rv_01_u:2321: RV_01.109.05.1{28} yuvāmindrāgnī vasuno vibhāge tavastamā śuśrava vṛtrahatye
GV01rv_01_u:2322: RV_01.109.05.2{28} tāvāsadyā barhiṣi yajñe asmin pra carṣaṇī mādayethāṃ sutasya
GV01rv_01_u:2323: RV_01.109.06.1{29} pra carṣaṇibhyaḥ pṛtanāhaveṣu pra pṛthivyā riricāthe divaśca

GV01rv_01_u:2329: RV_01.110.01.1{30} tataṃ me apastadu tāyate punaḥ svādiṣṭhā dhītirucathāya śasyate
