GV01rv_01_u:2407: RV_01.113.01.1{01} idaṃ śreṣṭhaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotirāgāccitraḥ praketo ajaniṣṭa vibhvā
GV01rv_01_u:2408: RV_01.113.01.2{01} yathā prasūtā savituḥ savayamevā rātryuṣase yonimāraik
GV01rv_01_u:2409: RV_01.113.02.1{01} ruśadvatsā ruśatī śvetyāgādāraigu kṛṣṇā sadanānyasyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2410: RV_01.113.02.2{01} samānabandhū amṛte anucī dyāvā varṇaṃ carata āmināne
GV01rv_01_u:2411: RV_01.113.03.1{01} samāno adhvā svasroranantastamanyānyā carato devaśiṣṭe
GV01rv_01_u:2412: RV_01.113.03.2{01} na methete na tasthatuḥ sumeke naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe
GV01rv_01_u:2413: RV_01.113.04.1{01} bhāsvatī netrī sūnṛtānāmaceti citrā vi duro na āvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2414: RV_01.113.04.2{01} prārpyā jagad vyu no rāyo akhyaduṣā ajīgarbhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:2415: RV_01.113.05.1{01} jihmaśye caritave maghonyābhogaya iṣṭaye rāya u tvam
GV01rv_01_u:2416: RV_01.113.05.2{01} dabhraṃ paśyadbhya urviyā vicakṣa uṣā
GV01rv_01_u:2417: RV_01.113.06.1{02} kṣatrāya tvaṃ śravase tvaṃ mahīyā iṣṭaye tvamarthamivatvamityai
GV01rv_01_u:2419: RV_01.113.07.1{02} eṣā divo duhitā pratyadarśi vyuchantī yuvatiḥ śukravāsāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2420: RV_01.113.07.2{02} viśvasyeśānā pārthivasya vasva uṣo adyeha subhagevyucha
GV01rv_01_u:2421: RV_01.113.08.1{02} parāyatīnāmanveti pātha āyatīnāṃ prathamā śaśvatīnām
GV01rv_01_u:2422: RV_01.113.08.2{02} vyuchantī jīvamudīrayantyuṣā mṛtaṃ kaṃ cana bodhayantī
GV01rv_01_u:2423: RV_01.113.09.1{02} uṣo yadagniṃ samidhe cakartha vi yadāvaścakṣasā sūryasya
GV01rv_01_u:2424: RV_01.113.09.2{02} yan mānuṣān yakṣyamāṇānajīgastad deveṣu cakṛṣe bhadramapnaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2425: RV_01.113.10.1{02} kiyātyā yat samayā bhavāti yā vyūṣuryāśca nūnaṃvyuchān
GV01rv_01_u:2426: RV_01.113.10.2{02} anu pūrvāḥ kṛpate vāvaśānā pradīdhyānā joṣamanyābhireti
GV01rv_01_u:2427: RV_01.113.11.1{03} īyuṣ ṭe ye pūrvatarāmapaśyan vyuchantīmuṣasaṃ martyāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2428: RV_01.113.11.2{03} asmābhirū nu praticakṣyābhūdo te yanti ye aparīṣu paśyān
GV01rv_01_u:2429: RV_01.113.12.1{03} yāvayaddveṣā ṛtapā ṛtejāḥ sumnāvarī sūnṛtā īrayantī
GV01rv_01_u:2431: RV_01.113.13.1{03} śaśvat puroṣā vyuvāsa devyatho adyedaṃ vyāvo maghonī
GV01rv_01_u:2432: RV_01.113.13.2{03} atho vyuchāduttarānanu dyūnajarāmṛtā carati svadhābhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2433: RV_01.113.14.1{03} vyañjibhirdiva ātāsvadyaudapa kṛṣṇāṃ nirṇijaṃ devyāvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2435: RV_01.113.15.1{03} āvahantī poṣyā vāryāṇi citraṃ ketuṃ kṛṇute cekitānā
GV01rv_01_u:2436: RV_01.113.15.2{03} īyuṣīṇāmupamā śaśvatīnāṃ vibhātīnāṃ prathamoṣā vyaśvait
GV01rv_01_u:2437: RV_01.113.16.1{04} udīrdhvaṃ jīvo asurna āgādapa prāgāt tama ā jyotireti
GV01rv_01_u:2438: RV_01.113.16.2{04} āraik panthāṃ yātave sūryāyāganma yatra pratiranta āyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2439: RV_01.113.17.1{04} syūmanā vāca udiyarti vahni stavāno rebha uṣaso vibhātīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2440: RV_01.113.17.2{04} adyā taducha gṛṇate maghonyasme āyurni didīhi prajāvat
GV01rv_01_u:2441: RV_01.113.18.1{04} yā gomatīruṣasaḥ sarvavīrā vyuchanti dāśuṣe martyāya
GV01rv_01_u:2442: RV_01.113.18.2{04} vāyoriva sūnṛtānāmudarke tā aśvadā aśnavat somasutvā
GV01rv_01_u:2443: RV_01.113.19.1{04} mātā devānāmaditeranīkaṃ yajñasya keturbṛhatī vi bhāhi
GV01rv_01_u:2444: RV_01.113.19.2{04} praśastikṛd brahmaṇe no vyuchā no jane janaya viśvavāre
GV01rv_01_u:2445: RV_01.113.20.1{04} yaccitramapna uṣaso vahantījānāya śaśamānāya bhadram
GV01rv_01_u:2447: RV_01.114.01.1{05} imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2448: RV_01.114.01.2{05} yathā śamasad dvipade catuṣpade viśvaṃ puṣṭaṃgrāme asminnanāturam
GV01rv_01_u:2449: RV_01.114.02.1{05} mṛḷā no rudrota no mayas kṛdhi kṣayadvīrāya namasā vidhemate
GV01rv_01_u:2450: RV_01.114.02.2{05} yacchaṃ ca yośca manurāyeje pitā tadaśyāma tavarudra praṇītiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:2451: RV_01.114.03.1{05} aśyāma te sumatiṃ devayajyayā kṣayadvīrasya tava rudra mīḍhvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2452: RV_01.114.03.2{05} sumnāyannid viśo asmākamā carāriṣṭavīrā juhavāma te haviḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2453: RV_01.114.04.1{05} tveṣaṃ vayaṃ rudraṃ yajñasādhaṃ vaṅkuṃ kavimavase nihvayāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:2454: RV_01.114.04.2{05} āre asmad daivyaṃ heḷo asyatu sumatimid vayamasyā vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_01_u:2455: RV_01.114.05.1{05} divo varāhamaruṣaṃ kapardinaṃ tveṣaṃ rūpaṃ namasā nihvayāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:2456: RV_01.114.05.2{05} haste bibhrad bheṣajā vāryāṇi śarma varma chardirasmabhyaṃ yaṃsat
GV01rv_01_u:2457: RV_01.114.06.1{06} idaṃ pitre marutāmucyate vacaḥ svādoḥ svādīyo rudrāya vardhanam
GV01rv_01_u:2458: RV_01.114.06.2{06} rāsvā ca no amṛta martabhojanaṃ tmane tokā
GV01rv_01_u:2459: RV_01.114.07.1{06} mā no mahāntamuta mā no arbhakaṃ mā na ukṣantamuta māna ukṣitam
GV01rv_01_u:2460: RV_01.114.07.2{06} mā no vadhīḥ pitaraṃ mota mātaraṃ mā naḥ priyāstanvo rudra rīriṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2461: RV_01.114.08.1{06} mā nastoke tanaye mā na āyau mā no goṣu mā no aśveṣurīriṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2462: RV_01.114.08.2{06} vīrān mā no rudra bhāmito vadhīrhaviṣmantaḥsadamit tvā havāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:2463: RV_01.114.09.1{06} upa te stomān paśupā ivākaraṃ rāsvā pitarmarutāṃ sumnamasme
GV01rv_01_u:2464: RV_01.114.09.2{06} bhadrā hi te sumatirmṛḷayattamāthā vayamava itte vṛṇīmahe
GV01rv_01_u:2465: RV_01.114.10.1{06} āre te goghnamuta pūruṣaghnaṃ kṣayadvīra sumnamasme teastu
GV01rv_01_u:2466: RV_01.114.10.2{06} mṛḷā ca no adhi ca brūhi devādhā ca naḥ śarma yachadvibarhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2467: RV_01.114.11.1{06} avocāma namo asmā avasyavaḥ śṛṇotu no havaṃ rudro marutvān
GV01rv_01_u:2470: RV_01.115.01.2{07} āprā dyāvāpṛthivī antarikṣaṃ sūrya ātmā jagatastasthuṣaśca
GV01rv_01_u:2471: RV_01.115.02.1{07} sūryo devīmuṣasaṃ rocamānāṃ maryo na yoṣāmabhyeti paścāt
GV01rv_01_u:2472: RV_01.115.02.2{07} yatrā naro devayanto yugāni vitanvate prati bhadrāya bhadram
GV01rv_01_u:2473: RV_01.115.03.1{07} bhadrā aśvā haritaḥ sūryasya citrā etagvā anumādyāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2474: RV_01.115.03.2{07} namasyanto diva ā pṛṣṭhamasthuḥ pari dyāvāpṛthivī yanti sadyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2475: RV_01.115.04.1{07} tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvaṃ madhyā kartorvitataṃ saṃ jabhāra
GV01rv_01_u:2476: RV_01.115.04.2{07} yadedayukta haritaḥ sadhasthādād rātrī vāsastanute simasmai
GV01rv_01_u:2477: RV_01.115.05.1{07} tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyorupasthe
GV01rv_01_u:2478: RV_01.115.05.2{07} anantamanyad ruśadasya pājaḥ kṛṣṇamanyad dharitaḥ saṃ bharanti
GV01rv_01_u:2479: RV_01.115.06.1{07} adyā devā uditā sūryasya niraṃhasaḥ pipṛtā naravadyāt
GV01rv_01_u:2481: RV_01.116.01.1{08} nāsatyābhyāṃ barhiriva pra vṛñje stomāniyarmyabhriyeva vātaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2482: RV_01.116.01.2{08} yāvarbhagāya vimadāya jāyāṃ senājuvā nyūhatūrathena
GV01rv_01_u:2483: RV_01.116.02.1{08} vīḷupatmabhirāśuhemabhirvā devānāṃ vā jūtibhiḥ śāśadānā
GV01rv_01_u:2484: RV_01.116.02.2{08} tad rāsabho nāsatyā sahasramājā yamasya pradhane jigāya
GV01rv_01_u:2485: RV_01.116.03.1{08} tugro ha bhujyumaśvinodameghe rayiṃ na kaścin mamṛvānavāhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2488: RV_01.116.04.2{08} samudrasya dhanvannārdrasya pāre tribhī rathaiḥ śatapadbhiḥ ṣaḷaśvaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2492: RV_01.116.06.2{09} tad vāṃ dātraṃ mahi kīrtenyaṃ bhūt paidvo vājīsadamid dhavyo aryaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2493: RV_01.116.07.1{09} yuvaṃ narā stuvate pajriyāya kakṣīvate aradataṃ purandhim
GV01rv_01_u:2494: RV_01.116.07.2{09} kārotarācchaphādaśvasya vṛṣṇaḥ śataṃ kumbhānasiñcataṃ surāyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2496: RV_01.116.08.2{09} ṛbīse atrimaśvināvanītamun ninyathuḥ sarvagaṇaṃ svasti
GV01rv_01_u:2498: RV_01.116.09.2{09} kṣarannāpo na pāyanāya rāye sahasrāya tṛṣyate gotamasya
GV01rv_01_u:2499: RV_01.116.10.1{09} jujuruṣo nāsatyota vavriṃ prāmuñcataṃ drāpimiva cyavānāt
GV01rv_01_u:2501: RV_01.116.11.1{10} tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ rādhyaṃ cābhiṣṭiman nāsatyā varūtham
GV01rv_01_u:2503: RV_01.116.12.1{10} tad vāṃ narā sanaye daṃsa ugramāviṣ kṛṇomi tanyaturnavṛṣṭim
GV01rv_01_u:2504: RV_01.116.12.2{10} dadhyaṃ ha yan madhvātharvaṇo vāmaśvasya śīrṣṇā pra yadīmuvāca
GV01rv_01_u:2505: RV_01.116.13.1{10} ajohavīn nāsatyā karā vāṃ mahe yāman purubhujā purandhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2507: RV_01.116.14.1{10} āsno vṛkasya vartikāmabhīke yuvaṃ narā nāsatyāmumuktam
GV01rv_01_u:2508: RV_01.116.14.2{10} uto kaviṃ purubhujā yuvaṃ ha kṛpamāṇamakṛṇutaṃ vicakṣe
GV01rv_01_u:2509: RV_01.116.15.1{10} caritraṃ hi verivāchedi parṇamājā khelasya paritakmyāyām
GV01rv_01_u:2510: RV_01.116.15.2{10} sadyo jaṅghāmāyasīṃ viśpalāyai dhane hite sartavepratyadhattam
GV01rv_01_u:2511: RV_01.116.16.1{11} śataṃ meṣān vṛkye cakṣadānam ṛjrāśvaṃ taṃ pitāndhaṃcakāra
GV01rv_01_u:2512: RV_01.116.16.2{11} tasmā akṣī nāsatyā vicakṣa ādhattaṃ dasrā bhiṣajāvanarvan
GV01rv_01_u:2513: RV_01.116.17.1{11} ā vāṃ rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya kārṣmevātiṣṭhadarvatājayantī
GV01rv_01_u:2514: RV_01.116.17.2{11} viśve devā anvamanyata hṛdbhiḥ samu śriyā nāsatyā sacethe
GV01rv_01_u:2516: RV_01.116.18.2{11} revaduvāha sacano ratho vāṃ vṛṣabhaśca śiṃśumāraśca yuktā
GV01rv_01_u:2517: RV_01.116.19.1{11} rayiṃ sukṣatraṃ svapatyamāyuḥ suvīryaṃ nāsatyā vahantā
GV01rv_01_u:2518: RV_01.116.19.2{11} ā jahnāvīṃ samanasopa vājaistrirahno bhāgaṃ dadhatīmayātam
GV01rv_01_u:2519: RV_01.116.20.1{11} pariviṣṭaṃ jāhuṣaṃ viśvataḥ sīṃ sugebhirnaktamūhathū rajobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2520: RV_01.116.20.2{11} vibhindunā nāsatyā rathena vi parvatānajarayū ayātam
GV01rv_01_u:2521: RV_01.116.21.1{12} ekasyā vastorāvataṃ raṇāya vaśamaśvinā sanaye sahasrā
GV01rv_01_u:2522: RV_01.116.21.2{12} nirahataṃ duchunā indravantā pṛthuśravaso vṛṣaṇāvarātīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2523: RV_01.116.22.1{12} śarasya cidārcatkasyāvatādā nīcāduccā cakrathuḥ pātave vāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2524: RV_01.116.22.2{12} śayave cin nāsatyā śacībhirjasuraye staryaṃ pipyathurgām
GV01rv_01_u:2525: RV_01.116.23.1{12} avasyate stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya ṛjūyate nāsatyā śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2526: RV_01.116.23.2{12} paśuṃ na naṣṭamiva darśanāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathurviśvakāya
GV01rv_01_u:2527: RV_01.116.24.1{12} daśa rātrīraśivenā nava dyūnavanaddhaṃ śnathitamapsvantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2528: RV_01.116.24.2{12} viprutaṃ rebhamudani pravṛktamun ninyathuḥ somamiva sruveṇa
GV01rv_01_u:2529: RV_01.116.25.1{12} pra vāṃ daṃsāṃsyaśvināvavocamasya patiḥ syāṃ sugavaḥ suvīraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2531: RV_01.117.01.1{13} madhvaḥ somasyāśvinā madāya pratno hotā vivāsate vām
GV01rv_01_u:2532: RV_01.117.01.2{13} barhiṣmatī rātirviśritā gīriṣā yātaṃ nāsatyopa vājaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2533: RV_01.117.02.1{13} yo vāmaśvinā manaso javīyān rathaḥ svaśvo viśa ājigāti
GV01rv_01_u:2534: RV_01.117.02.2{13} yena gachathaḥ sukṛto duroṇaṃ tena narā vartirasmabhyaṃ yātam
GV01rv_01_u:2535: RV_01.117.03.1{13} ṛṣiṃ narāvaṃhasaḥ pāñcajanyam ṛbīsādatriṃ muñcatho gaṇena
GV01rv_01_u:2536: RV_01.117.03.2{13} minantā dasyoraśivasya māyā anupūrvaṃ vṛṣaṇā codayantā
GV01rv_01_u:2537: RV_01.117.04.1{13} aśvaṃ na gūḷhamaśvinā durevairṛṣiṃ narā vṛṣaṇā rebhamapsu
GV01rv_01_u:2538: RV_01.117.04.2{13} saṃ taṃ riṇītho viprutaṃ daṃsobhirna vāṃ jūryanti pūrvyā kṛtāni
GV01rv_01_u:2539: RV_01.117.05.1{13} suṣupvāṃsaṃ na nirṛterupasthe sūryaṃ na dasrā tamasi kṣiyantam
GV01rv_01_u:2540: RV_01.117.05.2{13} śubhe rukmaṃ na darśataṃ nikhātamudūpathuraśvinā vandanāya
GV01rv_01_u:2541: RV_01.117.06.1{14} tad vāṃ narā śaṃsyaṃ pajriyeṇa kakṣīvatā nāsatyā parijman
GV01rv_01_u:2542: RV_01.117.06.2{14} śaphādaśvasya vājino janāya śataṃ kumbhānasiñcataṃ madhūnām
GV01rv_01_u:2543: RV_01.117.07.1{14} yuvaṃ narā stuvate kṛṣṇiyāya viṣṇāpvaṃ dadathurviśvakāya
GV01rv_01_u:2544: RV_01.117.07.2{14} ghoṣāyai cit pitṛṣade durone patiṃ jūryantyā aśvināvadattam
GV01rv_01_u:2545: RV_01.117.08.1{14} yuvaṃ śyāvāya ruśatīmadattaṃ mahaḥ kṣoṇasyāśvinā kaṇvāya
GV01rv_01_u:2546: RV_01.117.08.2{14} pravācyaṃ tad vṛṣaṇā kṛtaṃ vāṃ yan nārṣadāyaśravo adhyadhattam
GV01rv_01_u:2547: RV_01.117.09.1{14} purū varpāṃsyaśvinā dadhānā ni pedava ūhathurāśumaśvam
GV01rv_01_u:2549: RV_01.117.10.1{14} etāni vāṃ śravasyā sudānū brahmāṅgūṣaṃ sadanaṃ rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2550: RV_01.117.10.2{14} yad vāṃ pajrāso aśvinā havante yātamiṣā ca viduṣe ca vājam
GV01rv_01_u:2551: RV_01.117.11.1{15} sūnormānenāśvinā gṛṇānā vājaṃ viprāya bhuraṇā radantā
GV01rv_01_u:2552: RV_01.117.11.2{15} agastye brahmaṇā vāvṛdhānā saṃ viśpalāṃ nāsatyāriṇītam
GV01rv_01_u:2553: RV_01.117.12.1{15} kuha yāntā suṣṭutiṃ kāvyasya divo napātā vṛṣaṇā śayutrā
GV01rv_01_u:2555: RV_01.117.13.1{15} yuvaṃ cyavānamaśvinā jarantaṃ punaryuvānaṃ cakrathuḥ śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2556: RV_01.117.13.2{15} yuvo rathaṃ duhitā sūryasya saha śriyā nāsatyāvṛṇīta
GV01rv_01_u:2557: RV_01.117.14.1{15} yuvaṃ tugrāya pūrvyebhirevaiḥ punarmanyāvabhavataṃ yuvānā
GV01rv_01_u:2558: RV_01.117.14.2{15} yuvaṃ bhujyumarṇaso niḥ samudrād vibhirūhathurṛjrebhiraśvaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2559: RV_01.117.15.1{15} ajohavīdaśvinā taugryo vāṃ proḷhaḥ samudramavyathirjaganvān
GV01rv_01_u:2560: RV_01.117.15.2{15} niṣ ṭamūhathuḥ suyujā rathena manojavasā vṛṣaṇāsvasti
GV01rv_01_u:2561: RV_01.117.16.1{16} ajohavīdaśvinā vartikā vāmāsno yat sīmamuñcataṃ vṛkasya
GV01rv_01_u:2562: RV_01.117.16.2{16} vi jayuṣā yayathuḥ sānvadrerjātaṃ viṣvāco ahataṃ viṣeṇa
GV01rv_01_u:2563: RV_01.117.17.1{16} śataṃ meṣān vṛkye māmahānaṃ tamaḥ praṇītamaśivena pitrā
GV01rv_01_u:2564: RV_01.117.17.2{16} ākṣī ṛjrāśve aśvināvadhattaṃ jyotirandhāya cakrathurvicakṣe
GV01rv_01_u:2565: RV_01.117.18.1{16} śunamandhāya bharamahvayat sā vṛkīraśvinā vṛṣaṇā nareti
GV01rv_01_u:2566: RV_01.117.18.2{16} jāraḥ kanīna iva cakṣadāna ṛjrāśvaḥ śatamekaṃca meṣān
GV01rv_01_u:2567: RV_01.117.19.1{16} mahī vāmūtiraśvinā mayobhūruta srāmaṃ dhiṣṇyā saṃriṇīthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2568: RV_01.117.19.2{16} athā yuvāmidahvayat purandhirāgachataṃ sīṃ vṛṣaṇāvavobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2569: RV_01.117.20.1{16} adhenuṃ dasrā staryaṃ viṣakṭāmapinvataṃ śayave aśvināgām
GV01rv_01_u:2570: RV_01.117.20.2{16} yuvaṃ śacībhirvimadāya jāyāṃ nyūhathuḥ purumitrasya yoṣām
GV01rv_01_u:2571: RV_01.117.21.1{17} yavaṃ vṛkeṇāśvinā vapanteṣaṃ duhantā manuṣāya dasrā
GV01rv_01_u:2572: RV_01.117.21.2{17} abhi dasyuṃ bakureṇā dhamantoru jyotiścakrathurāryāya
GV01rv_01_u:2574: RV_01.117.22.2{17} sa vāṃ madhu pra vocad ṛtāyan tvāṣṭraṃ yad dasrāvapikakṣyaṃ vām
GV01rv_01_u:2575: RV_01.117.23.1{17} sadā kavī sumatimā cake vāṃ viśvā dhiyo aśvinā prāvataṃ me
GV01rv_01_u:2576: RV_01.117.23.2{17} asme rayiṃ nāsatyā bṛhantamapatyasācaṃ śrutyaṃ rarāthām
GV01rv_01_u:2577: RV_01.117.24.1{17} hiraṇyahastamaśvinā rarāṇā putraṃ narā vadhrimatyā adattam
GV01rv_01_u:2578: RV_01.117.24.2{17} tridhā ha śyāvamaśvinā vikastamujjīvasa airayataṃsudānū
GV01rv_01_u:2579: RV_01.117.25.1{17} etāni vāmaśvinā vīryāṇi pra pūrvyāṇyāyavo 'vocan
GV01rv_01_u:2580: RV_01.117.25.2{17} brahmakṛṇvanto vṛṣaṇā yuvabhyāṃ suvīrāso vidathamā vadema
GV01rv_01_u:2581: RV_01.118.01.1{18} ā vāṃ ratho aśvinā śyenapatvā sumṛḷīkaḥ svavān yātvarvāṃ
GV01rv_01_u:2582: RV_01.118.01.2{18} yo martyasya manaso javīyān trivandhuro vṛṣaṇā vātaraṃhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2583: RV_01.118.02.1{18} trivandhureṇa trivṛtā rathena tricakreṇa suvṛtā yātamarvāk
GV01rv_01_u:2584: RV_01.118.02.2{18} pinvataṃ gā jinvatamarvato no vardhayatamaśvinā vīramasme
GV01rv_01_u:2585: RV_01.118.03.1{18} pravadyāmanā suvṛtā rathena dasrāvimaṃ śṛṇutaṃ ślokamadreḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2586: RV_01.118.03.2{18} kimaṅga vāṃ pratyavartiṃ gamiṣṭhāhurviprāsoaśvinā purājāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2587: RV_01.118.04.1{18} ā vāṃ śyenāso aśvinā vahantu rathe yuktāsa āśavaḥ pataṃgāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2588: RV_01.118.04.2{18} ye apturo divyāso na gṛdhrā abhi prayo nāsatyā vahanti
GV01rv_01_u:2589: RV_01.118.05.1{18} ā vāṃ rathaṃ yuvatistiṣṭhadatra juṣṭvī narā duhitāsūryasya
GV01rv_01_u:2590: RV_01.118.05.2{18} pari vāmaśvā vapuṣaḥ pataṃgā vayo vahantvaruṣā abhīke
GV01rv_01_u:2591: RV_01.118.06.1{19} ud vandanamairataṃ daṃsanābhirud rebhaṃ dasrā vṛṣaṇā śacībhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2592: RV_01.118.06.2{19} niṣ ṭaugryaṃ pārayathaḥ samudrāt punaścyavānaṃ cakrathuryuvānam
GV01rv_01_u:2594: RV_01.118.07.2{19} yuvaṃ kaṇvāyāpiriptāya cakṣuḥ pratyadhattaṃ suṣṭutiṃ jujuṣāṇā
GV01rv_01_u:2595: RV_01.118.08.1{19} yuvaṃ dhenuṃ śayave nādhitāyāpinvatamaśvinā pūrvyāya
GV01rv_01_u:2596: RV_01.118.08.2{19} amuñcataṃ vartikāmaṃhaso niḥ prati jaṅghāṃ viśpalāyā adhattam
GV01rv_01_u:2598: RV_01.118.09.2{19} johūtramaryo abhibhūtimugraṃ sahasrasāṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ vīḍvaṅgam
GV01rv_01_u:2599: RV_01.118.10.1{19} tā vāṃ narā svavase sujātā havāmahe aśvinā nādhamānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2600: RV_01.118.10.2{19} ā na upa vasumatā rathena giro jusānā suvitāya yātam
GV01rv_01_u:2601: RV_01.118.11.1{19} ā śyenasya javasā nūtanenāsme yātaṃ nāsatyā sajoṣāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2602: RV_01.118.11.2{19} have hi vāmaśvinā rātahavyaḥ śaśvattamāyā uṣaso vyuṣṭau
GV01rv_01_u:2603: RV_01.119.01.1{20} ā vāṃ rathaṃ purumāyaṃ manojuvaṃ jīrāśvaṃ yajñiyaṃ jīvase huve
GV01rv_01_u:2604: RV_01.119.01.2{20} sahasraketuṃ vaninaṃ śatadvasuṃ śruṣṭīvānaṃ varivodhāmabhi prayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2605: RV_01.119.02.1{20} ūrdhvā dhītiḥ pratyasya prayāmanyadhāyi śasman samayanta ā diśaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2606: RV_01.119.02.2{20} svadāmi gharmaṃ prati yantyūtaya ā vāmūrjānī rathamaśvināruhat
GV01rv_01_u:2607: RV_01.119.03.1{20} saṃ yan mithaḥ paspṛdhānāso agmata śubhe makhā amitā jāyavo raṇe
GV01rv_01_u:2608: RV_01.119.03.2{20} yuvoraha pravaṇe cekite ratho yadaśvinā vahathaḥ sūrimā varam
GV01rv_01_u:2609: RV_01.119.04.1{20} yuvaṃ bhujyuṃ bhuramāṇaṃ vibhirgataṃ svayuktibhirnivahantā pitṛbhya ā
GV01rv_01_u:2610: RV_01.119.04.2{20} yāsiṣṭaṃ vartirvṛṣaṇā vijenyaṃ divodāsāya mahi ceti vāmavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2611: RV_01.119.05.1{20} yuvoraśvinā vapuṣe yuvāyujaṃ rathaṃ vāṇī yematurasya śardhyam
GV01rv_01_u:2612: RV_01.119.05.2{20} ā vāṃ patitvaṃ sakhyāya jagmuṣī yoṣāvṛṇītajenyā yuvāṃ patī
GV01rv_01_u:2613: RV_01.119.06.1{21} yuvaṃ rebhaṃ pariṣūteruruṣyatho himena gharmaṃ paritaptamatraye
GV01rv_01_u:2614: RV_01.119.06.2{21} yuvaṃ śayoravasaṃ pipyathurgavi pra dīrgheṇa vandanastāryāyuṣā
GV01rv_01_u:2615: RV_01.119.07.1{21} yuvaṃ vandanaṃ nirṛtaṃ jaraṇyayā rathaṃ na dasrā karaṇā saminvathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2616: RV_01.119.07.2{21} kṣetrādā vipraṃ janatho vipanyayā pra vāmatra vidhate daṃsanā bhuvat
GV01rv_01_u:2617: RV_01.119.08.1{21} agachataṃ kṛpamāṇaṃ parāvati pituḥ svasya tyajasā nibādhitam
GV01rv_01_u:2618: RV_01.119.08.2{21} svarvatīrita ūtīryuvoraha citrā abhīke abhavannabhiṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2619: RV_01.119.09.1{21} uta syā vāṃ madhuman makṣikārapan made somasyauśijo huvanyati
GV01rv_01_u:2620: RV_01.119.09.2{21} yuvaṃ dadhīco mana ā vivāsatho 'thā śiraḥ prati vāmaśvyaṃ vadat
GV01rv_01_u:2621: RV_01.119.10.1{21} yuvaṃ pedave puruvāramaśvinā spṛdhāṃ śvetaṃ tarutāranduvasyathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2622: RV_01.119.10.2{21} śaryairabhidyuṃ pṛtanāsu duṣṭaraṃ carkṛtyamindramiva carṣaṇīsaham
GV01rv_01_u:2623: RV_01.120.01.1{22} kā rādhad dhotrāśvinā vāṃ ko vāṃ joṣa ubhayoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2626: RV_01.120.02.2{22} nū cin nu marte akrau
GV01rv_01_u:2627: RV_01.120.03.1{22} tā vidvāṃsā havāmahe vāṃ tā no vidvāṃsā manma vocetamadya
GV01rv_01_u:2629: RV_01.120.04.1{22} vi pṛchāmi pākyā na devān vaṣaṭkṛtasyādbhutasya dasrā
GV01rv_01_u:2630: RV_01.120.04.2{22} pātaṃ ca sahyaso yuvaṃ ca rabhyaso naḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2631: RV_01.120.05.1{22} pra yā ghoṣe bhṛgavāṇe na śobhe yayā vācā yajati pajriyo vām
GV01rv_01_u:2633: RV_01.120.06.1{23} śrutaṃ gāyatraṃ takavānasyāhaṃ cid dhi rirebhāśvinā vām
GV01rv_01_u:2635: RV_01.120.07.1{23} yuvaṃ hyāstaṃ maho ran yuvaṃ vā yan niratataṃsatam
GV01rv_01_u:2636: RV_01.120.07.2{23} tāno vasū sugopā syātaṃ pātaṃ no vṛkādaghāyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2637: RV_01.120.08.1{23} mā kasmai dhātamabhyamitriṇe no mākutrā no gṛhebhyo dhenavo guḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2639: RV_01.120.09.1{23} duhīyan mitradhitaye yuvāku rāye ca no mimītaṃ vājavatyai
GV01rv_01_u:2640: RV_01.120.09.2{23} iṣe ca no mimītaṃ dhenumatyai
GV01rv_01_u:2643: RV_01.120.11.1{23} ayaṃ samaha mā tanūhyāte janānanu
GV01rv_01_u:2647: RV_01.121.01.1{24} kaditthā nṝnḥ pātraṃ devayatāṃ śravad giro aṅgirasāṃ turaṇyan
GV01rv_01_u:2648: RV_01.121.01.2{24} pra yadānaḍ viśa ā harmyasyoru kraṃsate adhvare yajatraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2649: RV_01.121.02.1{24} stambhīd dha dyāṃ sa dharuṇaṃ pruṣāyad ṛbhurvājāya draviṇaṃ naro goḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2650: RV_01.121.02.2{24} anu svājāṃ mahiṣaścakṣata vrāṃ menāmaśvasya pari mātaraṃ goḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2651: RV_01.121.03.1{24} nakṣad dhavamaruṇīḥ pūrvyaṃ rāṭ turo viśāmaṅgirasāmanu dyūn
GV01rv_01_u:2652: RV_01.121.03.2{24} takṣad vajraṃ niyutaṃ tastambhad dyāṃ catuṣpade naryāya dvipāde
GV01rv_01_u:2653: RV_01.121.04.1{24} asya made svaryaṃ dā ṛtāyāpīvṛtamusriyāṇāmanīkam
GV01rv_01_u:2654: RV_01.121.04.2{24} yad dha prasarge trikakuṃ nivartadapa druho mānuṣasya duro vaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2655: RV_01.121.05.1{24} tubhyaṃ payo yat pitarāvanītāṃ rādhaḥ suretasturaṇe bhuraṇyū
GV01rv_01_u:2656: RV_01.121.05.2{24} śuci yat te rekṇa āyajanta sabardughāyāḥ payausriyāyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2657: RV_01.121.06.1{25} adha pra jajñe taraṇirmamattu pra rocyasyā uṣaso na sūraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2658: RV_01.121.06.2{25} induryebhirāṣṭa sveduhavyaiḥ sruveṇa siñcañ jaraṇābhi dhāma
GV01rv_01_u:2659: RV_01.121.07.1{25} svidhmā yad vanadhitirapasyāt sūro adhvare pari rodhanā goḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2660: RV_01.121.07.2{25} yad dha prabhāsi kṛtvyānanu dyūnanarviśe paśviṣeturāya
GV01rv_01_u:2661: RV_01.121.08.1{25} aṣṭā maho diva ādo harī iha dyumnāsāhamabhi yodhānautsam
GV01rv_01_u:2662: RV_01.121.08.2{25} hariṃ yat te mandinaṃ dukṣan vṛdhe gorabhasamadribhirvātāpyam
GV01rv_01_u:2663: RV_01.121.09.1{25} tvamāyasaṃ prati vartayo gordivo aśmānamupanītam ṛbhvā
GV01rv_01_u:2664: RV_01.121.09.2{25} kutsāya yatra puruhūta vanvañchuṣṇamanantaiḥ pariyāsi vadhaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2665: RV_01.121.10.1{25} purā yat sūrastamaso apītestamadrivaḥ phaligaṃ hetimasya
GV01rv_01_u:2666: RV_01.121.10.2{25} śuṣṇasya cit parihitaṃ yadojo divas pari sugrathitaṃ tadādaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2667: RV_01.121.11.1{26} anu tvā mahī pājasī acakre dyāvākṣāmā madatāmindra karman
GV01rv_01_u:2668: RV_01.121.11.2{26} tvaṃ vṛtramāśayānaṃ sirāsu maho vajreṇa siṣvapovarāhum
GV01rv_01_u:2669: RV_01.121.12.1{26} tvamindra naryo yānavo nṝn tiṣṭhā vātasya suyujo vahiṣṭhān
GV01rv_01_u:2670: RV_01.121.12.2{26} yaṃ te kāvya uśanā mandinaṃ dād vṛtrahaṇaṃ pāryaṃ tatakṣa vajram
GV01rv_01_u:2671: RV_01.121.13.1{26} tvaṃ sūro harito rāmayo nṝn bharaccakrametaśo nāyamindra
GV01rv_01_u:2672: RV_01.121.13.2{26} prāsya pāraṃ navatiṃ nāvyānāmapi kartamavartayo'yajyūn
GV01rv_01_u:2673: RV_01.121.14.1{26} tvaṃ no asyā indra durhaṇāyāḥ pāhi vajrivo duritādabhīke
GV01rv_01_u:2674: RV_01.121.14.2{26} pra no vājān rathyo aśvabudhyāniṣe yandhi śravase sūnṛtāyai
GV01rv_01_u:2675: RV_01.121.15.1{26} mā sā te asmat sumatirvi dasad vājapramahaḥ samiṣo varanta
GV01rv_01_u:2676: RV_01.121.15.2{26} ā no bhaja maghavan goṣvaryo maṃhiṣṭhāste sadhamādaḥ syāma
GV01rv_01_u:2677: RV_01.122.01.1{01} pra vaḥ pāntaṃ raghumanyavo 'ndho yajñaṃ rudrāya mīḷhuṣe bharadvam
GV01rv_01_u:2678: RV_01.122.01.2{01} divo astoṣyasurasya vīrairiṣudhye=va maruto rodasyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2679: RV_01.122.02.1{01} patnīva pūrvahūtiṃ vāvṛdhadhyā uṣāsānaktā purudhā vidāne
GV01rv_01_u:2680: RV_01.122.02.2{01} starīr nātkaṃ vyutaṃ vasānā sūryasya śriyā sudṛśī hiraṇyaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2681: RV_01.122.03.1{01} mamattu naḥ parijmā vasarhā mamattu vāto apāṃ vṛṣaṇvān
GV01rv_01_u:2682: RV_01.122.03.2{01} śiśītamindrāparvatā yuvaṃ nastan no viśve varivasyantudevāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2683: RV_01.122.04.1{01} uta tyā me yaśasā śvetanāyai vyantā pāntauśijo huvadhyai
GV01rv_01_u:2684: RV_01.122.04.2{01} pra vo napātamapā%ṃ kṛṇudhvaṃ pra mātarā rāspinasyāyoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2685: RV_01.122.05.1{01} ā vo ruvaṇyumauśijo huvadhyai ghoṣeva śaṃsamarjunasya naṃśe
GV01rv_01_u:2686: RV_01.122.05.2{01} pra vaḥ pūṣṇe dāvana ānachā voceya vasutātimagneḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2687: RV_01.122.06.1{02} śrutaṃ me mitrāvaruṇā havemota śrutaṃ sadane viśvataḥ sīm
GV01rv_01_u:2688: RV_01.122.06.2{02} śrotu naḥ śroturātiḥ suśrotuḥ sukṣetrā sindhuradbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2689: RV_01.122.07.1{02} stuṣe sā vāṃ varuṇa mitra rātirgavāṃ śatā pṛkṣayāmeṣu pajre
GV01rv_01_u:2690: RV_01.122.07.2{02} śrutarathe priyarathe dadhānāḥ sadyaḥ puṣṭiṃnirundhānāso agman
GV01rv_01_u:2691: RV_01.122.08.1{02} asya stuṣe mahimaghasya rādhaḥ sacā sanema nahuṣaḥ suvīrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2692: RV_01.122.08.2{02} jano yaḥ pajrebhyo vājinīvānaśvāvato rathino mahyaṃ sūriḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2693: RV_01.122.09.1{02} jano yo mitrāvaruṇāvabhidhrugapo na vāṃ sunotyakṣṇayādhruk
GV01rv_01_u:2694: RV_01.122.09.2{02} svayaṃ sa yakṣmaṃ hṛdaye ni dhatta āpa yadīṃ hotrābhirṛtāvā
GV01rv_01_u:2695: RV_01.122.10.1{02} sa vrādhato nahuṣo daṃsujūtaḥ śardhastaro narāṃ gūrtaśravāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2696: RV_01.122.10.2{02} visṛṣṭarātiryāti bāḷhasṛtvā viśvāsu pṛtsu sadamicchūraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2697: RV_01.122.11.1{03} adha gmantā nahuṣo havaṃ sūreḥ śrotā rājāno amṛtasya mandrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2698: RV_01.122.11.2{03} nabhojuvo yan niravasya rādhaḥ praśastaye mahinārathavate
GV01rv_01_u:2699: RV_01.122.12.1{03} etaṃ śardhaṃ dhāma yasya sūrerityavocan daśatayasya naṃśe
GV01rv_01_u:2700: RV_01.122.12.2{03} dyumnāni yeṣu vasutātī rāran viśve sanvantu prabhṛtheṣu vājam
GV01rv_01_u:2701: RV_01.122.13.1{03} mandāmahe daśatayasya dhāserdviryat pañca bibhrato yantyannā
GV01rv_01_u:2703: RV_01.122.14.1{03} hiraṇyakarṇaṃ maṇigrīvamarṇastan no viśve varivasyantu devāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2704: RV_01.122.14.2{03} aryo giraḥ sadya ā jagmuṣīrosrāścākantūbhayeṣvasme
GV01rv_01_u:2705: RV_01.122.15.1{03} catvāro mā maśarśārasya śiśvastrayo rājña āyavasasyajiṣṇoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2706: RV_01.122.15.2{03} ratho vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā dīrghā]psāḥ syūmagabhastiḥ sūro nādyaut
GV01rv_01_u:2707: RV_01.123.01.1{04} pṛthū ratho dakṣiṇāyā ayojyainaṃ devāso amṛtāso asthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2709: RV_01.123.02.1{04} pūrvā viśvasmād bhuvanādabodhi jayantī vājaṃ bṛhatī sanutrī
GV01rv_01_u:2710: RV_01.123.02.2{04} uccā vyakhyad yuvatiḥ punarbhūroṣā agan prathamā pūrvahūtau
GV01rv_01_u:2711: RV_01.123.03.1{04} yadadya bhāgaṃ vibhajāsi nṛbhya uṣo devi martyatrā sujāte
GV01rv_01_u:2712: RV_01.123.03.2{04} devo no atra savitā damūnā anāgaso vocati sūryāya
GV01rv_01_u:2713: RV_01.123.04.1{04} gṛhaṃ-gṛhamahanā yātyachā dive-dive adhi nāmā dadhānā
GV01rv_01_u:2715: RV_01.123.05.1{04} bhagasya svasā varuṇasya jāmiruṣaḥ sūnṛte prathamā jarasva
GV01rv_01_u:2716: RV_01.123.05.2{04} paścā sa daghyā yo aghasya dhātā jayema taṃ dakṣiṇayā rathena
GV01rv_01_u:2717: RV_01.123.06.1{05} udīratāṃ sūnṛtā ut purandhīrudagnayaḥ śuśucānāsoasthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2718: RV_01.123.06.2{05} spārhā vasūni tamasāpagūḷhāviṣ kṛṇvantyuṣaso vibhātīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2719: RV_01.123.07.1{05} apānyadetyabhyanyadeti viṣurūpe ahanī saṃ carete
GV01rv_01_u:2720: RV_01.123.07.2{05} parikṣitostamo anyā guhākaradyauduṣāḥ śośucatā rathena
GV01rv_01_u:2721: RV_01.123.08.1{05} sadṛśīradya sadṛśīridu śvo dīrghaṃ sacante varuṇasyadhāma
GV01rv_01_u:2722: RV_01.123.08.2{05} anavadyāstriṃśataṃ yojanānyekaikā kratuṃ pariyanti sadyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2723: RV_01.123.09.1{05} jānatyahnaḥ prathamasya nāma śukrā kṛṣṇādajaniṣṭa śvitīcī
GV01rv_01_u:2724: RV_01.123.09.2{05} ṛtasya yoṣā na mināti dhāmāhar aharniṣkṛtamācarantī
GV01rv_01_u:2725: RV_01.123.10.1{05} kanyeva tanvā śāśadānāneṣi devi devamiyakṣamāṇam
GV01rv_01_u:2726: RV_01.123.10.2{05} saṃsmayamānā yuvatiḥ purastādāvirvakṣāṃsi kṛṇuṣe vibhātī
GV01rv_01_u:2727: RV_01.123.11.1{06} susaṃkāśā mātṛmṛṣṭeva yoṣāvistanvaṃ kṛṇuṣe dṛśe kam
GV01rv_01_u:2728: RV_01.123.11.2{06} bhadrā tvamuṣo vitaraṃ vyucha na tat te anyā uṣasonaśanta
GV01rv_01_u:2730: RV_01.123.12.2{06} parā ca yanti punarā ca yanti bhadrā nāma vahamānāuṣāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2731: RV_01.123.13.1{06} ṛtasya raśmimanuyachamānā bhadram-bhadraṃ kratumasmāsu dhehi
GV01rv_01_u:2732: RV_01.123.13.2{06} uṣo no adya suhavā vyuchāsmāsu rāyo maghavatsu ca syuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2733: RV_01.124.01.1{07} uṣā uchantī samidhāne agnā udyan sūrya urviyā jyotiraśret
GV01rv_01_u:2734: RV_01.124.01.2{07} devo no atra savitā nvarthaṃ prāsāvīd dvipat pra catuṣpadityai
GV01rv_01_u:2735: RV_01.124.02.1{07} aminatī daivyāni vratāni praminatī manuṣyā yugāni
GV01rv_01_u:2737: RV_01.124.03.1{07} eṣā divo duhitā pratyadarśi jyotirvasānā samanā purastāt
GV01rv_01_u:2738: RV_01.124.03.2{07} ṛtasya panthāmanveti sādhu prajānatīva na diśo mināti
GV01rv_01_u:2739: RV_01.124.04.1{07} upo adarśi śundhyuvo na vakṣo nodhā ivāvirakṛta priyāṇi
GV01rv_01_u:2740: RV_01.124.04.2{07} admasan na sasato bodhayantī śaśvattamāgāt punareyuṣīṇām
GV01rv_01_u:2741: RV_01.124.05.1{07} pūrve ardhe rajaso aptyasya gavāṃ janitryakṛta pra ketum
GV01rv_01_u:2742: RV_01.124.05.2{07} vyu prathate vitaraṃ varīya obhā pṛṇantī pitrorupasthā
GV01rv_01_u:2743: RV_01.124.06.1{08} evedeṣā purutamā dṛśe kaṃ nājāmiṃ na pari vṛṇakti jāmim
GV01rv_01_u:2744: RV_01.124.06.2{08} arepasā tanvā śāśadānā nārbhādīṣate na mahovibhātī
GV01rv_01_u:2745: RV_01.124.07.1{08} abhrāteva puṃsa eti pratīcī gartārugiva sanaye dhanānām
GV01rv_01_u:2746: RV_01.124.07.2{08} jāyeya patya uśatī suvāsā uṣā hasreva ni riṇīte apsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2747: RV_01.124.08.1{08} svasā svasre jyāyasyai yonimāraigapaityasyāḥ praticakṣyeva
GV01rv_01_u:2748: RV_01.124.08.2{08} vyuchantī raśmibhiḥ sūryasyāñjyaṅkte samanagā ivavrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2749: RV_01.124.09.1{08} āsāṃ pūrvāsāmahasu svasṝṇāmaparā pūrvāmabhyeti paścāt
GV01rv_01_u:2750: RV_01.124.09.2{08} tāḥ pratnavan navyasīrnūnamasme revaduchantu sudinā uṣāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2751: RV_01.124.10.1{08} pra bodhayoṣaḥ pṛṇato maghonyabudhyamānāḥ paṇayaḥ sasantu
GV01rv_01_u:2752: RV_01.124.10.2{08} revaducha maghavadbhyo maghoni revat stotre sūnṛte jārayantī
GV01rv_01_u:2753: RV_01.124.11.1{09} aveyamaśvaid yuvatiḥ purastād yuṅkte gavāmaruṇānāmanīkam
GV01rv_01_u:2754: RV_01.124.11.2{09} vi nūnamuchādasati pra keturgṛhaṃ-gṛhamupa tiṣṭhāte agniḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2755: RV_01.124.12.1{09} ut te vayaścid vasaterapaptan naraśca ye pitubhājo vyuṣṭau
GV01rv_01_u:2756: RV_01.124.12.2{09} amā sate vahasi bhūri vāmamuṣo devi dāśuṣe martyāya
GV01rv_01_u:2758: RV_01.124.13.2{09} yuṣmākaṃ devīravasā sanema sahasriṇaṃ ca śatinaṃ cavājam
GV01rv_01_u:2759: RV_01.125.01.1{10} prātā ratnaṃ prātaritvā dadhāti taṃ cikitvān pratigṛhyāni dhatte
GV01rv_01_u:2760: RV_01.125.01.2{10} tena prajāṃ vardhayamāna āyū rāyas poṣeṇa sacate suvīraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2761: RV_01.125.02.1{10} sugurasat suhiraṇyaḥ svaśvo bṛhadasmai vaya indro dadhāti
GV01rv_01_u:2762: RV_01.125.02.2{10} yastvāyantaṃ vasunā prātaritvo mukṣījayeva padimutsināti
GV01rv_01_u:2763: RV_01.125.03.1{10} āyamadya sukṛtaṃ prātarichanniṣṭeḥ putraṃ vasumatā rathena
GV01rv_01_u:2764: RV_01.125.03.2{10} aṃśoḥ sutaṃ pāyaya matsarasya kṣayadvīraṃ vardhaya sūnṛtābhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2765: RV_01.125.04.1{10} upa kṣaranti sindhavo mayobhuva ījānaṃ ca yakṣyamāṇaṃ cadhenavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2766: RV_01.125.04.2{10} pṛṇantaṃ ca papuriṃ ca śravasyavo ghṛtasya dhārā upa yanti viśvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2767: RV_01.125.05.1{10} nākasya pṛṣṭhe adhi tiṣṭhati śrito yaḥ pṛṇāti sa ha deveṣu gachati
GV01rv_01_u:2768: RV_01.125.05.2{10} tasmā āpo ghṛtamarṣanti sindhavastasmā iyaṃ dakṣiṇā pinvate sadā
GV01rv_01_u:2769: RV_01.125.06.1{10} dakṣiṇāvatāmidimāni citrā dakṣiṇāvatāṃ divi sūryāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2770: RV_01.125.06.2{10} dakṣiṇāvanto amṛtaṃ bhajante dakṣiṇāvantaḥ pra tiranta āyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2771: RV_01.125.07.1{10} mā pṛṇanto duritamena āran mā jāriṣuḥ sūrayaḥ suvratāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2772: RV_01.125.07.2{10} anyasteṣāṃ paridhirastu kaścidapṛṇantamabhi saṃ yantu śokāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2773: RV_01.126.01.1{11} amandān stomān pra bhare manīṣā sindhāvadhi kṣiyato bhāvyasya
GV01rv_01_u:2774: RV_01.126.01.2{11} yo me sahasramamimīta savānatūrto rājā śravaichamānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2775: RV_01.126.02.1{11} śataṃ rājño nādhamānasya niṣkāñchatamaśvān prayatān sadya ādam
GV01rv_01_u:2776: RV_01.126.02.2{11} śataṃ kakṣīvānasurasya gonāṃ divi śravo 'jaramā tatāna
GV01rv_01_u:2777: RV_01.126.03.1{11} upa mā śyāvāḥ svanayena dattā vadhūmanto daśa rathāsoasthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2778: RV_01.126.03.2{11} ṣaṣṭiḥ sahasramanu gavyamāgāt sanat kakṣīvānabhipitve ahnām
GV01rv_01_u:2779: RV_01.126.04.1{11} catvāriṃśad daśarathasya śoṇāḥ sahasrasyāgre śreṇiṃnayanti
GV01rv_01_u:2780: RV_01.126.04.2{11} madacyutaḥ kṛśanāvato atyān kakṣīvanta udamṛkṣanta pajrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2781: RV_01.126.05.1{11} pūrvāmanu prayatimā dade vastrīn yuktānaṣṭāvaridhāyaso gāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2782: RV_01.126.05.2{11} subandhavo ye viśyā iva vrā anasvantaḥ śrava aiṣanta pajrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2783: RV_01.126.06.1{11} āgadhitā parigadhitā yā kaśīkeva jaṅgahe
GV01rv_01_u:2784: RV_01.126.06.2{11} dadāti mahyaṃ yāduri yāśūnāṃ bhojyā śatā
GV01rv_01_u:2785: RV_01.126.07.1{11} upopa me parā mṛśa mā me dabhrāṇi manyathāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2787: RV_01.127.01.1{12} agniṃ hotāraṃ manye dāsvantaṃ vasuṃ sūnuṃ sahaso jātavedasaṃ vipraṃ na jātavedasam /
GV01rv_01_u:2788: ya ūrdhvayā svadhvaro devo devācyā kṛpā
GV01rv_01_u:2789: RV_01.127.01.2{12} ghṛtasya vibhrāṣṭimanu vaṣṭi śociṣājuhvānasya sarpiṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2790: RV_01.127.02.1{12} yajiṣṭhaṃ tvā yajamānā huvema jyeṣṭhamaṅgirasāṃ vipramanmabhirviprebhiḥ śukra manmabhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2792: RV_01.127.02.2{12} śociṣkeśaṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ yamimā viśaḥ prāvantu jūtaye viśaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2793: RV_01.127.03.1{12} sa hi purū cidojasā virukmatā dīdyāno bhavati druhantaraḥ paraśurna druhantaraḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2794: vīḷu cid yasya samṛtau śruvad vaneva yat sthiram
GV01rv_01_u:2795: RV_01.127.03.2{12} niḥṣahamāṇo yamate nāyate dhanvāsahā nāyate
GV01rv_01_u:2796: RV_01.127.04.1{12} dṛlḥā cidasmā anu duryathā vide tejiṣṭhābhiraraṇibhirdāṣṭyavase 'gnaye dāṣṭyavase /
GV01rv_01_u:2797: pra yaḥ purūṇi gāhate takṣad vaneva śociṣā
GV01rv_01_u:2798: RV_01.127.04.2{12} sthirā cidannā ni riṇātyojasā ni sthirāṇi cidojasā
GV01rv_01_u:2799: RV_01.127.05.1{12} tamasya pṛkṣamuparāsu dhīmahi naktaṃ yaḥ sudarśataro divātarādaprāyuṣe divātarāt /
GV01rv_01_u:2801: RV_01.127.05.2{12} bhaktamabhaktamavo vyanto ajarā agnayo vyanto ajarāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2802: RV_01.127.06.1{13} sa hi śardho na mārutaṃ tuviṣvaṇirapnasvatīṣūrvarāsviṣṭanirārtanāsviṣṭaniḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2804: RV_01.127.06.2{13} adha smāsya harṣato hṛṣīvato viśve juṣanta panthāṃ naraḥ śubhe na panthām
GV01rv_01_u:2805: RV_01.127.07.1{13} dvitā yadīṃ kīstāso abhidyavo namasyanta upavocanta bhṛgavo mathnanto dāsā bhṛgavaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2807: RV_01.127.07.2{13} priyānapidhīnrvaniṣīṣṭa medhira ā vaniṣīṣṭa medhirah
GV01rv_01_u:2808: RV_01.127.08.1{13} viśvāsāṃ tvā viśāṃ patiṃ havāmahe sarvāsāṃ samānandampatiṃ bhuje satyagirvāhasaṃ bhuje /
GV01rv_01_u:2810: RV_01.127.08.2{13} amī ca viśve amṛtāsa ā vayo havyādeveṣvā vayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2811: RV_01.127.09.1{13} tvamagne sahasā sahantamaḥ śuṣmintamo jāyase devatātaye rayirna devatātaye /
GV01rv_01_u:2812: śuṣmintamo hi te mado dyumnintama uta kratuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2813: RV_01.127.09.2{13} adha smā te pari carantyajara śruṣṭīvāno nājara
GV01rv_01_u:2814: RV_01.127.10.1{13} pra vo mahe sahasā sahasvata uṣarbudhe paśuṣe nāgnaye stomo babhūtvagnaye /
GV01rv_01_u:2815: prati yadīṃ haviṣmān viśvāsu kṣāsu joguve
GV01rv_01_u:2816: RV_01.127.10.2{13} agre rebho na jarata ṛṣūṇāṃ jūrṇirhota ṛṣūṇām
GV01rv_01_u:2817: RV_01.127.11.1{13} sa no nediṣṭhaṃ dadṛśāna ā bharāgne devebhiḥ sacanāḥsucetunā maho rāyāḥ sucetunā /
GV01rv_01_u:2818: mahi śaviṣṭha nas kṛdhi saṃcakṣe bhuje asyai
GV01rv_01_u:2819: RV_01.127.11.2{13} mahi stotṛbhyo maghavan suvīryaṃ mathīrugro na śavasā
GV01rv_01_u:2820: RV_01.128.01.1{14} ayaṃ jāyata manuṣo dharīmaṇi hotā yajiṣṭha uśijāmanuvratamagniḥ svamanu vratam /
GV01rv_01_u:2822: RV_01.128.01.2{14} adabdho hotā ni ṣadadiḷas pade parivīta iḷas pade
GV01rv_01_u:2823: RV_01.128.02.1{14} taṃ yajñasādhamapi vātayāmasy ṛtasya pathā namasā haviṣmatā devatātā haviṣmatā /
GV01rv_01_u:2824: sa na ūrjāmupābhṛtyayā kṛpā na jūryati
GV01rv_01_u:2825: RV_01.128.02.2{14} yaṃ mātariśvā manave parāvato devaṃ bhāḥ parāvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2826: RV_01.128.03.1{14} evena sadyaḥ paryeti pārthivaṃ muhurgī reto vṛṣabhaḥ kanikradad dadhad retah kanikradat /
GV01rv_01_u:2828: RV_01.128.03.2{14} sado dadhāna upareṣu sānuṣvagniḥ pareṣu sānuṣu
GV01rv_01_u:2829: RV_01.128.04.1{14} sa sukratuḥ purohito dame dame 'gniryajñasyādhvarasya cetati kratvā yajñasya cetati /
GV01rv_01_u:2830: kratvā vedhā iṣūyate viśvā jātāni paspaśe
GV01rv_01_u:2832: RV_01.128.05.1{14} kratvā yadasya taviṣīṣu pṛñcate 'gneraveṇa marutāṃ na bhojyeṣirāya na bhojyā /
GV01rv_01_u:2833: sa hi ṣmā dānaminvati vasūnāṃ ca majmanā
GV01rv_01_u:2835: RV_01.128.06.1{15} viśvo vihāyā aratirvasurdadhe haste dakṣiṇe taraṇirnaśiśrathacchravasyayā na śiśrathat /
GV01rv_01_u:2837: RV_01.128.06.2{15} viśvasmā it sukṛte vāram ṛṇvatyagnirdvārā vy ṛṇvati
GV01rv_01_u:2838: RV_01.128.07.1{15} sa mānuṣe vṛjane śantamo hito 'gniryajñeṣu jenyo na viśpatiḥ priyo yajñeṣu viśpatiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2840: RV_01.128.07.2{15} sa nastrāsate varuṇasya dhūrtermahodevasya dhūrteḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2841: RV_01.128.08.1{15} agniṃ hotāramīḷate vasudhitiṃ priyaṃ cetiṣṭhamaratiṃ nyerire havyavāhaṃ nyerire /
GV01rv_01_u:2843: RV_01.128.08.2{15} devāso raṇvamavase vasūyavo gīrbhīraṇvaṃ vasūyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2844: RV_01.129.01.1{16} yaṃ tvaṃ rathamindra medhasātaye 'pākā santamiṣira praṇayasi prānavadya nayasi /
GV01rv_01_u:2846: RV_01.129.01.2{16} sāsmākamanavadya tūtujāna vedhasāmimāṃ vācaṃ na vedhasām
GV01rv_01_u:2847: RV_01.129.02.1{16} sa śrudhi yaḥ smā pṛtanāsu kāsu cid dakṣāyya indra bharahūtaye nṛbhirasi pratūrtaye nṛbhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2848: yaḥ śūraiḥ svaḥ sanitā yo viprairvājaṃ tarutā
GV01rv_01_u:2849: RV_01.129.02.2{16} tamīśānāsa iradhanta vājinaṃ pṛkṣamatyaṃ na vājinam
GV01rv_01_u:2850: RV_01.129.03.1{16} dasmo hi ṣmā vṛṣaṇaṃ pinvasi tvacaṃ kaṃ cid yāvīrararuṃ śūra martyaṃ parivṛṇakṣi martyam /
GV01rv_01_u:2851: indrota tubhyaṃ taddive tad rudrāya svayaśase
GV01rv_01_u:2852: RV_01.129.03.2{16} mitrāya vocaṃ varuṇāya saprathaḥ sumṛḷīkāya saprathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2853: RV_01.129.04.1{16} asmākaṃ va indramuśmasīṣṭaye sakhāyaṃ viśvāyuṃ prāsahaṃ yujaṃ vājeṣu prāsahaṃ yujam /
GV01rv_01_u:2855: RV_01.129.04.2{16} nahi tvā śatru starate stṛṇoṣi yaṃviśvaṃ śatruṃ stṛṇoṣi yam
GV01rv_01_u:2856: RV_01.129.05.1{16} ni ṣū namātimatiṃ kayasya cit tejiṣṭhābhiraraṇibhirnotibhirugrābhirugrotibhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2857: neṣi ṇo yathā purānenāḥ śūra manyase
GV01rv_01_u:2858: RV_01.129.05.2{16} viśvāni pūrorapa parṣi vahnirāsā vahnirno acha
GV01rv_01_u:2859: RV_01.129.06.1{17} pra tad voceyaṃ bhavyāyendave havyo na ya iṣavān manma rejati rakṣohā manma rejati /
GV01rv_01_u:2860: svayaṃ so asmadā nido vadhairajeta durmatim
GV01rv_01_u:2862: RV_01.129.07.1{17} vanema tad dhotrayā citantyā vanema rayiṃ rayivaḥ suvīryaṃ raṇvaṃ santaṃ suvīryam /
GV01rv_01_u:2865: RV_01.129.08.1{17} pra-prā vo asme svayaśobhirūtī parivarga indro durmatīnāṃ darīman durmatīnām /
GV01rv_01_u:2866: svayaṃ sā riṣayadhyai yā na upeṣe atraiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2867: RV_01.129.08.2{17} hatemasan na vakṣati kṣiptā jūrṇirna vakṣati
GV01rv_01_u:2868: RV_01.129.09.1{17} tvaṃ na indra rāyā parīṇasā yāhi patha“nanehasā puro yāhyarakṣasā /
GV01rv_01_u:2869: sacasva naḥ parāka ā sacasvāstamīka ā
GV01rv_01_u:2870: RV_01.129.09.2{17} pāhi no dūrādārādabhiṣṭibhiḥ sadā pāhyabhiṣṭibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2871: RV_01.129.10.1{17} tvaṃ na indra rāyā tarūṣasograṃ cit tvā mahimā sakṣadavase mahe mitraṃ nāvase /
GV01rv_01_u:2873: RV_01.129.10.2{17} anyamasmad ririṣeḥ kaṃ cidadrivo ririkṣantaṃ cidadrivaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2874: RV_01.129.11.1{17} pāhi na indra suṣṭuta sridho 'vayātā sadamid durmatīnāndevaḥ san durmatīnām /
GV01rv_01_u:2876: RV_01.129.11.2{17} adhā hi tvā janitā jījanad vaso rakṣohaṇaṃ tvā jījanad vaso
GV01rv_01_u:2877: RV_01.130.01.1{18} endra yāhyupa naḥ parāvato nāyamachā vidathānīva satpatirastaṃ rājeva satpatiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2878: havāmahe tvā vayaṃ prayasvantaḥ sute sacā
GV01rv_01_u:2879: RV_01.130.01.2{18} putrāso na pitaraṃ vājasātaye maṃhiṣṭhaṃ vājasātaye
GV01rv_01_u:2880: RV_01.130.02.1{18} pibā somamindra suvānamadribhiḥ kośena siktamavataṃ navaṃsagastātṛṣāṇo na vaṃsagaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2882: RV_01.130.02.2{18} ā tvā yachantu harito na sūryamahāviśveva sūryam
GV01rv_01_u:2883: RV_01.130.03.1{18} avindad divo nihitaṃ guhā nidhiṃ verna garbhaṃ parivītamaśmanyanante antaraśmani /
GV01rv_01_u:2886: RV_01.130.03.2{18} apāvṛṇodiṣa indraḥ parīvṛtā dvāra iṣaḥ parīvṛtāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2887: RV_01.130.04.1{18} dādṛhāṇo vajramindro gabhastyoḥ kṣadmeva tigmamasanāyasaṃ śyadahihatyāya saṃ śyat /
GV01rv_01_u:2889: RV_01.130.04.2{18} taṣṭeva vṛkṣaṃ vanino ni vṛścasi paraśveva ni vṛścasi
GV01rv_01_u:2890: RV_01.130.05.1{18} tvaṃ vṛthā nadya indra sartave 'chā samudramasṛjo rathāniva vājayato rathāniva /
GV01rv_01_u:2892: RV_01.130.05.2{18} dhenūriva manave viśvadohaso janāya viśvadohasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2893: RV_01.130.06.1{19} imāṃ te vācaṃ vasūyanta āyavo rathaṃ na dhīraḥ svapāatakṣiṣuḥ sumnāya tvāmatakṣiṣuḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2894: śumbhanto jenyaṃ yathā vājeṣu vipra vājinam
GV01rv_01_u:2895: RV_01.130.06.2{19} atyamiva śavase sātaye dhanā viśvā dhanāni sātaye
GV01rv_01_u:2896: RV_01.130.07.1{19} bhinat puro navatimindra pūrave divodāsāya mahi dāśuṣe nṛto vajreṇa dāśuṣe nṛto /
GV01rv_01_u:2898: RV_01.130.07.2{19} maho dhanāni dayamāna ojasā viśvā dhanānyojasā
GV01rv_01_u:2899: RV_01.130.08.1{19} indraḥ samatsu yajamānamāryaṃ prāvad viśveṣu śatamūtirājiṣu svarmīḷheṣvājiṣu /
GV01rv_01_u:2902: RV_01.130.09.1{19} sūraścakraṃ pra vṛhajjāta ojasā prapitve vācamaruṇo muṣāyatīśāna ā muṣāyati /
GV01rv_01_u:2904: RV_01.130.09.2{19} sumnāni viśvā manuṣeva turvaṇirahā viśvevaturvaṇiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2905: RV_01.130.10.1{19} sa no navyebhirvṛṣakarmannukthaiḥ purāṃ dartaḥ pāyubhiḥpāhi śagmaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2906: RV_01.130.10.2{19} divodāsebhirindra stavāno vāvṛdhīthā ahobhiriva dyauḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2907: RV_01.131.01.1{20} indrāya hi dyaurasuro anamnatendrāya mahī pṛthivī varīmabhirdyumnasātā varīmabhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2908: indraṃ viśve sajoṣaso devāso dadhire puraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2909: RV_01.131.01.2{20} indrāya viśvā savanāni mānuṣā rātāni santu mānuṣā
GV01rv_01_u:2910: RV_01.131.02.1{20} viśveṣu hi tvā savaneṣu tuñjate samānamekaṃ vṛṣamaṇyavaḥ pṛthak svaḥ saniṣyavaḥ pṛthak /
GV01rv_01_u:2911: taṃ tvā nāvaṃ na parṣaṇiṃ śūṣasya dhuri dhīmahi
GV01rv_01_u:2912: RV_01.131.02.2{20} indraṃ na yajñaiścitayanta āyava stomebhirindramāyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2913: RV_01.131.03.1{20} vi tvā tatasre mithunā avasyavo vrajasya sātā gavyasya niḥsṛjaḥ sakṣanta indra niḥsṛjaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2914: yad gavyantā dvā janā svaryantā samūhasi
GV01rv_01_u:2915: RV_01.131.03.2{20} āviṣ karikrad vṛṣaṇaṃ sacābhuvaṃ vajramindra sacābhuvam
GV01rv_01_u:2916: RV_01.131.04.1{20} viduṣ ṭe asya vīryasya pūravaḥ puro yadindra śāradīravātiraḥ sāsahāno avātiraḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2918: RV_01.131.04.2{20} mahīmamuṣṇāḥ pṛthivīmimā apo mandasāna imā apaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2919: RV_01.131.05.1{20} ādit te asya vīryasya carkiran madeṣu vṛṣannuśijo yadāvitha sakhīyato yadāvitha /
GV01rv_01_u:2921: RV_01.131.05.2{20} te anyām-anyāṃ nadyaṃ saniṣṇata śravasyantaḥ saniṣṇata
GV01rv_01_u:2922: RV_01.131.06.1{20} uto no asyā uṣaso juṣeta hyarkasya bodhi haviṣo havīmabhiḥ svarṣātā havīmabhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2924: RV_01.131.06.2{20} ā me asya vedhaso navīyaso manma śrudhi navīyasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2925: RV_01.131.07.1{20} tvaṃ tamindra vāvṛdhāno asmayuramitrayantaṃ tuvijāta martyaṃ vajreṇa śūra martyam /
GV01rv_01_u:2926: jahi yo no aghāyati śṛṇuṣva suśravastamaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2927: RV_01.131.07.2{20} riṣṭaṃ na yāmannapa bhūtu durmatirviśvāpa bhūtu durmatiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2928: RV_01.132.01.1{21} tvayā vayaṃ maghavan pūrvye dhana indratvotāḥ sāsahyāma pṛtanyato vanuyāma vanuṣyataḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2930: RV_01.132.01.2{21} asmin yajñe vi cayemā bhare kṛtaṃ vājayanto bhare kṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:2931: RV_01.132.02.1{21} svarjeṣe bhara āprasya vakmanyuṣarbudhaḥ svasminnañjasikrāṇasya svasminnañjasi /
GV01rv_01_u:2933: RV_01.132.02.2{21} asmatrā te sadhryak santu rātayo bhadrā bhadrasya rātayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2934: RV_01.132.03.1{21} tat tu prayaḥ pratnathā te śuśukvanaṃ yasmin yajñe vāramakṛṇvata kṣayam ṛtasya vārasi kṣayam /
GV01rv_01_u:2935: vi tad voceradha dvitāntaḥ paśyanti raśmibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2936: RV_01.132.03.2{21} sa ghā vide anvindro gaveṣaṇo bandhukṣidbhyo gaveṣaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2937: RV_01.132.04.1{21} nū itthā te pūrvathā ca pravācyaṃ yadaṅgirobhyo 'vṛṇorapa vrajamindra śikṣannapa vrajam /
GV01rv_01_u:2938: aibhyaḥ samānyā diśāsmabhyaṃ jeṣi yotsi ca
GV01rv_01_u:2939: RV_01.132.04.2{21} sunvadbhyo randhayā kaṃ cidavrataṃ hṛṇāyantaṃ cidavratam
GV01rv_01_u:2940: RV_01.132.05.1{21} saṃ yajjanān kratubhiḥ śūra īkṣayad dhane hite taruṣanta śravasyavaḥ pra yakṣanta śravasyavaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2942: RV_01.132.05.2{21} indra okyaṃ didhiṣanta dhītayo devānachā na dhītayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2943: RV_01.132.06.1{21} yuvaṃ tamindrāparvatā puroyudhā yo naḥ pṛtanyādapa taṃ-tamid dhataṃ vajre?
GV01rv_01_u:2946: RV_01.132.06.2{21} asmākaṃ śatrūn pari śūra viśvato darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2947: RV_01.133.01.1{22} ubhe punāmi rodasī ṛtena druho dahāmi saṃ mahīranindrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2948: RV_01.133.01.2{22} abhivlagya yatra hatā amitrā vailasthānaṃ pari tṛḷhā aśeran
GV01rv_01_u:2950: RV_01.133.02.2{22} chindhi vaṭūriṇā padā mahāvaṭūriṇā padā
GV01rv_01_u:2951: RV_01.133.03.1{22} avāsāṃ maghavañ jahi śardho yātumatīnām
GV01rv_01_u:2954: RV_01.133.04.2{22} tat sute manāyati takat su te manāyati
GV01rv_01_u:2957: RV_01.133.06.1{22} avarmaha indra dādṛhi śrudhī naḥ śuśoca hi dyauḥ kṣāna bhīṣānadrivo ghṛṇān na bhīṣānadrivaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2959: RV_01.133.06.2{22} apūruṣaghno apratīta śūra satvabhistrisaptaiḥ śūra satvabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2960: RV_01.133.07.1{22} vanoti hi sunvan kṣayaṃ parīṇasaḥ sunvāno hi ṣmā yajatyava dviṣo devānāmava dviṣaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2963: RV_01.134.01.1{23} ā tvā juvo rārahāṇā abhi prayo vāyo vahantviha pūrvapītaye somasya pūrvapītaye /
GV01rv_01_u:2964: ūrdhvā te anu sūnṛtā manastiṣṭhatu jānatī
GV01rv_01_u:2965: RV_01.134.01.2{23} niyutvatā rathenā yāhi dāvane vāyo makhasya dāvane
GV01rv_01_u:2966: RV_01.134.02.1{23} mandantu tvā mandino vāyavindavo 'smat krāṇāsaḥ sukṛtā abhidyavo gobhiḥ krāṇā abhidyavaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:2967: yad dha krāṇā] iradhyai dakṣaṃ sacanta ūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2968: RV_01.134.02.2{23} sadhrīcīnā niyuto dāvane dhiya upa bruvata īṃ dhiyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2969: RV_01.134.03.1{23} vāyuryuṅkte rohitā vāyuraruṇā vāyū rathe ajirā dhuri voḷhave vahiṣṭhā dhuri voḷhave /
GV01rv_01_u:2971: RV_01.134.03.2{23} pra cakṣaya rodasī vāsayoṣasaḥ śravase vāsayoṣasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2972: RV_01.134.04.1{23} tubhyamuṣāsaḥ śucayaḥ parāvati bhadrā vastrā tanvate daṃsu raśmiṣu citrā navyeṣu raśmiṣu /
GV01rv_01_u:2973: tubhyaṃ dhenuḥ sabardughā viśvā vasūni dohate
GV01rv_01_u:2974: RV_01.134.04.2{23} ajanayo maruto vakṣaṇābhyodiva ā vakṣaṇābhyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2975: RV_01.134.05.1{23} tubhyaṃ śukrāsaḥ śucayasturaṇyavo madeṣūgrā iṣaṇantabhurvaṇyapāmiṣanta bhurvaṇi /
GV01rv_01_u:2977: RV_01.134.05.2{23} tvāṃ viśvasmād bhuvanāt pāsi dharmaṇāsuryāt pāsi dharmaṇa
GV01rv_01_u:2978: RV_01.134.06.1{23} tvaṃ no vāyaveṣāmapūrvyaḥ somānāṃ prathamaḥ pītimarhasi sutānāṃ pītimarhasi /
GV01rv_01_u:2980: RV_01.134.06.2{23} viśvā it te dhenavo duhra āśiraṃ ghṛtaṃ duhrata āśiram
GV01rv_01_u:2981: RV_01.135.01.1{24} stīrṇaṃ barhirupa no yāhi vītaye sahasreṇa niyu=tā niyutvate śatinībhirniyutvate /
GV01rv_01_u:2982: tubhyaṃ hi pūrvapītaye devā devāya yemire
GV01rv_01_u:2983: RV_01.135.01.2{24} pra te sutāso madhumanto asthiran madāya kratve asthiran
GV01rv_01_u:2984: RV_01.135.02.1{24} tubhyāyaṃ somaḥ paripūto adribhi spārhā vasānaḥ pari kośamarṣati śukrā vasāno arṣati /
GV01rv_01_u:2986: RV_01.135.02.2{24} vaha vāyo niyuto yāhyasmayurjuṣāṇo yāhyasmayuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:2987: RV_01.135.03.1{24} ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiradhvaraṃ sahasriṇībhirupa yāhi vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
GV01rv_01_u:2988: tavāyaṃ bhāga ṛtviyaḥ saraśmiḥ sūrye sacā
GV01rv_01_u:2989: RV_01.135.03.2{24} adhvaryubhirbharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata
GV01rv_01_u:2990: RV_01.135.04.1{24} ā vāṃ ratho niyutvān vakṣadavase 'bhi prayāṃsi sudhitāni vītaye vāyo havyāni vītaye /
GV01rv_01_u:2991: pibataṃ madhvo andhasaḥ pūrvapeyaṃ hi vāṃ hitam
GV01rv_01_u:2992: RV_01.135.04.2{24} vāyavā candreṇa rādhasā gatamindraśca rādhasā gatam
GV01rv_01_u:2993: RV_01.135.05.1{24} ā vāṃ dhiyo vavṛtyuradhvarānupemaminduṃ marmṛjanta vājinamāśumatyaṃ na vājinam /
GV01rv_01_u:2995: RV_01.135.05.2{24} indravāyū sutānāmadribhiryuvaṃ madāya vājadā yuvam
GV01rv_01_u:2996: RV_01.135.06.1{25} ime vāṃ somā apsvā sutā ihādhvaryubhirbharamāṇā ayaṃsata vāyo śukrā ayaṃsata /
GV01rv_01_u:2999: RV_01.135.07.1{25} ati vāyo sasato yāhi śaśvato yatra grāvā vadati tatra gachataṃ gṛhamindraśca gachatam
GV01rv_01_u:3000: RV_01.135.07.2{25} vi sūnṛtā dadṛśe rīyate ghṛtamā pūrṇayā niyutā yātho adhvaramindraśca yātho adhvaram
GV01rv_01_u:3001: RV_01.135.08.1{25} atrāha tad vahethe madhva āhutiṃ yamaśvatthamupatiṣṭhanta jāyavo 'sme te santu jāyavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3002: RV_01.135.08.2{25} sākaṃ gāvaḥ suvate pacyate yavo na te vāya upa dasyanti dhenavo nāpa dasyanti dhenavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3003: RV_01.135.09.1{25} ime ye te su vāyo bāhvojaso 'ntarnadī te patayantyukṣaṇo mahi vrādhanta ukṣaṇaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:3006: RV_01.136.01.1{26} pra su jyeṣṭhaṃ nicirābhyāṃ bṛhan namo havyaṃ matiṃ bharatā mṛḷayadbhyāṃ svādiṣṭhaṃ mṛḷayadbhyām /

GV01rv_01_u:3029: RV_01.137.02.1{xx} ima ā yātam indavaḥ somāso dadhyāśiraḥ sutāso dadhyāśiraḥ /

GV01rv_01_u:3032: RV_01.137.03.1{xx} tāṃ vāṃ dhenuṃ na vāsarīm aṃśuṃ duhanty adribhiḥ somaṃ duhanty adribhiḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:3033: RV_01.137.03.2{xx} asmatrā gantam upa no 'rvāñcā somapītaye /

GV01rv_01_u:3036: RV_01.138.01.2{xx} arcāmi sumnayann aham antyūtim mayobhuvam /

GV01rv_01_u:3039: RV_01.138.02.2{xx} huve yat tvā mayobhuvaṃ devaṃ sakhyāya martyaḥ /

GV01rv_01_u:3042: RV_01.138.03.2{xx} tām anu tvā navīyasīṃ niyutaṃ rāya īmahe /

GV01rv_01_u:3045: RV_01.138.04.2{xx} o ṣu tvā vavṛtīmahi stomebhir dasma sādhubhiḥ /

GV01rv_01_u:3048: RV_01.139.01.2{xx} yad dha krāṇā vivasvati nābhā saṃdāyi navyasī /

GV01rv_01_u:3051: RV_01.139.02.2{xx} yuvor itthādhi sadmasv apaśyāma hiraṇyayam //
GV01rv_01_u:3052: RV_01.139.02.3{xx} dhībhiś cana manasā svebhir akṣabhiḥ somasya svebhir akṣabhiḥ //

GV01rv_01_u:3054: RV_01.139.03.2{xx} yuvor viśvā adhi śriyaḥ pṛkṣaś ca viśvavedasā /

GV01rv_01_u:3057: RV_01.139.04.2{xx} adhi vāṃ sthāma vandhure rathe dasrā hiraṇyaye /
GV01rv_01_u:3058: RV_01.139.04.3{xx} patheva yantāv anuśāsatā rajo 'ñjasā śāsatā rajaḥ //
GV01rv_01_u:3059: RV_01.139.05.1{xx} śacībhir naḥ śacīvasū divā naktaṃ daśasyatam /
GV01rv_01_u:3060: RV_01.139.05.2{xx} mā vāṃ rātir upa dasat kadā canāsmad rātiḥ kadā cana //
GV01rv_01_u:3061: RV_01.139.06.1{xx} vṛṣann indra vṛṣapāṇāsa indava ime sutā adriṣutāsa udbhidas tubhyaṃ sutāsa udbhidaḥ /
GV01rv_01_u:3062: RV_01.139.06.2{xx} te tvā mandantu dāvane mahe citrāya rādhase /

GV01rv_01_u:3065: RV_01.139.07.2{xx} yad dha tyām aṅgirobhyo dhenuṃ devā adattana /
GV01rv_01_u:3066: RV_01.139.07.3{xx} vi tāṃ duhre aryamā kartarī sacāṃ eṣa tāṃ veda me sacā //

GV01rv_01_u:3068: RV_01.139.08.2{xx} yad vaś citraṃ yuge-yuge navyaṃ ghoṣād amartyam /
