GV01rv_01_u:3079: RV_01.140.01.2{xx} vastreṇeva vāsayā manmanā śuciṃ jyotīrathaṃ śukravarṇaṃ tamohanam //
GV01rv_01_u:3080: RV_01.140.02.1{05} abhi dvijanmā trivṛdannam ṛjyate saṃvatsare vāvṛdhe jagdhamī punaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3081: RV_01.140.02.2{05} anyasyāsā jihvaya jenyo vṛṣā nyanyena vaninomṛṣṭa varaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3082: RV_01.140.03.1{05} kṛṣṇaprutau vevije asya sakṣitā ubhā tarete abhi matarā śiśum
GV01rv_01_u:3083: RV_01.140.03.2{05} prācajihvaṃ dhvasayantaṃ tṛṣucyutamā sācyaṃ kupayaṃ vardhanaṃ pituḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3084: RV_01.140.04.1{05} mumukṣvo manave manavasyate raghudruvaḥ kṛṣṇasītāsa ū juvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3085: RV_01.140.04.2{05} asamanā ajirāso raghuṣyado vātajūtā upa yujyanta āśavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3086: RV_01.140.05.1{05} ādasya te dhvasayanto vṛtherate kṛṣṇamabhvaṃ mahi varpaḥkarikrataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3087: RV_01.140.05.2{05} yat sīṃ mahīmavaniṃ prābhi marmṛśadabhiśvasan stanayanneti nānadat
GV01rv_01_u:3088: RV_01.140.06.1{06} bhūṣan na yo 'dhi babhrūṣu namnate vṛṣeva patnīrabhyeti roruvat
GV01rv_01_u:3089: RV_01.140.06.2{06} ojāyamānastanvaśca śumbhate bhīmo na śṛngādavidhava durgṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3090: RV_01.140.07.1{06} sa saṃstiro viṣṭiraḥ saṃ gṛbhayati jananneva jānatīrnitya ā śaye
GV01rv_01_u:3091: RV_01.140.07.2{06} punarvardhante api yanti devyamanyad varpaḥ pitroḥ kṛṇvate sacā
GV01rv_01_u:3092: RV_01.140.08.1{06} tamagruvaḥ keśinīḥ saṃ hi rebhira ūrdhvāstasthurmamruṣīḥ prāyave punaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3093: RV_01.140.08.2{06} tāsāṃ jarāṃ pramuñcanneti nānadadasuṃ paraṃ janayañ jīvamastṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:3094: RV_01.140.09.1{06} adhīvasaṃ pari matu rihannaha tuvigrebhiḥ satvabhiryāti vi jrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3095: RV_01.140.09.2{06} vayo dadhat padvate rerihat sadānu śyenī sacatevartanīraha
GV01rv_01_u:3096: RV_01.140.10.1{06} asmākamagne maghavatsu dīdihyadha śvasīvān vṛṣabho damūnāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3098: RV_01.140.11.1{07} idamagne sudhitaṃ durdhitādadhi priyādu cin manmanaḥ preyo astu te
GV01rv_01_u:3099: RV_01.140.11.2{07} yat te śukraṃ tanvo rocate śuci tenāsmabhyaṃvanase ratnamā tvam
GV01rv_01_u:3100: RV_01.140.12.1{07} rathāya nāvamuta no gṛhāya nityāritrāṃ padvatīṃ rāsyagne
GV01rv_01_u:3101: RV_01.140.12.2{07} asmākaṃ vīrānuta no maghono janāṃśca yā] pārayāccharma yā ca
GV01rv_01_u:3102: RV_01.140.13.1{07} abhī no agna ukthamijjuguryā dyāvākṣāmā sindhavaśca svagūrtāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3103: RV_01.140.13.2{07} gavyaṃ yavyaṃ yanto dīrghāheṣaṃ varamaruṇyo varanta
GV01rv_01_u:3104: RV_01.141.01.1{08} baḷ itthā tad vapuṣe dhāyi darśataṃ devasya bhargaḥ sahaso yato jani
GV01rv_01_u:3105: RV_01.141.01.2{08} yadīmupa hvarate sādhate matirṛtasya dhena anayanta sasrutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3106: RV_01.141.02.1{08} pṛkṣo vapuḥ pitumān nitya ā śaye dvitīyamā saptaśivāsu mātṛṣu
GV01rv_01_u:3107: RV_01.141.02.2{08} tṛtīyamasya vṛṣabhasya dohase daśapramatiṃ janayanta yoṣaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3108: RV_01.141.03.1{08} niryadīṃ budhnān mahiṣasya varpasa īśānāsaḥ śavasākranta sūrayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3109: RV_01.141.03.2{08} yadīmanu pradivo madhva ādhave guhā santaṃ mātariśvā mathāyati
GV01rv_01_u:3110: RV_01.141.04.1{08} pra yat pituḥ paramān nīyate paryā pṛkṣudho vīrudho daṃsu rohati
GV01rv_01_u:3111: RV_01.141.04.2{08} ubhā yadasya januṣaṃ yadinvata ādid yaviṣṭho abhavad ghṛṇā śuciḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3112: RV_01.141.05.1{08} ādin mātṝrāviśad yāsvā śucirahiṃsyamāna urviyāvi vāvṛdhe
GV01rv_01_u:3113: RV_01.141.05.2{08} anu yat pūrvā aruhat sanājuvo ni navyasīṣvavarāsu dhāvate
GV01rv_01_u:3114: RV_01.141.06.1{09} ādid dhotāraṃ vṛṇate diviṣṭiṣu bhagamiva papṛcānāsa ṛñjate
GV01rv_01_u:3115: RV_01.141.06.2{09} devān yat kratvā majmanā puruṣṭuto martaṃ saṃsaṃ viśvadhā veti dhāyase
GV01rv_01_u:3116: RV_01.141.07.1{09} vi yadasthād yajato vātacodito hvāro na vakvā jaraṇā anākṛtaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3117: RV_01.141.07.2{09} tasya patman dakṣuṣaḥ kṛṣṇajaṃhasaḥ śucijanmano raja ā vyadhvanaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3118: RV_01.141.08.1{09} ratho na yātaḥ śikvabhiḥ kṛto dyāmaṅgebhiraruṣebhirīyate
GV01rv_01_u:3119: RV_01.141.08.2{09} ādasya te kṛṣṇāso dakṣi sūrayaḥ śūrasyeva tveṣathādīṣate vayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3120: RV_01.141.09.1{09} tvayā hyagne varuṇo dhṛtavrato mitraḥ śāśadre aryamā sudānavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3121: RV_01.141.09.2{09} yat sīmanu kratunā viśvathā vibhurarān na nemiḥ paribhūrajāyathāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3122: RV_01.141.10.1{09} tvamagne śaśamānāya sunvate ratnaṃ yaviṣṭha devatātiminvasi
GV01rv_01_u:3123: RV_01.141.10.2{09} taṃ tvā nu navyaṃ sahaso yuvan vayaṃ bhagaṃ na kāremahiratna dhīmahi
GV01rv_01_u:3124: RV_01.141.11.1{09} asme rayiṃ na svarthaṃ damūnasaṃ bhagaṃ dakṣaṃ na papṛcāsi dharṇasim
GV01rv_01_u:3125: RV_01.141.11.2{09} raśmīnriva yo yamati janmanī ubhe devānāṃ śaṃsam ṛta ā ca sukratuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3126: RV_01.141.12.1{09} uta naḥ sudyotmā jīrāśvo hotā mandraḥ śṛṇavaccandrarathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3127: RV_01.141.12.2{09} sa no neṣan neṣatamairamūro 'gnirvāmaṃ suvitaṃ vasyo acha
GV01rv_01_u:3128: RV_01.141.13.1{09} astāvyagniḥ śimīvadbhirarkaiḥ sāmrājyāya prataraṃ dadhānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3129: RV_01.141.13.2{09} amī ca ye maghavāno vayaṃ ca mihaṃ na sūro atiniṣ ṭatanyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3130: RV_01.142.01.1{10} samiddho agna ā vaha devānadya yatasruce
GV01rv_01_u:3131: RV_01.142.01.2{10} tantuṃ tanuṣva pūrvyaṃ sutasomāya dāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:3133: RV_01.142.02.2{10} yajñaṃ viprasya māvataḥ śaśamānasya dāśuṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3134: RV_01.142.03.1{10} śuciḥ pāvako adbhuto madhvā yajñaṃ mimikṣati
GV01rv_01_u:3135: RV_01.142.03.2{10} narāśaṃsaḥ trirā divo devo deveṣu yajñiyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3136: RV_01.142.04.1{10} īḷito agna ā vahendraṃ citramiha priyam
GV01rv_01_u:3137: RV_01.142.04.2{10} iyaṃ hi tvā matirmamāchā sujihva vacyate
GV01rv_01_u:3140: RV_01.142.06.1{10} vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ prayai devebhyo mahīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3142: RV_01.142.07.1{11} ā bhandamāne upāke naktoṣāsā supeśasā
GV01rv_01_u:3143: RV_01.142.07.2{11} yahvī ṛtaśyamātarā sīdatāṃ barhirā sumat
GV01rv_01_u:3144: RV_01.142.08.1{11} mandrajihvā jugurvaṇī hotārā daivyā kavī
GV01rv_01_u:3145: RV_01.142.08.2{11} yajñaṃ no yakṣatāmimaṃ sidhramadya divispṛśam
GV01rv_01_u:3147: RV_01.142.09.2{11} iḷā sarasvatī mahī barhiḥ sīdantu yajñiyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3148: RV_01.142.10.1{11} tan nasturīpamadbhutaṃ puru vāraṃ puru tmanā
GV01rv_01_u:3149: RV_01.142.10.2{11} tvaṣṭāpoṣāya vi ṣyatu rāye nābhā no asmayuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3150: RV_01.142.11.1{11} avasṛjannupa tmanā devān yakṣi vanaspate
GV01rv_01_u:3151: RV_01.142.11.2{11} agnirhavyā suṣūdati devo deveṣu medhiraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3155: RV_01.142.13.2{11} indrā gahi śrudhī havaṃ tvāṃ havante adhvare
GV01rv_01_u:3156: RV_01.143.01.1{12} pra tavyasīṃ navyasīṃ dhītimagnaye vāco matiṃ sahasaḥsūnave bhare
GV01rv_01_u:3157: RV_01.143.01.2{12} apāṃ napād yo vasubhiḥ saha priyo hotā pṛthivyāṃ nyasīdad ṛtviyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3158: RV_01.143.02.1{12} sa jāyamānaḥ parame vyomanyāviragnirabhavan mātariśvane
GV01rv_01_u:3159: RV_01.143.02.2{12} asya kratvā samidhānasya majmanā pra dyāvā śociḥ pṛthivī arocayat
GV01rv_01_u:3160: RV_01.143.03.1{12} asya tveṣā ajarā asya bhānavaḥ susandṛśaḥ supratīkasyasudyutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3161: RV_01.143.03.2{12} bhātvakṣaso atyakturna sindhavo 'gne rejante asasanto ajarāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3162: RV_01.143.04.1{12} yamerire bhṛgavo viśvavedasaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā bhuvanasya majmanā
GV01rv_01_u:3163: RV_01.143.04.2{12} agniṃ taṃ gīrbhirhinuhi sva ā dame ya eko vasvo varuṇo na rājati
GV01rv_01_u:3164: RV_01.143.05.1{12} na yo varāya marutāmiva svanaḥ seneva sṛṣṭā divyā yathāśaniḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3165: RV_01.143.05.2{12} agnirjambhaistigitairatti bharvati yodho na śatrūn sa vanā ny ṛñjate
GV01rv_01_u:3166: RV_01.143.06.1{12} kuvin no agnirucathasya vīrasad vasuṣ kuvid vasubhiḥ kāmamāvarat
GV01rv_01_u:3167: RV_01.143.06.2{12} codaḥ kuvit tutujyāt sātaye dhiyaḥ śucipratīkaṃ tamayā dhiyā gṛṇe
GV01rv_01_u:3168: RV_01.143.07.1{12} ghṛtapratīkaṃ va ṛtasya dhūrṣadamagniṃ mitraṃ na samidhāna ṛñjate
GV01rv_01_u:3169: RV_01.143.07.2{12} indhāno akro vidatheṣu dīdyacchukravarṇāmudu no yaṃsate dhiyam
GV01rv_01_u:3170: RV_01.143.08.1{12} aprayuchannaprayuchadbhiragne śivebhirnaḥ pāyubhiḥ pāhi śagmaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3171: RV_01.143.08.2{12} adabdhebhiradṛpitebhiriṣṭe 'nimiṣadbhiḥ pari pāhi no jāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3172: RV_01.144.01.1{13} eti pra hotā vratamasya māyayordhvāṃ dadhānaḥ śucipeśasaṃ dhiyam
GV01rv_01_u:3173: RV_01.144.01.2{13} abhi srucaḥ kramate dakṣiṇāvṛto yā asya dhāma prathamaṃ ha niṃsate
GV01rv_01_u:3174: RV_01.144.02.1{13} abhīm ṛtasya dohanā anūṣata yonau devasya sadane parīvṛtāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3175: RV_01.144.02.2{13} apāmupasthe vibhṛto yadāvasadadha svadhā adhayad yābhirīyate
GV01rv_01_u:3176: RV_01.144.03.1{13} yuyūṣataḥ savayasā tadid vapuḥ samānamarthaṃ vitaritratā mithaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3177: RV_01.144.03.2{13} ādīṃ bhago na havyaḥ samasmadā voḷhurna raśmīn samayaṃsta sārathiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3178: RV_01.144.04.1{13} yamīṃ dvā savayasā saparyataḥ samāne yonā mithunā samokasā
GV01rv_01_u:3179: RV_01.144.04.2{13} divā na naktaṃ palito yuvājani purū carannajaro mānuṣā yugā
GV01rv_01_u:3180: RV_01.144.05.1{13} tamīṃ hinvanti dhītayo daśa vriśo devaṃ martāsa ūtaye havāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:3181: RV_01.144.05.2{13} dhanoradhi pravata ā sa ṛṇvatyabhivrajadbhirvayunā navādhita
GV01rv_01_u:3182: RV_01.144.06.1{13} tvaṃ hyagne divyasya rājasi tvaṃ pārthivasya paśupā iva tmanā
GV01rv_01_u:3183: RV_01.144.06.2{13} enī ta ete bṛhatī abhiśriyā hiraṇyayī vakvarī barhirāśāte
GV01rv_01_u:3184: RV_01.144.07.1{13} agne juṣasva prati harya tad vaco mandra svadhāva ṛtajāta sukrato
GV01rv_01_u:3185: RV_01.144.07.2{13} yo viśvataḥ partyaṃṃ asi darśato raṇvaḥ sandṛṣṭau pitumāniva kṣayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3186: RV_01.145.01.1{14} taṃ pṛchatā sa jagāmā sa veda sa cikitvānīyate sā nvīyate
GV01rv_01_u:3187: RV_01.145.01.2{14} tasmin santi praśiṣastasminniṣṭayaḥ sa vājasya śavasaḥ śuṣmiṇas patiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3188: RV_01.145.02.1{14} tamit pṛchanti na simo vi pṛchati sveneva dhīro manasā yadagrabhīt
GV01rv_01_u:3189: RV_01.145.02.2{14} na mṛṣyate prathamaṃ nāparaṃ vaco 'sya kratvasacate apradṛpitaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3190: RV_01.145.03.1{14} tamid gachanti juhvastamarvatīrviśvānyekaḥ śṛṇavad vacāṃsi me
GV01rv_01_u:3192: RV_01.145.04.1{14} upasthāyaṃ carati yat samārata sadyo jātastatsāra yujyebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3193: RV_01.145.04.2{14} abhi śvāntaṃ mṛśate nāndye mude yadīṃ gachantyuśatīrapiṣṭhitam
GV01rv_01_u:3194: RV_01.145.05.1{14} sa īṃ mṛgo apyo vanargurupa tvacyupamasyāṃ ni dhāyi
GV01rv_01_u:3195: RV_01.145.05.2{14} vyabravīd vayunā martyebhyo 'gnirvidvān ṛtacid dhi satyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3197: RV_01.146.01.2{15} niṣattamasya carato dhruvasya viśvā divo rocanāpaprivāṃsam
GV01rv_01_u:3198: RV_01.146.02.1{15} ukṣā mahānabhi vavakṣa ene ajarastasthāvitaūtirṛṣvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3199: RV_01.146.02.2{15} urvyāḥ pado ni dadhāti sānau rihantyūdho aruṣāso asya
GV01rv_01_u:3200: RV_01.146.03.1{15} samānaṃ vatsamabhi saṃcarantī viṣvag dhenū vi carataḥ sumeke
GV01rv_01_u:3201: RV_01.146.03.2{15} anapavṛjyānadhvano mimāne viśvān ketānadhi mahodadhāne
GV01rv_01_u:3202: RV_01.146.04.1{15} dhīrāsaḥ padaṃ kavayo nayanti nānā hṛdā rakṣamāṇā ajuryam
GV01rv_01_u:3203: RV_01.146.04.2{15} siṣāsantaḥ paryapaśyanta sindhumāvirebhyo abhavatsūryo nṝn
GV01rv_01_u:3204: RV_01.146.05.1{15} didṛkṣeṇyaḥ pari kāṣṭhāsu jenya īḷenyo maho arbhāya jīvase
GV01rv_01_u:3205: RV_01.146.05.2{15} purutrā yadabhavat sūrahaibhyo garbhebhyo maghavā viśvadarśataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3206: RV_01.147.01.1{16} kathā te agne śucayanta āyordadāśurvājebhirāśuṣāṇāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3207: RV_01.147.01.2{16} ubhe yat toke tanaye dadhānā ṛtasya sāman raṇayantadevāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3208: RV_01.147.02.1{16} bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha maṃhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3209: RV_01.147.02.2{16} pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandāruste tanvaṃ vandeagne
GV01rv_01_u:3210: RV_01.147.03.1{16} ye pāyavo māmateyaṃ te agne paśyanto andhaṃ duritādarakṣan
GV01rv_01_u:3211: RV_01.147.03.2{16} rarakṣa tān sukṛto viśvavedā dipsanta id ripavo nāha debhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3212: RV_01.147.04.1{16} yo no agne ararivānaghāyurarātīvā marcayati dvayena
GV01rv_01_u:3213: RV_01.147.04.2{16} mantro guruḥ punarastu so asmā anu mṛkṣīṣṭa tanvaṃ duruktaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3214: RV_01.147.05.1{16} uta vā yaḥ sahasya pravidvān marto martaṃ marcayati dvayena
GV01rv_01_u:3215: RV_01.147.05.2{16} ataḥ pāhi stavamāna stuvantamagne mākirno duritāya dhāyīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3216: RV_01.148.01.1{17} mathīd yadīṃ viṣṭo mātariśvā hotāraṃ viśvāpsuṃ viśvadevyam
GV01rv_01_u:3217: RV_01.148.01.2{17} ni yaṃ dadhurmanuṣyāsu vikṣu svarṇa citraṃ vapuṣe vibhāvam
GV01rv_01_u:3218: RV_01.148.02.1{17} dadānamin na dadabhanta manmāgnirvarūthaṃ mama tasya cākan
GV01rv_01_u:3219: RV_01.148.02.2{17} juṣanta viśvanyasya karmopastutiṃ bharamāṇasya kāroḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3220: RV_01.148.03.1{17} nitye cin nu yaṃ sadane jagṛbhre praśastibhirdadhire yajñiyasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3221: RV_01.148.03.2{17} pra sū nayanta gṛbhayanta iṣṭāvaśvāso na rathyorarahaṇāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3222: RV_01.148.04.1{17} purūṇi dasmo ni riṇāti jambhairād rocate vana ā vibhāvā
GV01rv_01_u:3223: RV_01.148.04.2{17} ādasya vāto anu vāti śocirasturna śaryāmasanāmanu dyūn
GV01rv_01_u:3224: RV_01.148.05.1{17} na yaṃ ripavo na riṣaṇyavo garbhe santaṃ reṣaṇā reṣayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3225: RV_01.148.05.2{17} andhā apaśyā na dabhannabhikhyā nityāsa īṃ pretāro arakṣan
GV01rv_01_u:3226: RV_01.149.01.1{18} mahaḥ sa rāya eṣate patirdannina inasya vasunaḥ pada ā
GV01rv_01_u:3228: RV_01.149.02.1{18} sa yo vṛṣā narāṃ na rodasyoḥ śravobhirasti jīvapītasargaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3229: RV_01.149.02.2{18} pra yaḥ sasrāṇaḥ śiśrīta yonau
GV01rv_01_u:3230: RV_01.149.03.1{18} ā yaḥ puraṃ nārmiṇīmadīdedatyaḥ kavirnabhanyo nārva
GV01rv_01_u:3232: RV_01.149.04.1{18} abhi dvijanmā trī rocanāni viśva rajāṃsi śuśucano asthāt
GV01rv_01_u:3234: RV_01.149.05.1{18} ayaṃ sa hota yo dvijanmā viśvā dadhe vāryāṇi śravasyā
GV01rv_01_u:3235: RV_01.149.05.2{18} marto yo asmai sutuko dadāśa
GV01rv_01_u:3236: RV_01.150.01.1{19} puru tva dāśvān voce 'riragne tava svidā
GV01rv_01_u:3240: RV_01.150.03.1{19} sa candro vipra martyo maho vrādhantamo divi
GV01rv_01_u:3241: RV_01.150.03.2{19} pra-pret te agne vanuṣaḥ syāma
GV01rv_01_u:3242: RV_01.151.01.1{20} mitraṃ na yaṃ śimyā goṣu gavyavaḥ svādhyo vidathe apsujījanan
GV01rv_01_u:3243: RV_01.151.01.2{20} arejetāṃ rodasī pājasā girā prati priyaṃ yajataṃ januṣamavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3244: RV_01.151.02.1{20} yad dha tyad vāṃ purumīḷhasya sominaḥ pra mitrāso na dadhire svābhuvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3245: RV_01.151.02.2{20} adha kratuṃ vidataṃ gatumarcata uta śrutaṃ vṛṣaṇā pastyāvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3246: RV_01.151.03.1{20} ā vāṃ bhūṣan kṣitayo janma rodasyoḥ pravācyaṃ vṛṣaṇā dakṣase mahe
GV01rv_01_u:3247: RV_01.151.03.2{20} yadīm ṛtāya bharatho yadarvate pra hotrayā śimya vītho adhvaram
GV01rv_01_u:3248: RV_01.151.04.1{20} pra sā kṣitirasura yā mahi priya ṛtāvānāv ṛtamā ghoṣatho bṛhat
GV01rv_01_u:3249: RV_01.151.04.2{20} yuvaṃ divo bṛhato dakṣamabhuvaṃ gāṃ na dhuryupa yuñjāthe apaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3250: RV_01.151.05.1{20} mahī atra mahinā vāram ṛṇvatho 'reṇavastuja ā sadman dhenavaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3251: RV_01.151.05.2{20} svaranti tā uparatāti sūryamā nimruca uṣasastakvavīriva
GV01rv_01_u:3252: RV_01.151.06.1{21} ā vam ṛtāya keśinīranuṣata mitra yatra varuṇa gātumarcathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3253: RV_01.151.06.2{21} ava tmana sṛjataṃ pinvataṃ dhiyo yuvaṃ viprasya manmanamirajyathaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3254: RV_01.151.07.1{21} yo vāṃ yajñaiḥ śaśamāno ha dāśati kavirhotā yajati manmasādhanaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3255: RV_01.151.07.2{21} upāha taṃ gachatho vītho adhvaramachā giraḥ sumatiṃ gantamasmayu
GV01rv_01_u:3256: RV_01.151.08.1{21} yuvāṃ yajñaiḥ prathamā gobhirañjata ṛtāvanā manaso naprayuktiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:3257: RV_01.151.08.2{21} bharanti vāṃ manmanā saṃyatā giro 'dṛpyatā manasa revadaśāthe
GV01rv_01_u:3258: RV_01.151.09.1{21} revad vayo dadhāthe revadāśathe narā mayābhiritauti mahinam
GV01rv_01_u:3259: RV_01.151.09.2{21} na vaṃ dyāvo 'habhirnota sindhavo na devatvaṃ paṇayo nānaśurmagham
GV01rv_01_u:3260: RV_01.152.01.1{22} yuvaṃ vastraṇi puvasā vasāthe yuvorachidrā mantavo ha sargāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3261: RV_01.152.01.2{22} avātiratamanṛtāni viśva ṛtena mitrāvaruṇā sacethe
GV01rv_01_u:3262: RV_01.152.02.1{22} etaccana tvo vi ciketadeṣāṃ satyo mantraḥ kaviśasta ṛghāvān
GV01rv_01_u:3263: RV_01.152.02.2{22} triraśriṃ hanti caturaśrirugro devanido ha prathamāajūryan
GV01rv_01_u:3264: RV_01.152.03.1{22} apādeti prathamā padvatīnāṃ kastad vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā ciketa
GV01rv_01_u:3265: RV_01.152.03.2{22} garbho bhāraṃ bharatyā cidasya ṛtaṃ pipartyanṛtaṃ ni tārīt
GV01rv_01_u:3266: RV_01.152.04.1{22} prayantamit pari jāraṃ kanīnāṃ paśyāmasi nopanipadyamānam
GV01rv_01_u:3267: RV_01.152.04.2{22} anavapṛgṇā vitatā vasānaṃ priyaṃ mitrasya varuṇasya dhāma
GV01rv_01_u:3268: RV_01.152.05.1{22} anaśvo jāto anabhīśurarvā kanikradat patayadūrdhvasānuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3269: RV_01.152.05.2{22} acittaṃ brahma jujuṣuryuvānaḥ pra mitre dhāma varuṇegṛṇantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3270: RV_01.152.06.1{22} ā dhenavo māmateyamavantīrbrahmapriyaṃ pīpayan sasminnūdhan
GV01rv_01_u:3272: RV_01.152.07.1{22} ā vāṃ mitrāvaruṇā havyajuṣṭiṃ namasā devāvavasā vavṛtyām
GV01rv_01_u:3273: RV_01.152.07.2{22} asmākaṃ brahma pṛtanāsu sahyā asmākaṃ vṛṣṭirdivyāsupārā
GV01rv_01_u:3274: RV_01.153.01.1{23} yajāmahe vāṃ mahaḥ sajoṣā havyebhirmitrāvaruṇā namobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3275: RV_01.153.01.2{23} ghṛtairghṛtasnū adha yad vāmasme adhvaryavo na dhītibhirbharanti
GV01rv_01_u:3276: RV_01.153.02.1{23} prastutirvāṃ dhāma na prayuktirayāmi mitrāvaruṇā suvṛktiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3277: RV_01.153.02.2{23} anakti yad vāṃ vidatheṣu hotā sumnaṃ vāṃ sūrirvṛṣaṇāviyakṣan
GV01rv_01_u:3278: RV_01.153.03.1{23} pīpāya dhenuraditirṛtāya janāya mitrāvaruṇā havirde
GV01rv_01_u:3279: RV_01.153.03.2{23} hinoti yad vāṃ vidathe saparyan sa rātahavyo mānuṣo na hotā
GV01rv_01_u:3280: RV_01.153.04.1{23} uta vāṃ vikṣu madyāsvandho gāva āpaśca pīpayanta devīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3281: RV_01.153.04.2{23} uto no asya pūrvyaḥ patirdan vītaṃ pātaṃ payasa usriyāyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3282: RV_01.154.01.1{24} viṣṇornu kaṃ vīryāṇi pra vocaṃ yaḥ pārthivāni vimamerajāṃsi
GV01rv_01_u:3284: RV_01.154.02.1{24} pra tad viṣṇu stavate vīryeṇa mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3285: RV_01.154.02.2{24} yasyoruṣu triṣu vikramaṇeṣvadhikṣiyanti bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:3286: RV_01.154.03.1{24} pra viṣṇave śūṣametu manma girikṣita urugāyāya vṛṣṇe
GV01rv_01_u:3287: RV_01.154.03.2{24} ya idaṃ dīrghaṃ prayataṃ sadhasthameko vimame tribhirit padebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3288: RV_01.154.04.1{24} yasya trī pūrṇā madhunā padānyakṣīyamāṇā svadhayāmadanti
GV01rv_01_u:3289: RV_01.154.04.2{24} ya u tridhātu pṛtivīmuta dyāmeko dādhāra bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:3290: RV_01.154.05.1{24} tadasya priyamabhi pātho aśyāṃ naro yatra devayavo madanti
GV01rv_01_u:3291: RV_01.154.05.2{24} urukramasya sa hi bandhuritthā viṣṇoḥ pade parame madhva utsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3292: RV_01.154.06.1{24} tā vaṃ vāstūnyuśmasi gamadhyai yatra gāvo bhūriśṛṅgāayāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3293: RV_01.154.06.2{24} atrāha tadurugāyasya vṛṣṇaḥ paramaṃ padamava bhāti bhūri
GV01rv_01_u:3294: RV_01.155.01.1{25} pra vaḥ pāntamandhaso dhiyāyate mahe śūrāya viṣṇave cārcata
GV01rv_01_u:3295: RV_01.155.01.2{25} yā sānuni parvatānāmadābhyā mahastasthaturarvateva sādhunā
GV01rv_01_u:3296: RV_01.155.02.1{25} tveṣamitthā samaraṇaṃ śimīvatorindrāviṣṇū sutapā vāmuruṣyati
GV01rv_01_u:3298: RV_01.155.03.1{25} tā īṃ vardhanti mahyasya pauṃsyaṃ ni mātarā nayati retase bhuje
GV01rv_01_u:3299: RV_01.155.03.2{25} dadhāti putro 'varaṃ paraṃ piturnāma tṛtīyamadhi rocane divaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3300: RV_01.155.04.1{25} tat-tadidasya pauṃsyaṃ gṛṇīmasīnasya traturavṛkasya mīḷhuṣaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3301: RV_01.155.04.2{25} yaḥ pārthivāni tribhirid vigāmabhiruru kramiṣṭorugāyāya jīvase
GV01rv_01_u:3302: RV_01.155.05.1{25} dve idasya kramaṇe svardṛśo 'bhikhyāya martyo bhuraṇyati
GV01rv_01_u:3303: RV_01.155.05.2{25} tṛtīyamasya nakirā dadharṣati vayaścana patayantaḥ patatriṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3304: RV_01.155.06.1{25} caturbhiḥ sākaṃ navatiṃ ca nāmabhiścakraṃ na vṛttaṃ vyatīnravīvipat
GV01rv_01_u:3306: RV_01.156.01.1{26} bhavā mitro na śevyo ghṛtāsutirvibhūtadyumna evayā u saprathāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3307: RV_01.156.01.2{26} adhā te viṣṇo viduṣā cidardhya stomo yajñaścarādhyo haviṣmatā
GV01rv_01_u:3308: RV_01.156.02.1{26} yaḥ pūrvyāya vedhase navīyase sumajjānaye viṣṇave dadāśati
GV01rv_01_u:3309: RV_01.156.02.2{26} yo jātamasya mahato mahi bravat sedu śravobhiryujyaṃ cidabhyasat
GV01rv_01_u:3310: RV_01.156.03.1{26} tamu stotāraḥ pūrvyaṃ yathā vida ṛtasya garbhaṃ januṣāpipartana
GV01rv_01_u:3311: RV_01.156.03.2{26} āsya jānanto nāma cid vivaktana mahaste viṣṇo sumatiṃ bhajāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:3312: RV_01.156.04.1{26} tamasya rājā varuṇastamaśvinā kratuṃ sacanta mārutasya vedhasaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3313: RV_01.156.04.2{26} dādhāra dakṣamuttamamaharvidaṃ vrajaṃ ca viṣṇuḥ sakhivānaporṇute
GV01rv_01_u:3314: RV_01.156.05.1{26} ā yo vivāya sacathāya daivya indrāya viṣṇuḥ sukṛte sukṛttaraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3315: RV_01.156.05.2{26} vedhā ajinvat triṣadhastha āryam ṛtasya bhāge yajamānamābhajat
GV01rv_01_u:3316: RV_01.157.01.1{27} abodhyagnirjma udeti sūryo vyuṣāścandrā mahyāvo arciṣā
GV01rv_01_u:3317: RV_01.157.01.2{27} āyukṣātāmaśvinā yātave rathaṃ prāsāvīd devaḥ savitā jagat pṛthak
GV01rv_01_u:3318: RV_01.157.02.1{27} yad yuñjāthe vṛṣaṇamaśvinā rathaṃ ghṛtena no madhunā kṣatramukṣatam
GV01rv_01_u:3319: RV_01.157.02.2{27} asmākaṃ brahma pṛtanāsu jinvataṃ vayaṃ dhanā śūrasātā bhajemahi
GV01rv_01_u:3320: RV_01.157.03.1{27} arvāṃ tricakro madhuvāhano ratho jīrāśvo aśvinoryātu suṣṭutaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3321: RV_01.157.03.2{27} trivandhuro maghavā viśvasaubhagaḥ śaṃ na ā vakṣad dvipade catuṣpade
GV01rv_01_u:3322: RV_01.157.04.1{27} ā na ūrjaṃ vahatamaśvinā yuvaṃ madhumatyā naḥ kaśayā mimikṣatam
GV01rv_01_u:3323: RV_01.157.04.2{27} prāyustāriṣṭaṃ nī rapāṃsi mṛkṣataṃ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavataṃ sacābhuvā
GV01rv_01_u:3324: RV_01.157.05.1{27} yuvaṃ ha garbhaṃ jagatīṣu dhattho yuvaṃ viśveṣu bhuvaneṣvantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3326: RV_01.157.06.1{27} yuvaṃ ha stho bhiṣajā bheṣajebhiratho ha stho rathyā rāthyebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3327: RV_01.157.06.2{27} atho ha kṣatramadhi dhattha ugrā yo vāṃ haviṣmānmanasā dadāśa
GV01rv_01_u:3328: RV_01.158.01.1{01} vasū rudrā purumantū vṛdhantā daśasyataṃ no vṛṣaṇāvabhiṣṭau
GV01rv_01_u:3329: RV_01.158.01.2{01} dasrā ha yad rekṇa aucathyo vāṃ pra yat sasrātheakavābhirūtī
GV01rv_01_u:3330: RV_01.158.02.1{01} ko vāṃ dāśat sumataye cidasyai vasū yad dhethe namasā pade goḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3331: RV_01.158.02.2{01} jigṛtamasme revatīḥ purandhīḥ kāmapreṇeva manasā carantā
GV01rv_01_u:3332: RV_01.158.03.1{01} yukto ha yad vāṃ taugryāya perurvi madhye arṇaso dhāyi pajraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3333: RV_01.158.03.2{01} upa vāmavaḥ śaraṇaṃ gameyaṃ śūro nājma patayadbhirevaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3334: RV_01.158.04.1{01} upastutiraucathyamuruṣyen mā māmime patatriṇī vi dugdhām
GV01rv_01_u:3335: RV_01.158.04.2{01} mā māmedho daśatayaścito dhāk pra yad vāṃ baddhastmani khādati kṣām
GV01rv_01_u:3336: RV_01.158.05.1{01} na mā garan nadyo mātṛtamā dāsā yadīṃ susamubdhamavādhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3337: RV_01.158.05.2{01} śiro yadasya traitano vitakṣat svayaṃ dāsa uro aṃsāvapi gdha
GV01rv_01_u:3338: RV_01.158.06.1{01} dīrghatamā māmateyo jujurvān daśame yuge
GV01rv_01_u:3339: RV_01.158.06.2{01} apāmarthaṃ yatīnāṃ brahmā bhavati sārathiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3340: RV_01.159.01.1{02} pra dyāvā yajñaiḥ pṛthivī ṛtāvṛdhā mahī stuṣe vidatheṣu pracetasā
GV01rv_01_u:3341: RV_01.159.01.2{02} devebhirye devaputre sudaṃsasetthā dhiyā vāryāṇi prabhūṣataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3342: RV_01.159.02.1{02} uta manye pituradruho mano māturmahi svatavastad dhavīmabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3343: RV_01.159.02.2{02} suretasā pitarā bhūma cakratururu prajāyā amṛtaṃvarīmabhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3344: RV_01.159.03.1{02} te sūnavaḥ svapasaḥ sudaṃsaso mahī jajñurmātarā pūrvacittaye
GV01rv_01_u:3345: RV_01.159.03.2{02} sthātuśca satyaṃ jagataśca dharmaṇi putrasya pāthaḥ padamadvayāvinaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3346: RV_01.159.04.1{02} te māyino mamire supracetaso jāmī sayonī mithunā samokasā
GV01rv_01_u:3347: RV_01.159.04.2{02} navyaṃ-navyaṃ tantumā tanvate divi samudre antaḥ kavayaḥ sudītayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3348: RV_01.159.05.1{02} tad rādho adya saviturvareṇyaṃ vayaṃ devasya prasave manāmahe
GV01rv_01_u:3349: RV_01.159.05.2{02} asmabhyaṃ dyāvāpṛthivī sucetunā rayiṃ dhattaṃ vasumantaṃ śatagvinam
GV01rv_01_u:3350: RV_01.160.01.1{03} te hi dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuva ṛtāvarī rajaso dhārayatkavī
GV01rv_01_u:3351: RV_01.160.01.2{03} sujanmanī dhiṣaṇe antarīyate devo devī dharmaṇā sūryaḥ śuciḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3352: RV_01.160.02.1{03} uruvyacasā mahinī asaścatā pitā mātā ca bhuvanāni rakṣataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3353: RV_01.160.02.2{03} sudhṛṣṭame vapuṣye na rodasī pitā yat sīmabhi rūpairavāsayat
GV01rv_01_u:3354: RV_01.160.03.1{03} sa vahniḥ putraḥ pitroḥ pavitravān punāti dhīro bhuvanāni māyayā
GV01rv_01_u:3355: RV_01.160.03.2{03} dhenuṃ ca pṛśniṃ vṛṣabhaṃ suretasaṃ viśvāhā śukraṃ payo asya dukṣata
GV01rv_01_u:3356: RV_01.160.04.1{03} ayaṃ devānāmapasāmapastamo yo jajāna rodasī viśvaśambhuvā
GV01rv_01_u:3357: RV_01.160.04.2{03} vi yo mame rajasī sukratūyayājarebhi skambhanebhiḥsamānṛce
GV01rv_01_u:3358: RV_01.160.05.1{03} te no gṛṇāne mahinī mahi śravaḥ kṣatraṃ dyāvāpṛthivī dhāsatho bṛhat
GV01rv_01_u:3359: RV_01.160.05.2{03} yenābhi kṛṣṭīstatanāma viśvahā panāyyamojo asme saminvatam
GV01rv_01_u:3360: RV_01.161.01.1{04} kimu śreṣṭhaḥ kiṃ yaviṣṭho na ājagan kimīyate dūtyaṃ kad yadūcima
GV01rv_01_u:3361: RV_01.161.01.2{04} na nindima camasaṃ yo mahākulo 'gne bhrātardruṇa id bhūtimūdima
GV01rv_01_u:3362: RV_01.161.02.1{04} ekaṃ camasaṃ caturaḥ kṛṇotana tad vo devā abruvan tad va āgamam
GV01rv_01_u:3363: RV_01.161.02.2{04} saudhanvanā yadyevā kariṣyatha sākaṃ devairyajñiyāso bhaviṣyatha
GV01rv_01_u:3364: RV_01.161.03.1{04} agniṃ dūtaṃ prati yadabravītanāśvaḥ kartvo ratha uteha kartvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3365: RV_01.161.03.2{04} dhenuḥ kartvā yuvaśā kartvā dvā tāni bhrātaranu vaḥ kṛtvyemasi
GV01rv_01_u:3366: RV_01.161.04.1{04} cakṛvāṃsa ṛbhavastadapṛchata kvedabhūd yaḥ sya dūto na ājagan
GV01rv_01_u:3368: RV_01.161.05.1{04} hanāmaināniti tvaṣṭā yadabravīccamasaṃ ye devapānamanindiṣuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3369: RV_01.161.05.2{04} anyā nāmāni kṛṇvate sute sacānanyairenānkanyā nāmabhi sparat
GV01rv_01_u:3370: RV_01.161.06.1{05} indro harī yuyuje aśvinā rathaṃ bṛhaspatirviśvarūpāmupājata
GV01rv_01_u:3371: RV_01.161.06.2{05} ṛbhurvibhvā vājo devānagachata svapaso yajñiyambhāgamaitana
GV01rv_01_u:3372: RV_01.161.07.1{05} niścarmaṇo gāmariṇīta dhītibhiryā jarantā yuvaśā tākṛṇotana
GV01rv_01_u:3373: RV_01.161.07.2{05} saudhanvanā aśvādaśvamatakṣata yuktvā rathamupa devānayātana
GV01rv_01_u:3374: RV_01.161.08.1{05} idamudakaṃ pibatetyabravītanedaṃ vā ghā pibatā muñjanejanam
GV01rv_01_u:3375: RV_01.161.08.2{05} saudhanvanā yadi tan neva haryatha tṛtīye gha savane mādayādhvai
GV01rv_01_u:3376: RV_01.161.09.1{05} āpo bhūyiṣṭhā ityeko abravīdagnirbhūyiṣṭha ityanyo abravīt
GV01rv_01_u:3377: RV_01.161.09.2{05} vadharyantīṃ bahubhyaḥ praiko abravīd ṛtā vadantaścamasānapiṃśata
GV01rv_01_u:3378: RV_01.161.10.1{05} śroṇāmeka udakaṃ gāmavajati māṃsamekaḥ piṃśati sūnayābhṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:3379: RV_01.161.10.2{05} ā nimrucaḥ śakṛdeko apabharat kiṃ svit putrebhyaḥ pitarā upāvatuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3380: RV_01.161.11.1{06} udvatsvasmā akṛṇotana tṛṇaṃ nivatsvapaḥ svapasyaya naraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3381: RV_01.161.11.2{06} agohyasya yadasastanā gṛhe tadadyedam ṛbhavo nānu gachatha
GV01rv_01_u:3382: RV_01.161.12.1{06} sammīlya yad bhuvanā paryasarpata kva svit tātyā pitara vaasatuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3383: RV_01.161.12.2{06} aśapata yaḥ karasnaṃ va adade yaḥ prābravīt protasma abravītana
GV01rv_01_u:3384: RV_01.161.13.1{06} suṣupvāṃsa ṛbhavastadapṛchatāgohya ka idaṃ no abūbudhat
GV01rv_01_u:3385: RV_01.161.13.2{06} śvānaṃ basto bodhayitāramabravīt samvatsara idamadyā vyakhyata
GV01rv_01_u:3386: RV_01.161.14.1{06} divā yanti maruto bhūmyāgnirayaṃ vāto antarikṣeṇa yati
GV01rv_01_u:3387: RV_01.161.14.2{06} adbhiryati varuṇaḥ samudrairyuṣmānichantaḥ śavaso napātaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3388: RV_01.162.01.1{07} mā no mitro varuṇo aryamāyurindra ṛbhukṣā marutaḥ parikhyan
GV01rv_01_u:3389: RV_01.162.01.2{07} yad vājino devajatasya sapteḥ pravakṣyāmo vidathe vīryāṇi
GV01rv_01_u:3390: RV_01.162.02.1{07} yan nirṇijā rekṇasā prāvṛtasya ratiṃ gṛbhītāṃ mukhato nayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3391: RV_01.162.02.2{07} supranajo memyad viśvarūpa indrāpūṣṇoḥ priyamapyeti pāthaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3392: RV_01.162.03.1{07} eṣa chāgaḥ puro aśvena vājinā pūṣṇo bhāgo nīyate viśvadevyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3393: RV_01.162.03.2{07} abhipriyaṃ yat puroḷāśamarvatā tvaṣṭedenaṃ sauśravasāya jinvati
GV01rv_01_u:3394: RV_01.162.04.1{07} yad dhaviṣyam ṛtuśo devayānaṃ trirmānuṣāḥ paryaśvaṃ nayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3395: RV_01.162.04.2{07} atrā pūṣṇaḥ prathamo bhāga eti yajñaṃ devebhyaḥ prativedayannajaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3396: RV_01.162.05.1{07} hotādhvaryurāvayā agnimindho grāvagrābha uta śaṃstā suvipraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3397: RV_01.162.05.2{07} tena yajñena svaraṃkṛtena sviṣṭena vakṣaṇā āpṛṇadhvam
GV01rv_01_u:3398: RV_01.162.06.1{08} yūpavraskā uta ye yūpavāhāścaṣālaṃ ye aśvayūpāya takṣati
GV01rv_01_u:3399: RV_01.162.06.2{08} ye cārvate pacanaṃ sambharantyuto teṣāmabhigūrtirna invatu
GV01rv_01_u:3400: RV_01.162.07.1{08} upa prāgāt suman me 'dhāyi manma devānāmāśā upa vītapṛṣṭhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3401: RV_01.162.07.2{08} anvenaṃ viprā ṛṣayo madanti devānāṃ puṣṭe cakṛmā subandhum
GV01rv_01_u:3402: RV_01.162.08.1{08} yad vājino dāma sundānamarvato yā śīrṣaṇyā raśanārajjurasya
GV01rv_01_u:3403: RV_01.162.08.2{08} yad vā ghāsya prabhṛtamāsye tṛṇaṃ sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
GV01rv_01_u:3404: RV_01.162.09.1{08} yadaśvasya kraviṣo makṣikāśa yad vā svarau svadhitau riptamasti
GV01rv_01_u:3405: RV_01.162.09.2{08} yad dhastayoḥ śamituryan nakheṣu sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
GV01rv_01_u:3406: RV_01.162.10.1{08} yadūvadhyamudarasyāpavāti ya āmasya kraviṣo gandho asti
GV01rv_01_u:3407: RV_01.162.10.2{08} sukṛtā tacchamitāraḥ kṛṇvantūta medhaṃ śṛtapākaṃ pacantu
GV01rv_01_u:3408: RV_01.162.11.1{09} yat te gātrādagninā pacyamānādabhi śūlaṃ nihatasyāvadhāvati
GV01rv_01_u:3409: RV_01.162.11.2{09} mā tad bhūmyāmā śriṣan mā tṛṇeṣu devebhyastaduśadbhyo rātamastu
GV01rv_01_u:3410: RV_01.162.12.1{09} ye vājinaṃ paripaśyanti pakvaṃ ya īmāhuḥ surabhirnirhareti
GV01rv_01_u:3411: RV_01.162.12.2{09} ye cārvato māṃsabhikṣāmupāsata uto teṣāmabhigūrtirna invatu
GV01rv_01_u:3412: RV_01.162.13.1{09} yan nīkṣaṇaṃ māṃspacanyā ukhāyā yā pātrāṇi yūṣṇaāsecanāni
GV01rv_01_u:3414: RV_01.162.14.1{09} nikramaṇaṃ niṣadanaṃ vivartanaṃ yacca paḍbīśamarvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3415: RV_01.162.14.2{09} yacca papau yacca ghāsiṃ jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣvastu
GV01rv_01_u:3416: RV_01.162.15.1{09} mā tvāgnirdhvanayīd dhūmagandhirmokhā bhrājantyabhi vikta jaghriḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3417: RV_01.162.15.2{09} iṣṭaṃ vītamabhigūrtaṃ vaṣaṭkṛtaṃ taṃ devāsaḥ prati gṛbhṇantyaśvam
GV01rv_01_u:3418: RV_01.162.16.1{10} yadaśvāya vāsa upastṛṇantyadhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyānyasmai
GV01rv_01_u:3419: RV_01.162.16.2{10} sandānamarvantaṃ paḍbīśaṃ priyā deveṣvā yāmayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3420: RV_01.162.17.1{10} yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda
GV01rv_01_u:3421: RV_01.162.17.2{10} sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇāsūdayāmi
GV01rv_01_u:3423: RV_01.162.18.2{10} achidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-paruranughuṣya vi śasta
GV01rv_01_u:3424: RV_01.162.19.1{10} ekastvaṣturaśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatastathaṛtuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3425: RV_01.162.19.2{10} yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍanāṃ pra juhomyagnau
GV01rv_01_u:3426: RV_01.162.20.1{10} mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantaṃ mā svadhitistanva ā tiṣṭhipat te
GV01rv_01_u:3427: RV_01.162.20.2{10} mā te gṛdhnuraviśastātihāya chidrā gātraṇyasinā mithū kaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3428: RV_01.162.21.1{10} na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devānideṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3429: RV_01.162.21.2{10} harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtāmupāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya
GV01rv_01_u:3430: RV_01.162.22.1{10} sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyaṃ puṃsaḥ putrānuta viśvāpuṣaṃ rayim
GV01rv_01_u:3431: RV_01.162.22.2{10} anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatāṃ haviṣmān
GV01rv_01_u:3432: RV_01.163.01.1{11} yadakrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyan samudrāduta vā purīṣāt
GV01rv_01_u:3433: RV_01.163.01.2{11} śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyaṃ mahi jātaṃ te arvan
GV01rv_01_u:3434: RV_01.163.02.1{11} yamena dattaṃ trita enamāyunagindra eṇaṃ prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat
GV01rv_01_u:3435: RV_01.163.02.2{11} gandharvo asya raśanāmagṛbhṇāt sūrādaśvaṃ vasavo nirataṣṭa
GV01rv_01_u:3436: RV_01.163.03.1{11} asi yamo asyādityo arvannasi trito guhyena vratena
GV01rv_01_u:3437: RV_01.163.03.2{11} asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhuste trīṇi divi bandhanāni
GV01rv_01_u:3438: RV_01.163.04.1{11} trīṇi ta āhurdivi bandhanāni trīṇyapsu trīṇyantaḥ samudre
GV01rv_01_u:3439: RV_01.163.04.2{11} uteva me varuṇaścantsyarvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram
GV01rv_01_u:3440: RV_01.163.05.1{11} imā te vājinnavamārjanānīmā śaphānāṃ saniturnidhānā
GV01rv_01_u:3441: RV_01.163.05.2{11} atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣantigopāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3442: RV_01.163.06.1{12} ātmānaṃ te manasārādajānāmavo divā patayantaṃ pataṃgam
GV01rv_01_u:3443: RV_01.163.06.2{12} śiro apaśyaṃ pathibhiḥ sugebhirareṇubhirjehamānaṃ patatri
GV01rv_01_u:3444: RV_01.163.07.1{12} atrā te rūpamuttamamapaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇamiṣa ā padegoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3445: RV_01.163.07.2{12} yadā te marto anu bhogamānaḷ ādid grasiṣṭha oṣadhīrajīgaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3446: RV_01.163.08.1{12} anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvannanu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām
GV01rv_01_u:3447: RV_01.163.08.2{12} anu vrātāsastava sakhyamīyuranu devā mamire vīryaṃ te
GV01rv_01_u:3448: RV_01.163.09.1{12} hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt
GV01rv_01_u:3449: RV_01.163.09.2{12} devā idasya haviradyamāyan yo arvantaṃ prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat
GV01rv_01_u:3450: RV_01.163.10.1{12} īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ saṃ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3451: RV_01.163.10.2{12} haṃsā iva śreṇiśo yatante yadākṣiṣurdivyamajmamaśvāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3452: RV_01.163.11.1{13} tava śarīraṃ patayiṣṇvarvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān
GV01rv_01_u:3453: RV_01.163.11.2{13} tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti
GV01rv_01_u:3454: RV_01.163.12.1{13} upa prāgācchasanaṃ vājyarvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3455: RV_01.163.12.2{13} ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhirasyānu paścāt kavayo yantirebhāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3456: RV_01.163.13.1{13} upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhasthamarvānachā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca
GV01rv_01_u:3457: RV_01.163.13.2{13} adyā devāñ juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi
GV01rv_01_u:3458: RV_01.164.01.1{14} asya vāmasya palitasya hotustasya bhrātā madhyamo astyaśnaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3459: RV_01.164.01.2{14} tṛtīyo bhrātā ghṛtapṛṣṭho asyātrāpaśyaṃ viśpatiṃ saptaputram
GV01rv_01_u:3460: RV_01.164.02.1{14} sapta yuñjanti rathamekacakrameko aśvo vahati saptanāmā
GV01rv_01_u:3461: RV_01.164.02.2{14} trinābhi cakramajaramanarvaṃ yatremā viśvā bhuvanādhitasthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3462: RV_01.164.03.1{14} imaṃ rathamadhi ye sapta tasthuḥ saptacakraṃ sapta vahantyaśvāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3463: RV_01.164.03.2{14} sapta svasāro abhi saṃ navante yatra gavāṃ nihitā sapta nāma
GV01rv_01_u:3464: RV_01.164.04.1{14} ko dadarśa prathamaṃ jāyamānamasthanvantaṃ yadanasthā bibharti
GV01rv_01_u:3465: RV_01.164.04.2{14} bhūmyā asurasṛgātmā kva svit ko vidvāṃsamupa gāt praṣṭumetat
GV01rv_01_u:3466: RV_01.164.05.1{14} pākaḥ pṛchāmi manasāvijānan devānāmenā nihitā padāni
GV01rv_01_u:3467: RV_01.164.05.2{14} vatse baṣkaye 'dhi sapta tantūn vi tatnire kavaya otavāu
GV01rv_01_u:3468: RV_01.164.06.1{15} acikitvāñcikituṣaścidatra kavīn pṛchāmi vidmane na vidvān
GV01rv_01_u:3469: RV_01.164.06.2{15} vi yastastambha ṣaḷ imā rajāṃsyajasya rūpe kimapi svidekam
GV01rv_01_u:3470: RV_01.164.07.1{15} iha bravītu ya īmaṅga vedāsya vāmasya nihitaṃ padaṃ veḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3471: RV_01.164.07.2{15} śīrṣṇaḥ kṣīraṃ duhrate gāvo asya vavriṃ vasānā udakaṃ padāpuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3472: RV_01.164.08.1{15} mātā pitaram ṛta ā babhāja dhītyagre manasā saṃ hi jagme
GV01rv_01_u:3473: RV_01.164.08.2{15} sā bībhatsurgarbharasā nividdhā namasvanta idupavākamīyuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3474: RV_01.164.09.1{15} yuktā mātāsīd dhuri dakṣiṇāyā atiṣṭhad garbho vṛjanīṣvantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3475: RV_01.164.09.2{15} amīmed vatso anu gāmapaśyad viśvarūpyaṃ triṣu yojaneṣu
GV01rv_01_u:3476: RV_01.164.10.1{15} tisro mātṝstrīn pitṝn bibhradeka ūrdhvastasthau nemava glāpayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3477: RV_01.164.10.2{15} mantrayante divo amuṣya pṛṣṭhe viśvavidaṃ vācamaviśvaminvām
GV01rv_01_u:3478: RV_01.164.11.1{16} dvādaśāraṃ nahi tajjarāya varvarti cakraṃ pari dyām ṛtasya
GV01rv_01_u:3479: RV_01.164.11.2{16} ā putrā agne mithunāso atra sapta śatāni viṃśatiśca tasthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3480: RV_01.164.12.1{16} pañcapādaṃ pitaraṃ dvādaśākṛtiṃ diva āhuḥ pare ardhe purīṣiṇam
GV01rv_01_u:3481: RV_01.164.12.2{16} atheme anya upare vicakṣaṇaṃ saptacakre ṣaḷara āhurarpitam
GV01rv_01_u:3482: RV_01.164.13.1{16} pañcāre cakre parivartamāne tasminnā tasthurbhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:3483: RV_01.164.13.2{16} tasya nākṣastapyate bhūribhāraḥ sanādeva na śīryate sanābhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3484: RV_01.164.14.1{16} sanemi cakramajaraṃ vi vāvṛta uttānāyāṃ daśa yuktā vahanti
GV01rv_01_u:3485: RV_01.164.14.2{16} sūryasya cakṣū rajasaityāvṛtaṃ tasminnārpitā bhuvanāni viśvā
GV01rv_01_u:3486: RV_01.164.15.1{16} sākaṃjānāṃ saptathamahurekajaṃ ṣaḷ id yamā ṛṣayo devajā iti
GV01rv_01_u:3487: RV_01.164.15.2{16} teṣāmiṣṭāni vihitāni dhāmaśa sthātre rejante vikṛtāni rūpaśaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3488: RV_01.164.16.1{17} striyaḥ satīstānu me puṃsa āhuḥ paśyadakṣaṇvān navi cetadandhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3489: RV_01.164.16.2{17} kaviryaḥ putraḥ sa īmā ciketa yastā vijānāt sa pituṣ pitāsat
GV01rv_01_u:3490: RV_01.164.17.1{17} avaḥ pareṇa para enāvareṇa padā vatsaṃ bibhratī gaurudasthāt
GV01rv_01_u:3491: RV_01.164.17.2{17} sā kadrīcī kaṃ svidardhaṃ parāgāt kva svit sūte nahi yūthe antaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3492: RV_01.164.18.1{17} avaḥ pareṇa pitaraṃ yo asyānuveda para enāvareṇa
GV01rv_01_u:3493: RV_01.164.18.2{17} kavīyamānaḥ ka iha pra vocad devaṃ manaḥ kuto adhi prājātam
GV01rv_01_u:3494: RV_01.164.19.1{17} ye arvāñcastānu parāca āhurye parāñcastānu arvāca āhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3495: RV_01.164.19.2{17} indraśca yā cakrathuḥ soma tāni dhurā na yuktā rajaso vahanti
GV01rv_01_u:3496: RV_01.164.20.1{17} dvā suparṇā sayujā sakhāyā samānaṃ vṛkṣaṃ pari ṣasvajāte
GV01rv_01_u:3497: RV_01.164.20.2{17} tayoranyaḥ pippalaṃ svādvattyanaśnannanyo abhi cākaśīti
GV01rv_01_u:3498: RV_01.164.21.1{18} yatrā suparṇā amṛtasya bhāgamanimeṣaṃ vidathābhisvaranti
GV01rv_01_u:3499: RV_01.164.21.2{18} ino viśvasya bhuvanasya gopāḥ sa mā dhīraḥ pākamatrā viveśa
GV01rv_01_u:3500: RV_01.164.22.1{18} yasmin vṛkṣe madhvadaḥ suparṇā niviśante suvate cādhi viśve
GV01rv_01_u:3501: RV_01.164.22.2{18} tasyedāhuḥ pippalaṃ svādvagre tan non naśad yaḥpitaraṃ na veda
GV01rv_01_u:3502: RV_01.164.23.1{18} yad gāyatre adhi gāyatramāhitaṃ traiṣṭubhād vā traiṣṭubhaṃ niratakṣata
GV01rv_01_u:3503: RV_01.164.23.2{18} yad vā jagajjagatyāhitaṃ padaṃ ya it tad viduste amṛtatvamānaśuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3504: RV_01.164.24.1{18} gāyatreṇa prati mimīte arkamarkeṇa sāma traiṣṭubhena vākam
GV01rv_01_u:3505: RV_01.164.24.2{18} vākena vākaṃ dvipadā catuṣpadākṣareṇa mimate sapta vāṇīḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3506: RV_01.164.25.1{18} jagatā sindhuṃ divyasthabhāyad rathantare sūryaṃ paryapaśyat
GV01rv_01_u:3507: RV_01.164.25.2{18} gāyatrasya samidhastisra āhustato mahnā pra ririce mahitvā
GV01rv_01_u:3508: RV_01.164.26.1{19} upa hvaye sudughāṃ dhenumetāṃ suhasto godhuguta dohadenām
GV01rv_01_u:3509: RV_01.164.26.2{19} śreṣṭhaṃ savaṃ savitā sāviṣan no 'bhīddho gharmastadu ṣu pra vocam
GV01rv_01_u:3510: RV_01.164.27.1{19} hiṅkṛṇvatī vasupatnī vasūnāṃ vatsamichantī manasābhyāgāt
GV01rv_01_u:3511: RV_01.164.27.2{19} duhāmaśvibhyāṃ payo aghnyeyaṃ sa vardhatāṃ mahate saubhagāya
GV01rv_01_u:3512: RV_01.164.28.1{19} gauramīmedanu vatsaṃ miṣantaṃ mūrdhānaṃ hiṃṃ akṛṇon mātavā u
GV01rv_01_u:3513: RV_01.164.28.2{19} sṛkvāṇaṃ gharmamabhi vāvaśānā mimāti māyuṃ payate payobhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3514: RV_01.164.29.1{19} ayaṃ sa śiṅkte yena gaurabhīvṛtā mimāti māyuṃ dhvasanāvadhi śritā
GV01rv_01_u:3515: RV_01.164.29.2{19} sā cittibhirni hi cakāra martyaṃ vidyud bhavantī prati vavrimauhata
GV01rv_01_u:3516: RV_01.164.30.1{19} anacchaye turagātu jīvamejad dhruvaṃ madhya ā pastyānām
GV01rv_01_u:3517: RV_01.164.30.2{19} jīvo mṛtasya carati svadhābhiramartyo martyenā sayoniḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3518: RV_01.164.31.1{20} apaśyaṃ gopāmanipadyamānamā ca parā ca pathibhiścarantam
GV01rv_01_u:3519: RV_01.164.31.2{20} sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viśūcīrvasāna ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣvantaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3520: RV_01.164.32.1{20} ya īṃ cakāra na so asya veda ya īṃ dadarśa hirugin nutasmāt
GV01rv_01_u:3521: RV_01.164.32.2{20} sa māturyonā parivīto antarbahuprajā nirṛtimā viveśa
GV01rv_01_u:3522: RV_01.164.33.1{20} dyaurme pitā janitā nābhiratra bandhurme mātā pṛthivīmahīyam
GV01rv_01_u:3524: RV_01.164.34.1{20} pṛchāmi tvā paramantaṃ pṛthivyāḥ pṛchāmi yatra bhuvanasyanābhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3525: RV_01.164.34.2{20} pṛchāmi tvā vṛṣṇo aśvasya retaḥ pṛchāmi vācaḥ paramaṃ vyoma
GV01rv_01_u:3526: RV_01.164.35.1{20} iyaṃ vediḥ paro antaḥ pṛthivyā ayaṃ yajño bhuvanasya nābhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3527: RV_01.164.35.2{20} ayaṃ somo vṛṣṇo aśvasya reto brahmāyaṃ vācaḥparamaṃ vyoma
GV01rv_01_u:3528: RV_01.164.36.1{21} saptārdhagarbhā bhuvanasya reto viṣṇostiṣṭhanti pradiśāvidharmaṇi
GV01rv_01_u:3529: RV_01.164.36.2{21} te dhītibhirmanasā te vipaścitaḥ paribhuvaḥ pari bhavanti viśvataḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3530: RV_01.164.37.1{21} an vi jānāmi yadivedamasmi niṇyaḥ saṃnaddho manasā carāmi
GV01rv_01_u:3531: RV_01.164.37.2{21} yadā māgan prathamajā ṛtasyādid va[co aśnuve bhāgamasyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3532: RV_01.164.38.1{21} apāṃ prāṃ eti svadhayā gṛbhīto 'martyo martyenā sayoniḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3533: RV_01.164.38.2{21} tā śaśvantā viṣūcīnā viyantā nyanyaṃ cikyurna nicikyuranyam
GV01rv_01_u:3534: RV_01.164.39.1{21} ṛco akṣare parame vyoman yasmin devā adhi viśve niṣeduḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3535: RV_01.164.39.2{21} yastan na veda kim ṛcā kariṣyati ya it tad vidusta ime samāsate
GV01rv_01_u:3536: RV_01.164.40.1{21} sūyavasād bhagavatī hi bhūyā atho vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma
GV01rv_01_u:3537: RV_01.164.40.2{21} addhi tṛṇamaghnye viśvadānīṃ piba śuddhamudakamācarantī
GV01rv_01_u:3538: RV_01.164.41.1{22} gaurīrmimāya salilāni takṣatyekapadī dvipadī sā catuṣpadī
GV01rv_01_u:3539: RV_01.164.41.2{22} aṣṭāpadī navapadī babhūvuṣī sahasrākṣarā parame vyoman
GV01rv_01_u:3540: RV_01.164.42.1{22} tasyāḥ samudrā adhi vi kṣaranti tena jīvanti pradiśaścatasraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3541: RV_01.164.42.2{22} tataḥ kṣaratyakṣaraṃ tad viśvamupa jīvati
GV01rv_01_u:3542: RV_01.164.43.1{22} śakamayaṃ dhūmamārādapaśyaṃ viṣūvatā para enāvareṇa
GV01rv_01_u:3543: RV_01.164.43.2{22} ukṣāṇaṃ pṛśnimapacanta vīrāstāni dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan
GV01rv_01_u:3544: RV_01.164.44.1{22} trayaḥ keśina ṛtuthā vi cakṣate saṃvatsare vapata eka eṣām
GV01rv_01_u:3545: RV_01.164.44.2{22} viśvameko abhi caṣṭe śacībhirdhrājirekasya dadṛśena rūpam
GV01rv_01_u:3546: RV_01.164.45.1{22} catvāri vāk parimitā padāni tāni vidurbrāhmaṇā ye manīṣiṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3547: RV_01.164.45.2{22} guhā trīṇi nihitā neṅgayanti turīyaṃ vāco manuṣyā vadanti
GV01rv_01_u:3548: RV_01.164.46.1{22} indraṃ mitraṃ varuṇamagnimāhuratho divyaḥ sa suparṇo garutmān
GV01rv_01_u:3549: RV_01.164.46.2{22} ekaṃ sad viprā bahudhā vadantyagniṃ yamaṃ mātariśvānamāhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3550: RV_01.164.47.1{23} kṛṣṇaṃ niyānaṃ harayaḥ suparṇā apo vasānā divamut patanti
GV01rv_01_u:3551: RV_01.164.47.2{23} ta āvavṛtran sadanād ṛtasyādid ghṛtena pṛthivī vyudyate
GV01rv_01_u:3552: RV_01.164.48.1{23} dvādaśa pradhayaścakramekaṃ trīṇi nabhyāni ka u tacciketa
GV01rv_01_u:3553: RV_01.164.48.2{23} tasmin sākaṃ triśatā na śaṅkavo 'rpitāḥ ṣaṣṭirna calācalāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3554: RV_01.164.49.1{23} yaste stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūryena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi
GV01rv_01_u:3555: RV_01.164.49.2{23} yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ sarasvati tamiha dhātave kaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3556: RV_01.164.50.1{23} yajñena yajñamayajanta devāstani dharmāṇi prathamānyāsan
GV01rv_01_u:3557: RV_01.164.50.2{23} te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3559: RV_01.164.51.2{23} bhūmiṃ parjanyā jinvanti divaṃ jinvantyagnayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3560: RV_01.164.52.1{23} divyaṃ suparṇaṃ vāyasaṃ bṛhantamapāṃ garbhaṃ darśatamoṣadhīnām
GV01rv_01_u:3562: RV_01.165.01.1{24} kayā śubhā savayasaḥ sanīḷāḥ samānyā marutaḥ saṃ mimikṣuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3563: RV_01.165.01.2{24} kayā matī kuta etāsa ete 'rcanti śuṣmaṃ vṛṣaṇo vasūyā
GV01rv_01_u:3564: RV_01.165.02.1{24} kasya brahmāṇi jujuṣuryuvānaḥ ko adhvare maruta ā vavarta
GV01rv_01_u:3565: RV_01.165.02.2{24} śyenāniva dhrajato antarikṣe kena mahā manasā rīramāma
GV01rv_01_u:3566: RV_01.165.03.1{24} kutastvamindra māhinaḥ sanneko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā
GV01rv_01_u:3567: RV_01.165.03.2{24} saṃ pṛchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānairvocestan no harivo yatte asme
GV01rv_01_u:3568: RV_01.165.04.1{24} brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śaṃ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3569: RV_01.165.04.2{24} ā śāsate prati haryantyukthemā harī vahatastā no acha
GV01rv_01_u:3571: RV_01.165.05.2{24} mahobhiretānupa yujmahe nvindra svadhāmanu hi no babhūtha
GV01rv_01_u:3572: RV_01.165.06.1{25} kva syā vo marutaḥ svadhāsīd yan māmekaṃ samadhattāhihatye
GV01rv_01_u:3573: RV_01.165.06.2{25} ahaṃ hyūgrastaviṣastuviṣmān viśvasya śatroranamaṃ vadhasnaiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3574: RV_01.165.07.1{25} bhūri cakartha yujyebhirasme samānebhirvṛṣabha pauṃsyebhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3575: RV_01.165.07.2{25} bhūrīṇi hi kṛṇavāmā śaviṣṭhendra kratvā maruto yadvaśāma
GV01rv_01_u:3576: RV_01.165.08.1{25} vadhīṃ vṛtraṃ maruta indriyeṇa svena bhāmena taviṣo babhūvān
GV01rv_01_u:3577: RV_01.165.08.2{25} ahametā manave viśvaścandrāḥ sugā apaścakara vajrabāhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3578: RV_01.165.09.1{25} anuttamā te maghavan nakirnu na tvāvānasti devatā vidānaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3579: RV_01.165.09.2{25} na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhipravṛddha
GV01rv_01_u:3580: RV_01.165.10.1{25} ekasya cin me vibhvastvojo yā nu dadhṛṣvān kṛṇavai manīṣā
GV01rv_01_u:3581: RV_01.165.10.2{25} ahaṃ hyūgro maruto vidāno yāni cyavamindra idīśa eṣām
GV01rv_01_u:3582: RV_01.165.11.1{26} amandan mā maruta stomo atra yan me naraḥ śrutyaṃ brahma cakra
GV01rv_01_u:3583: RV_01.165.11.2{26} indrāya vṛṣṇe sumakhāya mahyaṃ sakhye sakhāyastanvetanūbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3584: RV_01.165.12.1{26} evedete prati mā rocamānā anedyaḥ śrava eṣo dadhānāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3585: RV_01.165.12.2{26} saṃcakṣyā marutaścandravarṇā achānta me chadayāthā canūnam
GV01rv_01_u:3586: RV_01.165.13.1{26} ko nvatra maruto māmahe vaḥ pra yātana sakhīnrachā sakhāyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3587: RV_01.165.13.2{26} manmāni citrā apivātayanta eṣāṃ bhūta navedā ma ṛtānām
GV01rv_01_u:3588: RV_01.165.14.1{26} ā yad duvasyād duvase na kārurasmāñcakre mānyasya medhā
GV01rv_01_u:3589: RV_01.165.14.2{26} o ṣu vartta maruto vipramachemā brahmāṇi jaritā voarcat
GV01rv_01_u:3590: RV_01.165.15.1{26} eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīrmāndāryasya mānyasya karoḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3591: RV_01.165.15.2{26} eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum
GV01rv_01_u:3592: RV_01.166.01.1{01} tan nu vocāma rabhasāya janmane pūrvaṃ mahitvaṃ vṛṣabhasyaketave
GV01rv_01_u:3593: RV_01.166.01.2{01} aidheva yāman marutastuviṣvaṇo yudheva śakrāstaviṣāṇi kartana
GV01rv_01_u:3594: RV_01.166.02.1{01} nityaṃ na sūnuṃ madhu bibhrata upa krīḷanti krīḷā vidatheṣu ghṛṣvayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3595: RV_01.166.02.2{01} nakṣanti rudrā avasā namasvinaṃ na mardhanti svatavaso haviṣkṛtam
GV01rv_01_u:3596: RV_01.166.03.1{01} yasmā ūmāso amṛtā arāsata rāyas poṣaṃ ca haviṣā dadāśuṣe
GV01rv_01_u:3597: RV_01.166.03.2{01} ukṣantyasmai maruto hitā iva purū rajāṃsi payasā mayobhuvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3598: RV_01.166.04.1{01} ā ye rajāṃsi taviṣībhiravyata pra va evāsaḥ svayatāsoadhrajan
GV01rv_01_u:3599: RV_01.166.04.2{01} bhayante viśvā bhuvanāni harmyā citro vo yāmaḥprayatāsv ṛṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:3600: RV_01.166.05.1{01} yat tveṣayāmā nadayanta parvatān divo vā pṛṣṭhaṃ naryāacucyavuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3601: RV_01.166.05.2{01} viśvo vo ajman bhayate vanaspatī rathīyantīvapra jihīta oṣadhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3602: RV_01.166.06.1{02} yūyaṃ na ugrā marutaḥ sucetunāriṣṭagrāmāḥ sumatiṃ pipartana
GV01rv_01_u:3603: RV_01.166.06.2{02} yatrā vo didyud radati krivirdatī riṇāti paśvaḥ sudhiteva barhaṇā
GV01rv_01_u:3604: RV_01.166.07.1{02} pra skambhadeṣṇā anavabhrarādhaso 'lātṛṇāso vidatheṣu suṣṭutāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3605: RV_01.166.07.2{02} arcantyarkaṃ madirasya pītaye vidurvīrasya prathamāni pauṃsyā
GV01rv_01_u:3606: RV_01.166.08.1{02} śatabhujibhistamabhihruteraghāt pūrbhī rakṣatā maruto yamāvata
GV01rv_01_u:3607: RV_01.166.08.2{02} janaṃ yamugrāstavaso virapśinaḥ pāthanā śaṃsāt tanayasya puṣṭiṣu
GV01rv_01_u:3608: RV_01.166.09.1{02} viśvāni bhadrā maruto ratheṣu vo mithaspṛdhyeva taviṣāṇyāhitā
GV01rv_01_u:3609: RV_01.166.09.2{02} aṃseṣvā vaḥ prapatheṣu khādayo 'kṣo vaścakrā samayā vi vāvṛte
GV01rv_01_u:3610: RV_01.166.10.1{02} bhūrīṇi bhadrā naryeṣu bāhuṣu vakṣassu rukmā rabhasāso añjayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3611: RV_01.166.10.2{02} aṃseṣvetāḥ paviṣu kṣurā adhi vayo na pakṣān vyanu śriyo dhire
GV01rv_01_u:3612: RV_01.166.11.1{03} mahānto mahnā vibhvo vibhūtayo dūredṛśo ye divyā iva stṛbhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3613: RV_01.166.11.2{03} mandrāḥ sujihvāḥ svaritāra āsabhiḥ sammiślā indre marutaḥ pariṣṭubhaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3614: RV_01.166.12.1{03} tad vaḥ sujātā maruto mahitvanaṃ dīrghaṃ vo dātramaditeriva vratam
GV01rv_01_u:3615: RV_01.166.12.2{03} indraścana tyajasā vi hruṇāti tajjanāya yasmai sukṛte arādhvam
GV01rv_01_u:3616: RV_01.166.13.1{03} tad vo jāmitvaṃ marutaḥ pare yuge purū yacchaṃsamamṛtāsaāvata
GV01rv_01_u:3617: RV_01.166.13.2{03} ayā dhiyā manave śruṣṭimāvyā sākaṃ naro daṃsanairā cikitrire
GV01rv_01_u:3618: RV_01.166.14.1{03} yena dīrghaṃ marutaḥ śūśavāma yuṣmākena parīṇasā turāsaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3619: RV_01.166.14.2{03} ā yat tatanan vṛjane janāsa ebhiryajñebhistadabhīṣṭimaśyām
GV01rv_01_u:3621: RV_01.167.01.1{04} sahasraṃ ta indrotayo naḥ sahasramiṣo harivo gūrtatamāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3622: RV_01.167.01.2{04} sahasraṃ rāyo mādayadhyai sahasriṇa upa no yantu vājāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3623: RV_01.167.02.1{04} ā no 'vobhirmaruto yāntvachā jyeṣṭhebhirvā bṛhaddivaiḥsumāyāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3624: RV_01.167.02.2{04} adha yadeṣāṃ niyutaḥ paramāḥ samudrasya ciddhanayanta pāre
GV01rv_01_u:3625: RV_01.167.03.1{04} mimyakṣa yeṣu sudhitā ghṛtācī hiraṇyanirṇiguparā na ṛṣṭiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3626: RV_01.167.03.2{04} guhā carantī manuṣo na yoṣā sabhāvatī vidathyeva saṃ vāk
GV01rv_01_u:3627: RV_01.167.04.1{04} parā śubhrā ayāso yavyā sādhāraṇyeva maruto mimikṣuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3628: RV_01.167.04.2{04} na rodasī apa nudanta ghorā juṣanta vṛdhaṃ sakhyāya devāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3629: RV_01.167.05.1{04} joṣad yadīmasuryā sacadhyai viṣitastukā rodasī nṛmaṇāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3630: RV_01.167.05.2{04} ā sūryeva vidhato rathaṃ gāt tveṣapratīkā nabhaso netyā
GV01rv_01_u:3631: RV_01.167.06.1{05} āsthāpayanta yuvatiṃ yuvānaḥ śubhe nimiṣlāṃ vidatheṣupajrām
GV01rv_01_u:3632: RV_01.167.06.2{05} arko yad vo maruto haviṣmān gāyad gāthaṃ sutasomo duvasyan
GV01rv_01_u:3633: RV_01.167.07.1{05} prataṃ vivakmi vakmyo ya eṣāṃ marutāṃ mahimā satyo asti
GV01rv_01_u:3634: RV_01.167.07.2{05} sacā yadīṃ vṛṣamaṇā ahaṃyu sthirā cijjanīrvahate subhāgāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3636: RV_01.167.08.2{05} uta cyavante acyutā dhruvāṇi vāvṛdha īṃ maruto dātivāraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3637: RV_01.167.09.1{05} nahī nu vo maruto antyasme ārāttāccicchavaso antamāpuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3638: RV_01.167.09.2{05} te dhṛṣṇunā śavasā śūśuvāṃso 'rṇo na dveṣo dhṛṣatā pari ṣṭhuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3639: RV_01.167.10.1{05} vayamadyendrasya preṣṭhā vayaṃ śvo vocemahi samarye
GV01rv_01_u:3640: RV_01.167.10.2{05} vayaṃ purā mahi ca no anu dyūn tan na ṛbhukṣā narāmanu ṣyāt
GV01rv_01_u:3642: RV_01.168.01.1{06} yajñā-yajñā vaḥ samanā tuturvaṇirdhiyaṃ-dhiyaṃ vo devayā u dadhidhve
GV01rv_01_u:3643: RV_01.168.01.2{06} ā vo 'rvācaḥ suvitāya rodasyormahe vavṛtyāmavase suvṛktibhiḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3644: RV_01.168.02.1{06} vavrāso na ye svajāḥ svatavasa iṣaṃ svarabhijāyanta dhūtayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3645: RV_01.168.02.2{06} sahasriyāso apāṃ normaya āsā gāvo vandyāso nokṣaṇaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3646: RV_01.168.03.1{06} somāso na ye sutāstṛptāṃśavo hṛtsu pītāso duvaso nāsate
GV01rv_01_u:3647: RV_01.168.03.2{06} aiṣāmaṃseṣu rambhiṇīva rārabhe hasteṣu khādiścakṛtiśca saṃ dadhe
GV01rv_01_u:3648: RV_01.168.04.1{06} ava svayuktā diva ā vṛthā yayuramartyāḥ kaśayā codata tmanā
GV01rv_01_u:3649: RV_01.168.04.2{06} areṇavastuvijātā acucyavurdṛḷhāni cin maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3650: RV_01.168.05.1{06} ko vo 'ntarmaruta ṛṣṭividyuto rejati tmanā hanveva jihvayā
GV01rv_01_u:3651: RV_01.168.05.2{06} dhanvacyuta iṣāṃ na yāmani purupraiṣā ahanyo naitaśaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3652: RV_01.168.06.1{07} kva svidasya rajaso mahas paraṃ kvāvaraṃ maruto yasminnāyaya
GV01rv_01_u:3653: RV_01.168.06.2{07} yaccyāvayatha vithureva saṃhitaṃ vyadriṇā patatha tveṣamarṇavam
GV01rv_01_u:3654: RV_01.168.07.1{07} sātirna vo 'mavatī svarvatī tveṣā vipākā marutaḥ pipiṣvatī
GV01rv_01_u:3655: RV_01.168.07.2{07} bhadrā vo rātiḥ pṛṇato na dakṣiṇā pṛthujrayī asuryeva jañjatī
GV01rv_01_u:3656: RV_01.168.08.1{07} prati ṣṭobhanti sindhavaḥ pavibhyo yadabhriyāṃ vācamudīrayanti
GV01rv_01_u:3657: RV_01.168.08.2{07} ava smayanta vidyutaḥ pṛthivyāṃ yadī ghṛtaṃ marutaḥ pruṣṇuvanti
GV01rv_01_u:3658: RV_01.168.09.1{07} asūta pṛśnirmahate raṇāya tveṣamayāsāṃ marutāmanīkam

GV01rv_01_u:3990: RV_01.190.02.2{12} bṛhaspatiḥ sa hyañjo varāṃsi vibhvābhavat sam ṛte mātariśvā
GV01rv_01_u:3991: RV_01.190.03.1{12} upastutiṃ namasa udyatiṃ ca ślokaṃ yaṃsat saviteva pra bāhū
GV01rv_01_u:3992: RV_01.190.03.2{12} asya kratvāhanyo yo asti mṛgo na bhīmo arakṣasastuviṣmān
GV01rv_01_u:3993: RV_01.190.04.1{12} asya śloko divīyate pṛthivyāmatyo na yaṃsad yakṣabhṛd vicetāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3994: RV_01.190.04.2{12} mṛgāṇāṃ na hetayo yanti cemā bṛhaspaterahimāyānabhi dyūn
GV01rv_01_u:3995: RV_01.190.05.1{12} ye tvā devosrikaṃ manyamānāḥ pāpā bhadramupajīvanti pajrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3996: RV_01.190.05.2{12} na dūḍhye anu dadāsi vāmaṃ bṛhaspate cayasa it piyārum
GV01rv_01_u:3997: RV_01.190.06.1{13} supraituḥ sūyavaso na panthā durniyantuḥ pariprīto na mitraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3998: RV_01.190.06.2{13} anarvāṇo abhi ye cakṣate no 'pīvṛtā aporṇuvanto asthuḥ
GV01rv_01_u:3999: RV_01.190.07.1{13} saṃ yaṃ stubho 'vanayo na yanti samudraṃ na sravato rodhacakrāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4000: RV_01.190.07.2{13} sa vidvānubhayaṃ caṣṭe antarbṛhaspatistara āpaśca gṛdhraḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4001: RV_01.190.08.1{13} evā mahastuvijātastuviṣmān bṛhaspatirvṛṣabho dhāyi devaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4002: RV_01.190.08.2{13} sa na stuto vīravad dhātu gomad vi...
GV01rv_01_u:4004: RV_01.191.01.2{14} dvāviti pluṣī iti nyadṛṣṭa alipsata
GV01rv_01_u:4006: RV_01.191.02.2{14} atho avaghnatī hantyatho pinaṣṭi piṃṣatī
GV01rv_01_u:4007: RV_01.191.03.1{14} śarāsaḥ kuśarāso darbhāsaḥ sairyā uta
GV01rv_01_u:4008: RV_01.191.03.2{14} mauñjā adṛṣṭā vairiṇāḥ sarve sākaṃ nyalipsata
GV01rv_01_u:4009: RV_01.191.04.1{14} ni gāvo goṣṭhe asadan ni mṛgāso avikṣata
GV01rv_01_u:4010: RV_01.191.04.2{14} ni ketavo janānāṃ nyadṛṣṭā alipsata
GV01rv_01_u:4011: RV_01.191.05.1{14} eta u tye pratyadṛśran pradoṣaṃ taskarā iva
GV01rv_01_u:4013: RV_01.191.06.1{15} dyaurvaḥ pitā pṛthivī mātā somo bhrātāditiḥ svasā
GV01rv_01_u:4015: RV_01.191.07.1{15} ye aṃsyā ye aṅgyāḥ sūcīkā ye prakaṅkatāḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4016: RV_01.191.07.2{15} adṛṣṭāḥ kiṃ caneha vaḥ sarve sākaṃ ni jasyata
GV01rv_01_u:4017: RV_01.191.08.1{15} ut purastāt sūrya eti viśvadṛṣṭo adṛṣṭahā
GV01rv_01_u:4018: RV_01.191.08.2{15} adṛṣṭān sarvāñ jambhayan sarvāśca yātudhānyaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4019: RV_01.191.09.1{15} udapaptadasau sūryaḥ puru viśvāni jūrvan
GV01rv_01_u:4021: RV_01.191.10.1{15} sūrye viṣamā sajāmi dṛtiṃ surāvato gṛhe
GV01rv_01_u:4022: RV_01.191.10.2{15} so cin nu namarāti no vayaṃ marāmāre asya yojanaṃ hariṣṭhā madhu tvāmadhulā cakāra
GV01rv_01_u:4023: RV_01.191.11.1{16} iyattikā śakuntikā sakā jaghāsa te viṣam
GV01rv_01_u:4025: RV_01.191.12.1{16} triḥ sapta viṣpuliṅgakā viṣasya puṣyamakṣan

GV01rv_01_u:4029: RV_01.191.14.1{16} triḥ sapta mayūryaḥ sapta svasāro agruvaḥ
GV01rv_01_u:4030: RV_01.191.14.2{16} tāste viṣaṃ vi jabhrira udakaṃ kumbhinīriva
GV01rv_01_u:4032: RV_01.191.15.2{16} tato viṣaṃ pra vāvṛte parācīranu saṃvataḥ
